also we were out from 9am until 2:30pm and the room didn‚Äôt get cleaned which was unfortunate.

pros: This hotel is excellently situated very close to Martim moniz and Rossio metro stations not to mention Tram 28 and countless bus stops making it perfect for access anywhere in Lisbon and beyond. It is very well run breakfast was conducted a-la-carte while we were there that did mean you had to book a timeslot the previous day.Nice little touch they sent half a bottle of Port and 2 pasteis  de Nata to our room on the day of check in. We also got a free upgrade to our room which made our stay even better. Smiley doorman and lovely staff all round cons: Did not do my research properly and did discover on the day that this hotel is in fact on top of the underground. It did not bother us to be honest and it kind of became 'white noise' so not necessarily a negative from my point of view. But if you are a light/ jumpy sleeper needing perfect quiet you may have to reconsider if this is the right hotel for you. All in all an amazing stay.

pros: The breakfast is very good and the atmosphere is delightful. The hotel is conveniently located in the center within walking distance of all attractions. The staff were incredibly friendly and helpful. cons:

pros: From the second we walked into the foyer the staff were so accommodating they literally bent over backwards for us. Their attention to detail is impeccable.
The room fat exceeded our expectations OMG!! It was absolutely out of this world. The decor was just stunning the sheer size of the room was amazing and the bathroom..... mind blown.... stunning. We cannot wait to return here. 
We've been to so many High end hotels around the world and this one just topped them all.

Thank you to all of the staff cons:

pros: The hotel is located in the Lisboa downtown in a pedestrian area so it is very quite. From there you can easily reach every spot by foot. The room is very comfy and big everything was perfect in the right way. The bathroom is very big and some glass doors allow you to share the toilet in privacy. The breakfast was very good with a  big choice of different food and drinks. The staff was super they also offered us very special sweets and drinks of Lisboa as a room service. Btw even I was born in Italy I tasted one of the best espresso ever tried abroad by a room coffee machine. The mirrored TV screen is something very impressive. The quality of everything is very high and nothing is left to chance.  Many thanks to the italian speaking hostess which was very kind and helpful. cons:

pros: The staff is perfect very welcoming and helpful. 
The location is central which is perfect to visit the city. 
The room was very clean comfortable and beautiful cons:

pros: Nice hotel in a fantastic location on a quiet pedestrian-only street. We walked everywhere from the hotel and also very easily got Ubers when needed. The hotel and restaurant staff were very friendly and accommodating. Very comfortable bed. The included breakfast was good and as expected. cons: The only ‚Äúcomplaints‚Äù to share are that the rooms are heavily sprayed with perfume which I didn‚Äôt love breathing in. Also we could only control the hot temperature in the room not the cool AC and we were hot at night. This may have been due to the time of year that the AC was deactivated? Overall really enjoyable stay.
pros: the staff is excellent and professional. breakfast is very yummy.. they served pastel de nata a portugal dessert treat. the location is perfect you dont need to climb. i love it. cons: n/a

pros: Probably one of the best hotels we've stayed in abroad if not the best and that's mainly due to the staff working there  the most courteous and friendly we've ever met  they couldn't do enough for us . As for the hotel it's a lovely modern hotel in the heart of Lisbon surrounded by some nice little bars and restaurants and a very short walk from the terminal for tram 28  i would highly recommend this hotel to anyone who is travelling to Lisbon . cons:

pros: Lovely boutique hotel located in the heart of Lisbon. Literally walk out the door at everything within easy reach! The staff are so welcoming and go that extra mile to make their guests feel at home. cons:

pros: Fantastic hotel and staff¬† 
My wife and I stayed at the Portugal Boutique Hotel for three nights as a 60th birthday present for my wife.
We stayed in a large beautiful room which was spotlessly clean.
On arrival we were left little custard tarts and a small bottle of port in our room. 
On our second night when we arrived back at our room we had a fantastic surprise when the hotel management had left us a bottle of sparkling wine in an ice bucket and chocolates with a beautiful hand written note wishing my wife a happy birthday. 
I cannot rate the staff highly enough so helpful and courteous from receptionist too the breakfast room staff.
They had a nice selection of food which was served to you at your table even sparkling wine. The staff always had a smile for us in the morning. 
Once again thank you Portugal boutique hotel for a beautiful and relaxing stay We look forward to returning and would recommend this hotel¬† to anyone. 
¬†
¬†
¬† cons: Nothing it was perfect
pros: how friendly the staff are cons: nothing
pros: Clean hotel amazingly friendly staff. Great location. cons:
pros: Location was fantastic and enjoyed the little touches that was provided such as pastel de natas on arrival cons:
pros: Good location helpful staff very comfortable bed and lots of nice little touches. Wouldn't hesitate to stay there again. cons: Nothing

pros: It is at the center of Lisbon which makes everything so accessible. Place is clean from the lobby to our room.
Breakfast is great. They also helped us book our tours. But what makes our stay better and special are the staff. They are all so friendly welcoming and always greets you with a smile. üòä Special thanks to Natacha Jose and Fabio who are always very helpful and attentive to our needs. cons:

pros: The room was very comfortable and much bigger than we expected. Quite universal design very comfortable beds. Also the service was really nice. Good breakfast. We really enjoyed our stay! 
As we like to walk - this location was perfect! cons: Maybe the view from the window could be better (the building on the other side of the street requires renovation) - but really that is a minor thing and does not depend on a hotel management :) The neighborhood is nice and safe.

pros: the hotel is well located the staff very friendly and professional. We felt special at Portugal Boutique hotel. The breakfast is great and all the welcome goodies provided by the hotel were beyond our expectations. Clean hotel with spacious rooms cons: nothing to mention all was great
pros: The hotel is located in very central place near Rosso place very pleasant stuff cons: The breakfast is little bit "borring"
pros: Extremely helpful and friendly staff.The breakfast is the best we have had.   The room was spacious and elegant . cons:

pros: The hotel was in the right location for a city break.  In the heart of everything we wanted.  The staff from the cleaners to the doorman receptionists and the breakfast servers were so very nice and friendly. cons: Nothing.

pros: everything was excellent they upgraded our room so that was a wonderful surprise. The room was very spacious nicely decorated clean and comfortable. the breakfast was wonderful as well. we would definitely come back. cons: nothing we‚Äôre only sorry we stayed for only one night
pros: central location clean rooms very nice staff cons: -

pros: Modern hotel with very comfortable and spacious room.
Perfect location for exploring Lisbon and only a 25 minute taxi ride from the airport.
Without exception the staff were very helpful polite and friendly.
Very good breakfast. cons: We did experience some noise from the Metro but as we were out and about most of the time it wasn't too much of a problem. Not very much noise at night.

pros: Our stay was amazing stuff was super nice from reception to waiters.
We came for my boyfriend bday on the day of his bday they prepare a cake and candles and also sing happy bday on breakfast reception left him sweet note and champaigne after we came back from dinner. That cake was also vegan so I could it it too. 
They prepare vegan stuff for me aswell in the morning so I have options for breakfast aswell.
We got great quite room and also upgrade.
This hotel is really amazing well organized and people know they‚Äôre job. 
I think people who work there should be proud on themselfs as they do great job.
we will be back for sure. üòÄ cons: everything was amazing
pros: customer service cons: nothing

pros: Staff were really friendly and helpful when asking for information on attractions in the city. Rooms were immaculately clean and so comfortable. We even had our room upgraded for free. The hotel is in a great location to visit the sites of Lisbon and is excellent for transport links. cons: I didn't have any issues with my stay. Was a perfect city break.

pros: Everything was a total blast! Staff location room breakfast. cons: A mini mini - noisy vent from the building across the street but the windows are almost sound proof for the most people wouldn't be a problem (like for me).
pros: Breakfast location cons:

pros: Staff were very helpful and room was lovely. Great location cons:

pros: lots of nice little touches like port and pastries brought to the room. Fabulous breakfast and friendly staff. The room was super clean and comfy. No TV in the room which suited us well. Really good location just steps from the metro and tram. cons: Some of the rooms aren‚Äôt great in terms of location. some are over the metro and shake but ours wasn‚Äôt though it was opposite the aircon system for the restaurant or something so was too noisy to have the windows open. 

The staff also bump up the price of the travel card. you can pick them up much cheaper at any station.

pros: Excellent  location really pleasant and clean rooms great breakfast  but the thing that made this such a great place to stay were the staff. All of the staff were incredibly friendly helpful and generous with their time and advice. cons:

pros: We liked everything about our stay. Friendly staff and nothing was an issue and so friendly. Room upgrade was supplied and bars brought our room.

pros: Everything! Very friendly staff enjoying their job and doing it with pleasure. Great rich breakfast with pastry de nata üòÅ. Room was so portugueseüòÅ the decor the colours we had a better understanding of the design with every visit in the city. cons:

pros: The staff was so friendly and helpful.  The room was super comfortable.  Excellent location.  Absolutely outstanding breakfast and the way they served it was so peaceful and civilized (no nasty feeding frenzy which is often seen at breakfast buffets).  Really nice bed linens too! cons:
pros: The hotel is very clean and the location is very good. The personal was extremely nice and gentle helped us with everything with a smile. highly recommended. cons:
pros: modern facilities and central location cons: nothing

pros: As all the reviews  state the staff at this  hotel  are so friendly  and professional   
The location  is  perfect cons: The breakfast  was a little  unusual    bread basket  ham and cheese platter fruit  platter and orange  juice all on table   before  placing  order and then hot food to order all on a tiny table  and tiny plates  
Need a better egg chef also

pros: Location is perfect. Room was big. Bedsheet very soft and towels as well. They also offered a little bottle of porto wine and cherry liquor. Bathroom very spacious. All clean very well. cons: The underground is under the hotel so in the room there was a little noisy. Also the pavement of the room was wobbly.
Also it was not convenient to have to book a time for breakfast every morning usually it should be possible to go at anytime.

pros: the hotel was excellent rooms and bathrooms and well designed! staff are excellent. little welcome and goodbye gifts left for you staff cannot do enough to help you cons: the bed was quite hard the pillows too high overall didn‚Äôt have a good sleep once while there‚Ä¶ a shame as everything else was fantastic

pros: Amazing location. Every member of staff was so friendly and helpful. The room and bathroom were very comfortable and absolutely spotless.  Breakfast was simple but delicious especially the fresh orange juice and cakes. The first night of my stay I was unexpectedly given a welcome lovely plate of pasteis and a small bottle of port which I thought was so nice and really appreciated! cons: The street facing rooms are quite loud which I didn't mind but should be noted if you're sensitive to noise.
pros: everything! the rooms are super nice and clean and also quite spacious cons: nothing
pros: amazing location great hospitality design of the room breakfastüëçüëçüëç cons:

pros: The location is the best in a quiet alley (no need to climb uphill to go downhill) but convenient to every well by walk/tram. And staff is super helpful especially the lady in the night shift who is very knowledgeable. Those added details are very caring with welcome little treats. Bedding are very comfy with plenty of pillows. Can easily ask for water kettle or pot of hot water as they don‚Äôt supply the kettle in the room. cons: The bath robe is a bit smaller in size and breakfast got various bread we can‚Äôt finish (but maybe others who love bread would like it a lot)

pros: Everything about this hotel was 10/10! 
Grea staff great room great breakfast great location great house keeping! cons: We liked everything about the hotel.

pros: We enjoyed our stay.  The hotel is in a convenient location to shopping restaurants and local transportation.  The staff is friendly and helpful.  Breakfast  was delicious.  The room and hotel is clean.  I would stay here again! cons:

pros: location was perfect could walk everywhere if you chose to right next to Rossio metro. Lovely helpful staff (spoke perfect English) and spotlessly clean. Breakfast unusual set up but really lovely too. We paid for a ‚Äònormal‚Äô room and it was massive particularly the bathroom. cons: Noise from metro was quite loud but didn‚Äôt put us off. Bar and restaurant at the hotel closed when we were there but we made use of the rooftop bar and lounge bar at the (connected) hotel next door lounge bar was reasonable and roof top bar was amazing. although pricy
pros: very modern and clean cons: no gym

pros: Excellent! Super clean! Very good location delicious breakfast and welcoming staff. Large bathrooms quality products. Cannot wait to be back. cons: Nothing: rooms could have kettles for hot beverages/coffee.
pros: It was comfortable very clean and the staff very friendly. cons: It was a disappointment that the wine cellar is not open anymore and it was not stated on the website or on Booking.com.
pros: The location friendly staff clean comfortable quite in spite of the location in the center of the city rich breakfast new furniture and equipment cons: Unsecured WiFi - VPN is required

pros: The staff were all nice and always had a smile on their faces. The free breakfast was simple but delicious and hit the spot. You can not beat the location of this hotel. The hotel is near transit and many restaurants but also the Christmas market. We will stay here again in the future. cons:
pros: It is quite nice hotel with excellent location. It was very clean and the hotel workers very friendly helpful. They provided very good suggestion when we asked and all of them were good. cons:
pros: excellent friendly staff customer oriented with small surprises cons: no tea maker in room view from window not good.

pros: A very pampering hotel.  and tastefully designed.  The superior room that i ordered was beautiful and very big. The staff is very kind and does everything in its power to make the stay at the hotel pleasant.  The breakfast is excellent with exceptional service and the location of the hotel is central and great.  I intend to recommend the hotel to my friends and there is no doubt that I will stay there again in the future. cons: the wifi was limited and did not allow me to chat via WhatsApp and did not allow me to open some of the sites I tried to browse.  Too bad.

The room was big always clean. cons:

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText:
pros: I loved so many things about our stay I will start from the beginning before even arriving they were helpful. We had a last minute additional person and they were able to accommodate us in a room that could fit 3 ppl. Upon arrival they were warm and genuinely friendly they kept our luggage and advised us they will notify us via Whatsapp when the room was ready. The room was ready 1.5hr before typical check-in. They gave us suggestions on restaurants and things to do they were also able to book the hop on hop off bus tour for us we were only there 2 days so this was best for us. Our Last night there we got caught in an insane down pour of rain our sneakers were soaked! Again they rescued us as they were able to dry them for us!. My friend was celebrating her 40th birthday and they had a lovely card and delicious desserts waiting in the room as well as a cheese platter and complimentary bottle of wine! 
Let's talk about the restaurant and bar absolutely delicious!!! I will be dreaming of food and drinks for a while. cons: This really isn't an issue but if I HAD to pick something I would say the bathroom was on the smaller side but how much time are you spending in the bathroom? LOL

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: Great independent hotel and a fantastic restaurant. cons: Not well known by taxi drivers.  It is difficult for them to locate using their Satnav systems.  We got dumped a few blocks away and had difficulty working out how to get to the hotel.  The driver picking us up had similar issues and had to be guided in by hotel staff over the phone.

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: Very comfortable and quiet room good bathroom and generous free water and pastries in the room upon arrival. This hotel has one of the best breakfasts I've ever had. The staff was also excellent and always very helpful and eager to meet the guests. cons:

reviewText:
pros: We loved everything about Hotel Hotel. We stayed in two different rooms on either end of our trip. I would definitely recommend upgrading to the larger room. The restaurant and breakfast was fabulous as was dinner. The pool area was perfect to wind down with a glass of wine at end of evening.
The staff felt like family and I hugged almost everyone when we left! cons:

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: Very high standard for food - having ate breakfast lunch and dinner at the hotel.  Staff very helpful and friendly. cons: Air conditioning was weak.

reviewText: pros: Breakfast/location/ especially  garden excellent. cons: Needed more drawer space in our room (103). Shower leaked very badly and one of us had to put bath towel on outside when used otherwise bathroom floor got very wet and was dangerous.

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: Staff excellent very helpful so nice. Food was excellent. Immaculately clean hotel. Great vibe. Good location. cons: Not much hanging space for clothes. Wardrobe light a little temperamental.

reviewText: pros: Wonderful staff beautiful hotel amazing food and cocktails. Lots of little extra touches to make us feel special :) cons: Pool could have been warmer but that‚Äôs me being picky!

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: An oasis in the city. We enjoyed our stay a lot especially the pool area in a hot afternoon. Only the small wardrobe in the room  was a bit annoying. The rest lovely. cons:

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: Everything. Perfect location fabulous room incredible staff and pool - all the extra touches made the holiday! An incredible shot of something special to warm up after a refreshing dip in the pool - all perfect! cons: Nothing - it was perfect!

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: The staff is first rate friendly and helpful .  The breakfast is excellent and the restaurant is also.  The front desk among the best anywhere.  The location could not be better.  Be prepared for rooms on the smaller side but we found a way to make this work. cons: The coffee machine was difficult to use and frankly should be replaced with a different model.  The room could have used more storage.

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: This property was such a pleasant surprise. I was upgraded to the suite on arrival which was stunning! I have already asked the hotel for details on their designers. The room was huge such a comfy bed lovely marble bathroom and a whole living area. Breakfast was great continental and ordering hot food off the menu. I relaxed by the stunning pool in the afternoon and it was incredibly comfortable. All the staff were lovely too. This hotel reminded me the benefits of booking an upscale independent hotel instead of a chain. I will be recommending this hotel to everyone! cons: Chromecast on the tv would be nice

reviewText: pros: Everything was perfect! We really enjoyed our stay at this Hotel. The design is amazing especially the pool area. The rooms were comfortable and very clean. The food was also good. We loved the sushi. The staf was so friendly and helpfull. They helped us immediately with everything and felt like family. The location is at nice area with good restaurants stores and clubs. This hotel made our stay in Lisboa all the better!! Hope they will open more hotels in other cities and countries. cons: Nothing!

reviewText: pros: We loved absolutely everything - every single staff person was so personable and professional. The breakfast was lovely the coffee was exceptional. Our room was stylish comfortable functional and quiet. cons: Possibly the design of the closets ( one had to be closed in order to open the other)l also the design of the shower door to prevent water from getting outside the shower - the shower itself was fabulous though so this is getting really nitpicking üôÉ

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: Hotel is really nice with a Boho vibe. The mood across the rooms restaurant facilities like free Yoga classes healthy breakfast buffet....etc. puts you in the right mood plus the staff is so helpful and cool. Adding to this the very good location makes it definitely my place in Lisbon! cons: None

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText:
pros: Such a stunning hotel the pool and rooms were amazing. The breakfast was yum and the staff were so so lovely. Mafalda at brekkie was our fave ‚Äì thank you for everything you were wonderful! 

Would love to come back again. cons: There was a weird sewage-y smell from the water in the bathrooms but that was honestly it and understandably can't be helped

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText:
pros: Rooms were comfortable and stylish. Food was excellent. Very helpful and friendly staff. Outdoor space and pool were lovely and relaxing.
Location is fantastic for exploring on foot. cons: Nothing. All good. Not full sun all the times at the pool but that didn‚Äôt bother us.

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: Exceptional hospitality gorgeous aesthetic and convenient location. The small touches such as the welcome fruit platter the bottle of wine and little fresh desserts at the counter were wonderful. The pool made you feel like you were in a jungle oasis. The location is also on the nicest street in Lisboa. cons: The rooms could be a bit bigger.

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: This hotel was the best of our trip to Portugal! All of the spaces were well-designed and thoughtful. The staff was friendly and helpful. Our room was tastefully designed and rather large. The breakfast was bountiful and delicious. We ate dinner in the restaurant once and my husband rated his dessert as the best he‚Äôd ever had. The pool area was magical! Like a tropical island in the city! cons: No complaints. Everything was perfect.

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: Nice hotel with a great swimming pool cons: Service is slow

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: The pool and the staff were the best parts. Very relaxing and quiet. The food was excellent as well. cons: That I had to leave. Haha. It was such a pleasant and convenient stay.

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: Exceptional hotel where you want to return immediately beautifully designed swimming pool area extraordinary food excellent in the restaurant. The staff super friendly and helpful. The location is quiet but at walking distance to the very centre of the city. Clearly The Hotel that you remember for long! cons:

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: Staff went above and beyond. The hotel is beautiful and the food was fantastic cons:

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: pretty pool friendly staff lots of extra touches great location lovely breakfast yoga!. My new fave hotel. cons: Our packaged breakfast on the day we checked out was not up to the rest of the hotel's standards.  A small thing.

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: I loved the vibe of the hotel - especially the outdoor pool felt like a jungle in the midst of Lisbon city. I am a plant and flower lover and having my breakfast in within palm trees üå≥ felt amazing. The staff at reception were very kind and helpful with advice and the restaurant service was always caring and welcoming ü´∂üèº I felt really well taken  care off and will definitely come back another time. cons: The rooms were a bit small and the air conditioning stopped working in the middle of August - so the room felt a big hot at times. I also feel the bathroom could do with an update for design and small details like tissue box and sink/ soaps and sliding door kept shutting without me touching it. It would have also been good to have the coffee Maschine explained better and story of the Delta brand behind for it being a traditional Portuguese brand and totally recyclable ‚ôªÔ∏è

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: This is a gem of a hotel right in the heart of Lisbon. From the moment we arrived the staff welcomed us so warmly and they were so happy and friendly towards us. The location is great you can easily walk around and find your way around the city. The facilities are amazing especially the pool area which is like an oasis in the city. The restaurant and bar serve amazing food and drinks. Breakfasts were delicious and the room was clean with an exceptionally comfy bed. I would thoroughly recommend Hotel Hotel for your stay in Lisbon! cons: Nothing to not like

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: Perfect location. Clean and well organised. Friendly staff. Amazing pool area cons:

reviewText: pros: Everything - from the day before arrival when the hotel contacted us to ask whether we would like them to make arrangements for our collection from airport to check out. A team who were genuinely happy wanting to please and to be the very best. The food and dining experience were exceptional and nothing was ever too much!!! cons:

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: The location is fabulous - just a short walk to all Lisbon's best sights. We loved the amazing pool which was a garden oasis after a full day of walking. The design of the hotel is lovely and the service is great. We would definitely stay here when next in Lisbon. cons: The hotel doesn't have a gym (although it has a yoga room and tattoo studio). However we didn't ask whether there was access available to on offsite gym. The hotel was so great though.

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: amazing facility and incredible service. Best staff experience I‚Äôve ever had at a hotel. cons: Loved it all

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: The location of the hotel is excellent the staff very friendly and the design of the hotel is beautiful especially the bar / outside pool area. The hotel also arranged a walking tour which was excellent the guide was fantastic. cons: Each day the room was cleaned slightly differently.

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText:
pros: Nice staff cons: No gym.  Booking.com advertised a Fitness symbol.  But there was not.  It was only a yoga room which you could not use freely.  I was disappointed. 
We took a standard room and it was very small.  The bathroom was very tiny.

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: We were only in Lisbon for one night during our trip and stayed at Hotel Hotel and were disappointed we wouldn't have more nights to stay there!  The hotel itself is very modern and cool and the staff were SO nice and helpful. We were upgraded to a junior suite which was also very nice of them and the room was very clean and comfortable. The pool/outside area is just absolutely stunning with all of the plants and we were able to relax out there for a little while and thoroughly enjoyed it. The location of the hotel was also in great proximity to things. We would have loved to have had more time to explore Lisbon and more nights here but would definitely recommend it and/or stay again if we visit Lisbon again! Fun fact - there's a trendy tattoo studio below the hotel (by appointment only) if you're looking to get a tattoo while you're in Lisbon! cons:

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: Got an upgrade which was amazing reception were so helpful and friendly! cons: Nothing at all

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: Great location however still nice and quiet. Fun design with lovely outside area and small but comfortable bedroom. Good coffee machine in the room. Nice selection of wines and food both breakfast and dinner was very good. cons: The pool was too cold to swim in. The rooms are quite cozy so nowhere to unpack clothes.

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText:
pros: I leave Lisbon feeling a little smug with my choice of hotel. I cannot find fault. It was excellent! 
The location was so so good. Close to the city centre with everything we needed within walking distance. The hotel itself has a lot of character. We had a lovely room on the 1st floor with a little terrace area. The staff are some of the best I have come across. They couldn‚Äôt do enough for you. 
It was so nice to have the use of a pool which provided a lovely spot to relax after long days walking around. 
Thank you Hotel Hotel. cons:

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: Attentive and helpful staff great location new modern facilities with clean design impressive garden with swimming pool (rather cold water though) nice restaurant - international cuisine. cons: Breakfast - lots of options available (and very good ones too) however you have to order many of them from the staff. The buffet offers fruit yoghurt bread cheese and water and juice options. Coffee is to be ordered. The staff are taking their time to get everything prepared despite the restaurant (and the hotel in general) not being super big. One day we only had 25 minutes for breakfast due to a morning trip we had booked and the restaurant team couldn't organise themselves to take our (simple) order and prepare it in time not even our coffee! I don't see this as a business hotel despite the central location. More for tourists with plenty of time. Also in June there are lots of local celebrations in Lisbon including temporary street food areas on some of the squares. One such area nearby would play live music until midnight and the sound somehow gets amplified by the buildings around to the extent that you have a live concert in your hotel room unless you close all windows. With closed windows - you would still hear it but not that bad.

reviewText:
pros: The relaxed atmosphere in the hotel where reception bar breakfast/diner area and pool naturally came together. A lot of hotels market themselves as boutique hotel but this one truly is. At checkin we were offered welcome drinks and some Lisbon treats.
Excellent choice at breakfast and very good quality at dinner with regular live music.
We got an upgrade for the room with was amazing. cons: On the first night there was a low frequency irritating noise which proved to be from the kitchen ventilation.After we notified reception issue was resolved in 15 min.

It's just a little over the top but I'm also sensitive to odours.

reviewText:
pros: Super friendly staff - relaxed and so helpful. Small snacks and a glass of port or bubbles in the afternoon. A tote in our room with water and m√ºsli bars for our city hike. Breakfast menu fantastic! Ambience with designer details and intimate corners to stay and digest the impressions from outside the hotel. All these carefully orchestrated details totally made our stay. 
PS Room 102 and 104 have the bigger terraces. We stayed in 103 - private terrace is highly recommended - a small oasis above the central oasis of the hotel cons: We could have used a big chair in the room - to read and relax. But our room was just a bit too small to fit an extra piece of furniture

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText:
pros: - Breakfast was brilliant lots of range & flavours
- location was spot on could get to almost everywhere within 20 minutes
- the staff were exceptional pointing us towards interesting points of interests & also welcoming us at all times cons: There really is very little to say that we didnt like - perhaps the fact their isnt a gym? But we knew that going in & the yoga area was more than enough for what we wanted.

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText:
pros: The location is spectacular right by Rossio square 5 min walking (up up up) to Bairro Alto and 15 min walking to the castle. Tons of nice restaurants around and the main shopping street is a stone trow away.

The hotel design is beautiful especially the dense tropical garden outside üòç

And the value for money was great!! cons: 1. Temperature setting in the room was impossible to understand and to set right. After 15 min of trying to set it up to colder temperature we had to give it and switch it off completely - as the result the room was super hot during the night. Be smarter than us check it out with somebody before it‚Äôs 2am at night..

2. The restaurant team needs a bit more training. Eveybody is super nice and helpful but one guy literally put his finger into my egg bowl when serving and another person served a sandwich in the restaurant with no cuttlery or even napkin.

reviewText:

Also no vanity kits in the bathroom which one relies on when travelling.
Also no instructions in the room as to how to use the aircon so even though we changed the temperature it wasn‚Äôt actually even on the first night. We also weren‚Äôt aware we had to press a button for the room to be cleaned until day two.

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: Truly enjoyed every part of my stay at Hotel Hotel. The rooms gardens and staff were tremendous! We were greeted with a welcoming taste of Port wine and then led to our gorgeous and comfortable garden terrace room. This hotel is beautifully done and every detail is thought of to open your senses to design and tranquillity. Breakfast was insanely delicious and a highlight of the stay. cons: There is nothing I didn't like about the hotel. The location is touristy so it was challenging to find a good meal that wasn't too fancy westernized and didn't exceed budget for a meal in Portugal.

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: This was genuinely the best Hotel we ever stayed at. Exceptionelly friendly staff bed was extremely comfortable and the breakfast was amazing. Highly recommended! cons:

Fantastic breakfast included - I would 100% return & recommend! cons: Absolutely nothing.

Constanza Joao Gustavo and Fred there to look after your every need cons: Having to leave...

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: The breakfast was unreal such a wide selection! The room was spacious and very comfortable. The staff are very friendly and helpful. In a great location in central Lisbon. The hotel aesthetic and hotel scent was lovely. Overall 10/10 couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better stay. cons: Nothing

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: Where do I begin? i‚Äôve been to many hotels and while they all try to make you feel ‚Äúspecial‚Äù this hotel just went on a whole new level. Shortly after we got in our room there was a knock on the door with some welcome pastries and hand written welcome card. On my wifes birthday (which we didnt announce) they brought in champaigne cake pastries and hand written birthday card. When we asked in Whatsapp for two fresh towels they brought those within 1 minute. The hotel was wonderful the location was very close to city center the breakfast was delicious and the staff was out of this world. Thank you for making this one of the best hotel experiences so far! cons: Nothing really! The only drawback is that there is no car parking for hotel. There is underground public parking 100m from hotel but it is 29eur per day.

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: We had a fabulous time at this hotel. It's so well located and the staff are lovely. The breakfast is delicious probably too good!  We were reluctant to get out and about too early and cut it short!!  The cleaning staff did a brilliant job of keeping everything spotless. We stayed for 5 days and highly recommend it. cons: Nothing it was fabulous!

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: The restaurant- cocktails especially the breakfast and the restaurant/bar service personnel were amazing. cons:

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: fantastic hotel centrally located near main bus/tube network and easy walking distance to all main attractions and shopping. located on a quiet street makes it tranquil.  The staff were really attentive and excelled to provide the best service experience. The breakfast was excellent lots of choice and freshly cooked food. the bar garden and pool area were lovely areas to relax all the plants in the garden area made it feel so luscious and tropical.  Rooms were really well appointed comfy beds and pillows lovely towels lots of small touches throughout the hotel elevated our stay highly commended hotel which i would definitely return to you won't regret booking here cons: nothing

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: It is an incredible place with amazing breakfast. The rooms are spacious and elegantly furnished offering a perfect blend of comfort and style. The staff is exceptionally friendly and always willing to help making the stay even more enjoyable. The hotel is also ideally located close to many attractions and restaurants making it easy to explore the area. The serene atmosphere and beautiful surroundings contribute to a truly relaxing experience. I will surely be there again as it's not just a stay but an unforgettable experience. cons:

reviewText: pros: Very close to where you need to be as a tourist including shopping and restaurants. The gives little touches of warmth like the welcome pastries and cheese plate. Airport is not far from the airport. cons:

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: We had a room with a terrace that was very nice. Unfortunately it rained much of the time we were there so we didn‚Äôt get to really use the terrace. The staff at the front desk was incredibly nice and helpful. The breakfasts were feasts. There was so much to choose from and the wait staff there was very congenial every morning. We walked all over Lisbon and always felt safe. cons: The only thing that could have been better is if the outdoor pool was heated. As a pool owner myself I know how hard it is to keep a pool heated and clean year round. Just wishing.

reviewText: pros: The hotel looks very modern and is staffed by great personnel.  Breakfast is delicious with a set of a la carte options combined with a buffet that offers everything we like. There is lots to see/do in this area and a walk to other popular districts in Lisbon takes only 10-15 minutes or an inexpensive taxi ride. We would definitely stay here again. cons:

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: The staff were helpful and friendly the rooms are nicely decorated and comfortable. Big wardrobe. Great soundproof. cons: The breakfast buffet wasn‚Äôt very appealing my eggs and avocado were a bit tasteless. The hot water in the shower never hit the temperature I expected.

reviewText:
pros: I absolutely loved the restaurant dinner and breakfast. 
I am a fashion designer and I go to Portugal often because I produce there they were super understanding and gave me the room before the check-in time that was everything to me because I was exhausted from the day before. cons: Everything was just perfect and the personnel was super friendly and kind. The room was super clean and the service was just amazing. Also the bed was great; for me the bed and sheets are very important. I honestly felt at home

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: 1) The people! Extremely friendly and helpful and efficient 2) The location! On the most prominent shopping street. And just at the beginning of the beautiful old town area 3) The rooms! Spacious comfortable equipped with a very good coffee machine! cons: A toaster in the breakfast restaurant would be good. Otherwise you have to ask the staff for toasted bread everytime. Also some more variety in food would be nice to have

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: Clean central location amazing breakfast friendly staff cons:

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: Clean modern and centrally located cons: Nothing

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: Hotel Hotel was utterly fantastic.  Luxurious but modern and comfortable and staff bent over backwards to make our trip as enjoyable as possible.  The breakfasts and cocktails were delicious as was being greeted with a glass of wine on arrival.  Brilliant location close to everything.  The outside area with plants and swimming pool was beautiful especially lit up at night.  The yoga room was gorgeous too and I thoroughly enjoyed my yoga session with Rubens.  Highly recommended in every way.  Our room was beautiful clean and spacious and the king size bed incredibly comfortable. cons: Nothing!

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: The Hotel Hotel is beautiful modern very charming and impeccably clean. The breakfast was absolutely amazing with so many healthy choices. The staff are very friendly and lovely! Constanza and Enzo helped in everything we needed I highly recommend the hotel and we will stay here next time we come back to Lisbon! cons: Everything was perfect.

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: Hotel Hotel is stylish modern comfortable and welcoming. The outdoor jungle pool area was a must to cool off with a cocktail after a scorching day exploring the beautiful city of Lisbon. The air conditioned rooms were gorgeous and were full of nice touches. We were welcomed with a port sweet treats and a cold drink and had fresh fruits and natas in our room on arrival. The night before departure we were offered a cheese board and a bottle of wine. The breakfast was wonderful with a delicious buffet and √† la carte menu. Sushi by the pool was a great way to end our holiday. The whole team could not have done more always on hand with recommendations a cold drink or something delicious. We didn‚Äôt want to leave and we will be back! cons: We booked the last available room for our dates which was rather small so more storage space would have been good for our length of stay. Nothing the team could do about that but they offered us the mini bar for free as a gesture anyway.

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText:
pros: Everything.

Location - centrally located quiet street very near a subway station
Staff - all are helpful and English speaking
Breakfast - very nice presentation healthy options
Design - very modern hip and artistic
Pool - have not tried the pool but it looked relaxing cons: We asked to be checked in early upon arriving at 10am but since they were fully booked we were able to check in at 2pm instead. But they offered breakfast right away which we appreciated.

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: Nice hotel and great location within Lisbon. Lobby was a bit overly scented with perfume which i usually do not like in a hotel. Other than that services were great and had no other complaints. cons: Did not like the overly scented lobby. I never like that in a hotel.

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: Where to start ‚Ä¶ spacious light-filled quiet & comfortable room; brilliant staff; fabulous tropical courtyard with pool (a true oasis); great location just off Avenida de Liberdade; excellent breakfast. cons: Nothing

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText:
pros: This is definitely one of the nicest hotels we have stayed recently. It has a rare combination of very a attractive product incredibly friendly and attentive staff and a great location.
The hotel opened up only in 2021 so the hardware is still brand new. The breakfast was very very good and a bit more original as most breakfast we have had in Portugal during our holidays. We had lunch once in the restaurant next to the pool which was also high quality. One of the things we liked most about the hotel was the tropical garden with the pool the sundeck and the terrace. Ideal if you don‚Äôt feel like getting around town and just want some time off. It is done very tastefully and not something you would expect in a citycentre hotel. And again a big praise for the staff; nothing was too much - both in the reception and in the restaurant. Always cheerful and nothing was too much. A special praise to Bruno - he is a jewel for this place. The rooms are comfortable (but small !) with a good bed good airco good wifi and good shower. Also very good that there were no single use plastics in the rooms or elsewhere in the hotel. Next time in Lissabon we will for sure stay here again.
Also very convenient that there is a large public car park just around the corner. cons: Just a few notes and some suggestions; I missed a gym. There is a tattoo studio and a yoga studio but I am pretty sure most guest would value a good gym better. The the safes in the room are small; a normal laptop does not fit. And then something which is more of a fact; the rooms are small ( I guess around 18m2) and the price is high ( we paid around ‚Ç¨ 350- per night ). I can understand the price because of the facilities location and the great staff but for these rates you would expect a bit more generous rooms.

reviewText: pros: Great arty modern hotel. Perfect base . Lovely breakfast . The garden terrace was cool. cons:

-.Awesome pool and chill area

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText:
pros: Perfect Stay!
1st & foremost: the team is awesome - at any time of the day reception & restaurant. Thank you!
Then the place is a true oasis in the heart of Lisbon with a very nice pool. 
Breakfast is also amazing. 
One of the best hotel I‚Äôve been to cons: If I really had to say something: the small room is small indeed (but advertised as such so it‚Äôs ok!)

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText:
pros: I recently had the pleasure of staying at a boutique hotel in Lisbon and it was an absolutely amazing experience! From the moment I arrived the service was impeccable and exceeded all my expectations.

The hotel itself had a charming and elegant ambiance perfectly capturing the essence of Lisbon. The attention to detail in the decor and design was truly impressive. Every corner of the hotel was filled with character and style creating a unique and delightful atmosphere.

The level of service provided by the staff was exceptional. They were attentive friendly and always went above and beyond to ensure my comfort and satisfaction. From offering personalized recommendations for local attractions to promptly addressing any requests the staff truly made me feel like a valued guest.

The room I stayed in was tastefully decorated and exceptionally clean. It was evident that great care was taken to ensure every aspect of the room was comfortable and inviting. The bed was incredibly comfortable guaranteeing a good night's sleep after a day of exploring the city.

Location-wise the hotel was ideally situated. It was conveniently close to many popular attractions making it easy to explore the vibrant city of Lisbon. Additionally there were numerous excellent dining options within walking distance offering a taste of the local cuisine.
J
Overall my stay at this boutique hotel in Lisbon was nothing short of exceptional. If you're looking for a memorable and enchanting experience in the heart of Lisbon I highly recommend this hotel. The combination of outstanding service charming ambiance and convenient location make it an excellent choice for any traveler. I cannot wait to return and create more wonderful memories at this remarkable hotel! cons:

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: Pretty much everything!  The design and decor- stylish and beautiful! The staff- so helpful and lovely‚Ä¶ Like beyond nice! The location- perfect. The restaurant was amazing food!  For dinner too.  Didn‚Äôt expect to eat there but it was some of the best food we had ( tho more Asian inspired which our family loves with vegetarian options!) really thoughtful fresh beautiful food!  The beds super comfy too.  The pool area is ingenious and landscaped with gorgeous plants! cons: Nothing really!  The rooms may be a bit small and no view but their loveliness makes up for it!

reviewText:

The courtyard had the most beautiful tropical plants and a vertical garden wall interspersed with comfortable seating and access to the swimming pool. It was a haven and retreat from the busy Lisbon environment.
The restaurant and serving staff were exceptional as was the sushi and the breakfasts. In particular we would like to call out Vera who was a delight and made our stay most special. We cannot rate all the staff more highly and it was a wonderful place to end our vacation. cons:

reviewText:

The hotel also have their own bar  and restaurant. I loved the natural plants and near the pool. The hotel is clean. And you get a welcome message with a Portuguese tart waiting for you in your room. I f you like pancakes you get great banna pancakes. cons: The pool was a little cooler than expected but It was the only thing I could think of. 
My room shower door leaked a little bit of water. But other than that everything lovely . I had my own balcony and table. Bed was comfortable too.

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: Could not recommend this hotel more. It exceeded our expectations the room was so spacious with soft pillows and very comfortable beds. The animal restaurant was by far one of the best restaurants we have ever dined in the food was like art and tasted even better! A great vibe at night with lovely live music. A special thanks to the staff who made our experience in Lisbon unforgettable including Vera Maria victor Bernardo  and Ben to name a few. We didn‚Äôt catch everyone‚Äôs names but all went above and beyond for us. Lisbon is such a beautiful charming city but this hotel is probably the main reason we will be returning. cons: Nothing it was perfect

reviewText:

- The hotel is beautifully decorated. I love the art!
- Breakfast was a healthy buffet and an a la carte menu which was really great.
- The room and the bathroom are nice. cons: What could have been better:
- The bed was very small (I think it was a queen bed - 140 x 200)
- The room was not sound proof so you could hear people talking and slamming doors in the hallway
- The couch in the lobby looks stylish but is not very comfortable

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: This is the best hotel we have ever stayed in.  We had an early flight and went straight to the hotel knowing that check-in wasn't until 3pm the hotel staff made us feel so welcome and made us coffee on arrival they kept our luggage whilst we went out to investigate the local area.  It's a short walk to the water front lots of the lovely squares and the beautiful busy city centre with so many nice shops and restaurants.  We had breakfast every morning and were spoilt for choice we also had an evening meal in the hotel during the stay - everything totally faultless and such friendly staff.  It was my birthday when we were there and the hotel sent up complimentary sweet treats and a bottle of wine what a lovely surprise.  They also sent us an invitation to a free walking tour.  We had the best city break and hope to return again in the future.  Thanks everyone at Hotel Hotel we loved every minute! cons: There was nothing we didn't like everything was wonderful.

I loved it so much I am already planning to book a  return stay. cons: Nothing.

The hotel also gave us a voucher for a free bottle of wine for lunch but we weren't drinking so we did not use it. However they provided filtered water for the room which is so rare and I loved! Overall had a wonderful experience and would return. cons: The shower leaked all over the bathroom which was a bit annoying.

Restaurant food was also lovely - fish of the day tuna tartare were fresh and tasty chocolate Osaka dessert was really amazing. Staff were super friendly and knowledgeable. I liked the breakfast it was a la carte with a small buffet. Soft boiled eggs were a bit raw for my liking and pancakes undercooked but there were plenty of other tasty options. cons:

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText:
pros: The hotel was amazing. Such beautiful and interesting design throughout. I loved so much of it and want one of their bathrooms!

The staff were really friendly but professional. They had super cool uniforms too.

The pool area was something special too with tropical plants and a really jungle-y vibe. It was December and I used the pool as a cold water therapy type swim (it was definitely cold!) which was super nice. 

I couldn't believe how nice the hotel was and it felt such a personal stay - the staff whatsapped me before to check on my requests which was so helpful and attentive! cons: Nothing

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: This is a beautiful intimate boutique hotel where the staff are warm and friendly. I loved the decor the bar area the dining area the rooms and the outdoor green space which included a pool. We had dinner one night at their restaurant ‚ÄòAnimal‚Äô which served delicious food. Also the location of the hotel is central to everything. cons: nothing

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: the location was great and the staff was so good! cons: the facility and the price doesn‚Äôt match my expectations

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText:
pros: WOW! One of the best stays we ever had in a hotel and I could write an essay at how amazing this hotel is. 

Firstly the breakfast was so fulfilling and tasty. We loved the combination of buffet and a la carte which gave us plenty of options to choose from.

Secondly the facilities were excellent. Our superior room was very large and the design was just perfect. The garden of the hotel is absolutely stunning and we couldn‚Äôt stop looking at it!

Thirdly the location was excellent. Everything was nearby and within walking distance. Quiet at night as well.

Last but not least the hotel‚Äôs staff were THE BEST. Due to a planned special occasion I asked the hotel‚Äôs staff for different things which were very specific and probably difficult to do so. However the staff went above and beyond and did absolutely everything to help me out and made our stay unforgettable. We will never forget how much effort they put into it and how perfect they made everything for us.

Special mention to Patricia Leonor Tiago Bruno and Mafalda (apologies if I have forgotten anyone!) they are amazing and so helpful and kind. They deserve the best! 

Thank you Hotel Hotel. Thank you Lisbon! cons: Nothing! It was the best!

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: What an exceptional hotel. Perfectly located to discover Lisbon. Fantastic and genuine staff. They breathe hospitality. Beautiful design hotel and what a patio! The restaurant is really an added value. Refined and delicious enjoyment. Highly recommended. cons:

hotelName: Hotel Hotel - Member of Design Hotels
reviewText: pros: We stayed at Hotel Hotel (HH) for 3 nights. The location is great being set just outside of the city centre. A leisurely 7 minute stroll in any direction will get you close to different monuments tour bus attractions and fine restaurants bars and shops. The staff at HH could not be more accommodating and are a very kind group of individuals. They are happy to share city secrets with you and get you to where you‚Äôd like to go. The complimentary breakfast each morning had a little something for everyone and HHs terrace provides a calm setting with hundreds of plants and a divine swimming pool for guests to enjoy. We have purposefully left out certain sites on our trip to warrant another trip back to Lisbon and another stay with HH. cons:

reviewText:
pros: The level of service was outstanding from the moment we stepped in to the time we left. All of the staff were so friendly and helpful with particularly great recommendations for wine at the bar and places to eat in the evenings. Location was great and the pool and outside area was a welcome calm in such a buzzy city. 

Hotel Hotel was spotless throughout and it felt luxurious. Interesting artwork throughout the space and the living wall in the gardens was gorgeous. Its the small careful touches that set the property apart from other hotels I have stayed at. 

Little luxuries throughout the stay made us feel so welcome. No request was too small which is a special feeling. Wi-Fi was great throughout the building including our room on the top floor. Breakfast was amazing with the food delicious and so fresh. Mimosa is a very nice touch. cons: Nothing - it was all great !

pros: Sometimes 10 is not enough :)
When the location turns out to be the best that can be expected when the room looks even better in reality than in the pictures when the breakfast is varied so delicious and generously served when the service exceeds all expectations and beyond and when the service manager - Pedro conduct over all of these and he does it with sensitivity a smile and endless patience  you feel that this wonderful place must be rated above the possible 10. cons:
pros: The location is excellent and the selection of food. cons: nothing
pros: Very nice and plentiful breakfast. The staff were very helpful and instantly catered to our special needs. Hotel perfectly situated in the middle of everything but still a quiet location. cons:

pros: The hotel is located in the best part of Lisbon to easily see all the wonderful sights. Trolley and bus right outside the door. Next to the central squares with shopping food and entertainment. The hotel is very luxurious- down to the bedding. I found it to be a reasonably priced unbelievable experience! Do eat dinner in their restaurant- it is the best in town. cons: You will find this to be the case with all the hotels downtown- the taxis cannot drop you off in front of the hotel so you may need to carry in your bags. It helps a lot if you ask the driver to let you off behind the hotel- the cobblestone streets are in smoother condition and it will be closer.
pros: Great location Excellent breakfast and friendly staff. The bar was great for cocktails and the food was really good when we are there. cons:

pros: I was visiting for business and the location couldn‚Äôt have been better. The hotel is situated on a quiet street with tram tracks so it's peaceful and free from the hustle and bustle of tourists. Yet it‚Äôs just a short walk from all the major attractions and central points in the city. Perfect balance!
The service at the hotel was exceptional. From check-in to check-out the staff was impeccable always ready to help with anything big or small.
As for the breakfast‚Äîluxury! The spread is worth every penny. All the ingredients are top-quality. Fresh fruits like kiwi oranges pineapple melon and papaya are on offer and the cold appetizers include fresh salmon and other premium selections. It‚Äôs a perfect start to the day.
Now the room: in my standard room I had two large windows and a high ceiling (around 3.5 meters) which made the space feel vast and airy. The bed was enormous‚Äîtruly a King-size‚Äîand the mattress was incredibly comfortable. Every detail was carefully thought out from the daily supply of complimentary water to the in-room coffee machine with pods. I have long hair and I usually bring my own shampoo and conditioner when I travel but the products here were from a renowned French brand‚Äîtop quality so I didn‚Äôt need to use my own. The bathroom amenities were all excellent.
The room also offered ample space to work. I set up my laptop by the window enjoying coffee in a comfortable chair‚Äîperfect for the times I needed to catch up on work.
The hotel‚Äôs restaurant Sebastiao deserves special mention. Don‚Äôt even bother looking for alternatives! In Lisbon‚Äôs city center there are always people trying to lure you into restaurants with promises of great deals but I can‚Äôt imagine a better dining experience than at Sebastiao. The food is a delightful blend of traditional Portuguese dishes and fusion cuisine all made with exceptional quality ingredients. Plus there‚Äôs l jazz music to set the mood making it a great spot for a business dinner!!! cons:
pros: Well presented. Staff courteous and helpful. Good location. Very clean. Taxis trams excellent eateries (4 times at Taberna da Baixa) nearby. cons: Nothing

pros: The front desk personel were amazing.  Our room was clean and comfortable.  The location could not have been better!  There was a large selection for breakfast the food was delicious. cons: The young men who worked the hotel bar during the day and early eavening were not very friendly.  They talked amongst themselves and seemed bothered when asked for ice or to order food or drink.  We visited on three different occasions so it was not a one time thing.  One evening we asked for ice in our icebucket and they would only give us a glass of ice.  The next night my husband asked the front desk and they had them fill the bucket for us.

pros: The location was central which was great for sightseeing. Our room was lovely and the extra touches were appreciated. Great choice for breakfast. cons: Noise from the road and building site opposite meant we couldn‚Äôt leave a window open.

pros: Absolutely the best hotel experience ever! The location was perfect right in the heart of everything making it easy to explore the city. The room was spacious immaculately clean and had all the comforts needed for a relaxing stay. The breakfast was a highlight ‚Äì fresh delicious and with a great variety to start each day perfectly. Would definitely recommend! The staff went above and beyond ‚Äì they were incredibly friendly and attentive. They even thoughtfully packed a breakfast for us since our flight was early which made a huge difference. This hotel truly exceeded our expectations in every way! cons:

pros:  cons: we did not like the mattress it was soft we prefer hard mattress

pros: Staff service location breakfast bed facilities.

pros: Staff is AMAZING! So fluent and planned great outings. Gave EXCELLENT advice on what to see and do. cons:

pros: Everything's perfect. The service room location and everything provided in Hotel da Baixa are exceptional. So there's nothing we dont like about the service provided by Hotel da Baixa.

pros: Great location.  Lovely breakfast.  Wonderful staff. Clean rooms and great amenities.   I was surprised it wasn‚Äôt a five star hotel.  Fabulous boutique hotel. cons: Nothing!  Everything was fantastic!
pros: Excellent cons:
pros: The staff are absolutely amazing! They will make the trip to Lisbon even better! The location is also fantastic! cons:

pros: Great location. Staff was great and very accommodating to our needs. Only issue we had was there was a band playing at the hotel bar one evening right below our room which was very loud as well as made our room tremble because of the bass. We couldn‚Äôt sleep at all and had to complain a few times before they finally
stopped. The staff was great and ended up changing our room to a higher floor. I recommend if you make a reservation make sure it‚Äôs not on the first floor or above their bar. Otherwise everything was great at the hotel!! cons: They shouldn‚Äôt have a band playing so loud right below the rooms. It made it impossible to sleep on the first floor as the music bass made our room tremble.
Keep in mind there isn‚Äôt direct access to the hotel with a car street is closed to vehicles. You have to walk approx 100 meters to get to the hotel. The staff can meet you to help with luggage so don‚Äôt forget to check with them. Staff was great!!!!!
pros: Friendly staff great location and excellent breakfast cons: No gym

pros: The staff was very friendly always went above and beyond to make our stay feel like home! cons: The breakfast was wonderful! Every night they would suggest and make reservations to delicious restaurants.

pros: Beautiful rooms! Clean. They gave us a free upgrade and a beautiful bottle of rose to welcome us! (:
Staff were super helpful with boooking tours and trips around Lisbon too. Speak fluent English. responsive over email too. cons: Street in front of the hotel is closed to traffic! Need to walk a bit with luggage to take taxis and to get to the hotel from drop offs. Hotel staff helped us with our bags though!
pros: Great location and service cons:

pros: Pure perfection. Warm cozy and comfortable amenities. The breakfast each morning was delicious and had so many options. The staff was attentive extremely friendly and welcoming. We were celebrating our honeymoon and they even upgraded our room and provided us with a bottle of champagne. Sad to leave this place. A home away from home. cons:
pros: Perfect location in Baixa. Very clean and spacious hotel. Friendly staff who spoke English well. Pedro the manager was a delight. The included breakfast was very good as was the bar. cons:

pros: Lovely stylish hotel in a wonderful proximity to many attractions; the staff were always welcoming. We enjoyed the bar and the restaurant. The breakfast buffet had a delicious selection ! cons: There were some blue lights on the light switches next to the bed that we couldn't turn off which was a bit distracting at first.
pros: Everything but Pedro the Guest Manager was excellentüíØ cons:
pros: Great locationthe room was very clean and comfortablebig shower.nice breakfast cons:

pros: Very comfortable bed and room cool air conditioning quiet room fantastic staff fast check-in helpful checkout (printed my boarding pass made change). Very clean; good selection of TV channels; snacks on check-in endless supply of bottled water in the heat....just seemed to anticipate everything you would love to find in a hotel. cons: The location was good for walking to various forms of transportation - Metro the trams - and for hiking to spots like the castle. Lisbon's attractions are spread out rather than concentrated in one area. The area is primarily a touristy district with restaurants and souvenir shops (some very nice some tacky). It would have been helpful to have a market close by such as a Carrefours or anywhere to buy some fruit or nuts. Not everyone likes to eat out for a full meal at every time of the day. If I go back to Lisbon soon I might want to stay in a more "real life" Lisbon district to get a better sense of the city's Portuguese (non-tourist) life. Or I might stay at this fantastic hotel and make day trips into other neighborhoods to explore.

pros: Beautiful rooms and best location from which everything is easily accessible either by foot or tram (first stop just outisde). The manager was amazing - gave us free tour of Lisbon and helped with everything we needed. cons: Breakfast choices could be a bit better to accomodate healthy eating but there was lots of choice already.
pros: Brilliant location fantastic amenities and amazing staff. cons:

pros: very helpful and professional staffs especially the staff who helped my husband carry our luggages blocks away from the lobby ( street closed)  His name is Nadeem ( He worked in Dubai in hotels too) cons: Lobby is close to vehicles
pros: Great location & beautiful rooms. cons: The entry door to our 2 room suite wouldn‚Äôt lock properly & could just be pushed open
pros: Excellent Location within walking distance to shops  restaurants and places of interest with easy access to cruise ship terminal and foreshore. cons:
pros: Location. cons: A bit pricey.

pros: Location was perfect. Traveling with 2 teens we booked a family room it was perfect! Rooms were spacious and clean. Breakfast was amazing! Great omelet station. Staff was very helpful booking excursions and giving suggestions. cons:

pros: Wonderful people at the front desk.  Very good breakfast room.  Hotel room handled 2 parents and adult son very nicely.  Once we figured out the best place to catch taxi/Uber - location was great!  Right off a lively square. cons: Because hotel is on a pedestrian street little bit difficult to get luggage either up the hill or across to the square.  Hotel was very helpful in providing cart and extra muscle to get us there.
pros: Location staff service tidiness of room breakfast are very good. Highly recommend. cons: My premium room a bit dark at night not enough ceilings lights.
pros: Staff rooms bar cons:

pros: Location was incredible right in the middle of the main "tourist" area (which is fabulous if this is your first time in Lisbon or if that area is where you would like to be). Breakfast Buffet was lovely staff were great complimentary mini bar was such a lovely gesture. I could go on.... cons: Warning the hotel is on a road without cars allowed so you get dropped off by the taxi on the parallel road and have to wheel your bags... probably not ideal for an elderly person or someone with massive bags. Also top tip get an Uber or Bolt the taxi's from airport were crazy expensive 30 euros vs 12 euros
pros: The staff was very considerate and helpful. The room was immaculate and very comfortable cons: Nothing

pros: The Location is perfect close to most of the attractions.
The hotel is luxurious clean and cozy 
The staff are very nice helpful and friendly 
The front desk staff helped with valet parking directions luggage and restaurant reservations 
The staff at breakfast and dinner were wonderful 
The manager Pedro took care of every detail 
Welcomes us to hotel to breakfast buffet gave us a complimentary walking tour in the neighborhood 
The food was delicious cons: The street where the hotel is located is a pedestrian only street but the staff helped with valet parking in a garage close by and helped with luggage so no big deal
pros: Everything was excellent. The staff were beyond helpful and obliging to every request. cons: That we stayed longer!

pros: Price/quality ratio was perfect - the breakfast was superior to many much more expensive hotels. Room was spacious and one of the most quietest I‚Äôve ever been to despite we were on the street side. cons: Bathroom door was a bit swollen due to vapor and moisture but if that was the only thing the Da Baixa has done a marvellous job.
pros: everything was great! cons:
pros: Great location for walking to all the sights.  Hotel was clean food was good and staff was very helpful and friendly. cons:
pros: Rooms were amazing we received a free upgrade and loved the space cons: Breakfast and food in restaurant could be better
pros: We had an amazing stay here. The staff were very friendly and helpful. The hotel was very comfortable and updated. The breakfast buffet included an omelette and waffle station. cons: Nothing

pros: Beautiful clean boutique hotel in the middle of Lisbon. It was amazing. Staff was fabulous. Wonderful breakfast every morning. They went out of their way to make our trip fantastic cons: Nothing.

pros: Super comfortable place to stay in terms of facility location and especially helpfulness and friendliness of staff.  We felt truly welcomed and ‚Äúat home‚Äù.  Restaurant and bar were very nice (had daily breakfast and a wonderful dinner after a long day of sightseeing). cons: na
pros: Great location and nice service cons:
pros: Personal friendly service cons: Nothing
pros: Perfect location perfect hotel perfect people perfect breakfast cons: Nothing

pros: Great breakfast; nice clean rooms; friendly and helpful front desk - helped me figure out tram to Bel√©m and even pulled up google maps street view so I could see exactly where to catch the tram; nice and friendly bar for an evening nightcap; great location especially for a solo traveler centrally located and easy walk to tourist sites other neighborhoods and restaurants; nice coffee shops just around the corner.  Highly recommend this hotel for a stay in Lisbon. cons: Nothing!

pros: The rooms were clean very comfortable and the staff was amazing. They went over and beyond to help make our stay enjoyable. I highly recommend this hotel for anyone visiting downtown Lisboa. The service was exceptional as well. Would definitely send a friend there.¬†Every staff member I encountered from the restaurants staff to check-in  to the cleaning staff were delightful and eager to help! Thank you! Will recommend to my colleagues! cons: Nothing at all

pros: This hotel was exceptional and we enjoyed our stay so much. It was in a really great location near to all the main shops restaurants attractions and subway. The service was fab and we really appreciated the complimentary bottled water available each day. The hotel also offers a complimentary 1.5-2hr city tour which we really enjoyed and recommend. Pedro was so informative and gave a history insight we wouldn't have known about otherwise. The rooms were lovely and clean where we also received complimentary fizz on arrival and mini port in the evening. This hotel really gives the extra little touches for their guests I have not seen before. Thank you for a great experience! cons: Nothing it was fab. We missed breakfast on the 2nd day as service is from 7am and had flights to catch but we wouldnt have wanted to eat earlier anyway.

pros: Absolutely beautiful clean and quiet rooms with great amenities. Staff were generous and knowledgeable. Perfect location within walking distance to areas like Alfama Bario Alto and other sights. Easy walking distance the main tram and bus routes. I would absolutely stay here again. cons:

pros: Room was clean
Hotel was in the city center cons:
pros: We love the hotel and location. Hotel is in the heart of the Lisbon and all the attractions. We loved the Hotel cons: Nothing

pros: They greeted us warmly we had been there just three days prior and that made check in that much easier. Champagne waited for us in the room. We had one of the family style suites. Location can‚Äôt be beat. Came back for the espresso martini at the bar. cons: Nothing to say here.

pros: We had a lovely time here. The location was PERFECT. The staff were wonderful. Sebastian at the front desk was lovely and helped us check in early. We enjoyed their breakfast every day- great variety and convenient. The espresso martini at the hotel bar is the best I‚Äôve had. The rooms were wonderful and coffee and waters were available for guests in the lobby - super convenient. cons: Nothing to say here!

pros: We were on a sisters trip to Lisbon where we had the most amazing time  and our hotel made the trip even more special. The lovely staff at the hotel were very attentive. We reached way before check in time so our room wasn't ready. Instead of asking us to just drop our suitcases and come back we were offered complimentary welcome drinks at the lovely bar and ended up with a room upgrade as well. Melanie and everyone at reception were super helpful. The breakfast was perfect and not rushed. The rooms and bathrooms were so much more spacious and comfortable than we had expected of a city hotel. Everything was thought of -robes and slippers rain showers even hair straightening irons in the room. And the location is absolutely perfect..we walked everywhere! 

I would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Lisbon and I'm sure we will be back... cons:
pros: Brilliant hotel.  Loved it all!   Breakfast amazing room beautiful. cons: Nothing

pros: We stayed at the beginning of our trip and enjoyed it so much we returned to stay again at the end. The front desk staff (especially Melanie and Martha) provided 5 star service exceeding our expectations and making sure our stay was enjoyable. Breakfast buffet was delicious with a ton of variety and the morning restaurant staff were courteous and kind. The rooms are exceptionally clean the beds are comfortable and the bathrooms are spacious with great water pressure. We switched rooms at one point (thanks again to Melanie for arranging it while we toured the city) and my wife left an AirPod behind. The housekeeping staff found it set it aside and labeled it so the front desk staff could easily locate it later - which made our return flight much more enjoyable. It‚Äôs centrally located near a metro station and the train station easy walking distance to tons of sights and restaurants. Cabs are easy to find at Pra√ßa de Figueira and the airport transfer service the hotel offers is quick and convenient. End to end just a great experience. Highly recommend. cons: Nothing.
pros: Very current and well maintained cons: No issues

pros: The central location of the hotel is a plus and also the staff is very helpful and friendly. Rooms are rather small but very comfy. cons: Apart from the fact that the hotel has no spa or swimming pool nothing left for a bad review

pros: Staff were amazing. They helped book trips and gave us advice.
