I forgot a eu plug and they had one. 
Comp custard tarts coffee and water in the lobby. 
Beautiful decor and beautiful food in restaurant. 
Great location and beautiful rooms. cons: Absolutely nothing. 
I can‚Äôt find any fault 
The only thing to be aware of is the hotel is on a no through road so you can‚Äôt get a cab from right outside the door but it‚Äôs such a good location and taxi and main area is about 100 yards away. Great location
pros: Location staff and restaurant cons:

pros: Great location one street over from main restaurant/bar area and two blocks from main square.  Lovely hotel with good restaurant and bar. Fantastic staff who are warm and knowledgeable.  Rooms are first rate stocked minibar is free).  One of the favorite places I have stayed.  Glad we found it in 2010 and won‚Äôt stay anywhere else while in Lisbon. cons: Nothing
pros: Breakfast was amazing...the staff exceptionally friendly and location was perfect. This was our second time at Baixa and will be returning again. cons:

For that reason we  have every intention of staying  at the Baixa on our next visit to Lisbon.

pros: The rooms were newly renovated and were beautiful. Good lighting electric blinds  plenty of sockets and usb points and hair straighteners ‚Ä¶ cons: Nothing

pros: Great location nice breakfast and really good management that knows the value of going beyond expectations in service business. Nothing feels cheap and they pay attention to details. One of the best hotel experiences lately :) cons:

pros: Sweet place! Most appreciated was the (surprisingly) sizable & comfortable bed as well as the quiet room. Great water pressure & hot water for showering. Loved being able to open the windows. We enjoyed the breakfast offerings & could easily find something of interest each day despite not changing much. Endless readily available bottled water was amazing. Staff was friendly & accommodating with any requests. With the rain during our stay the umbrella in the room was a nice touch. Location felt safe was convenient to area sites & easy to arrange transportation to & from. cons:
pros: The staff were welcoming friendly &  helpful. The hotel is in a great location central to most attractions & approx 25 minutes on metro from the airport. cons:

pros: Very attentive and friendly personal cons:

pros: Everything!!!

The hotel was beautiful clean and I felt safe. cons:

pros: The building was impressive both old and new elements were used for decoration. The staff members were very friendly and helpful. They upgraded our room during the check in and we really enjoyed the luxury of the room. The bed was huge and comfortable. We ordered room service and it was not bad either. The food was cold but at least tasty. cons: It‚Äôs not the properties fault but the neighbourhood didn‚Äôt feel safe during the night. At least 15 different guys physically blocked our way and aggressively tried to sell us hard dr*gs while we were trying to get to the hotel during the evening (between 19-22:00) not 2:00 in the morning. I don‚Äôt recommend to solo travelers or women travelers.
Additionally the cleanliness of the room was not perfect. There were a lot of strangers hair around especially in the shower.
pros: Thank you so much for everythingüôèWe will definitely recommend to our friends who want to visit Lisbon and hopefully we will come again cons:
pros: Great location modern hotel excellent choice of breakfst cons:

pros: The hotel was in a great location and the room was lovely and spotless. We ate in the restaurant on the 1st night and it was fantastic. Most of all the staff were warm and very helpful we had a great stay. cons: Nothing it was great. As I'm a lazy traveller we did absolutely no planning before we got there. It would have been great to have a short guide for 24/48 hours in Lisbon - what to see where to go where to eat. We couldn't work out how to use the trams so we just got ubers which worked fine. That said one of the hostesses gave us this information on a piece of paper and we had a great time.

pros: Clean beautiful and friendly. Great location. cons: Loved it

pros: Gorgeous building. Right in the centre and close to the metro.
The room was gorgeous I loved the little extras like the coffee machine and hair straighteners.
The reception staff are so welcoming I even got a beautiful birthday doughnut üç© delivered to our room.
The restaurant again have amazing staff who are friendly and attentive without being intrusive.

pros: Lovely place and staff cons:

pros: This hotel offers hair straightener which was a big surprise for me. Other equipments are also great and practical: Blue tooth speakers usb plug holes eclectic curtains etc. This hotel pays attention to details! cons: Room could be slightly warmer in Jan.

pros: Great hotel in the very heart of the city. This was not the only hotel during our stay but among comparable hotels in terms of its offer it definitely stands out as a big plus. Silence the air conditioning system also works quietly in comparison to the others. The ranks of the hotel is definitely deserved. Certainly we will visit it again. Undoubtedly Lisbon is a place you must come back to. cons:
pros: Location room and staff- very friendly staff especially Sebastian at the front desk. cons:
pros: Great location room breakfast and value.  But great stay overall.  Highly recommend! cons: 3 people at the front desk a bit dis-organized some don't have the most pleasant smiling for that job

pros: Staff super helpful very clean rooms great location good breakfast cons: Noisy at night pillows not great

Breakfast was a big win! They had all sorts from stuff for people who‚Äôre into health foods to local dishes that were really tasty. And the people working there? They were super friendly and quick to help out which was awesome. cons: Okay so one thing that was a bit of a downer was the Wi-Fi. It kept dropping out in my room which was kinda annoying especially when I needed to check my emails or browse a bit.

pros: Excellent location room clean and a very charming hotel cons: nothing
pros: We had a wonderful time at this hotel. The location was perfect and we were able to easily walk to the main attractions in Lisbon. The staff were friendly and accommodating. cons:

pros: Great location fabulous and helpful desk staff very clean  well organized beautifully decorated comfortable rooms. Dinner wines were tasty. cons: Adequate breakfasts dinners were uninteresting service was uneven. A beef dish was served as medium rare when well done was ordered.
pros: Staff exceeded my expectations cons: Room could have been a little more spacious
pros: I loved everything about this property. It had fantastic service comfortable beds and a great location! The rooms were nicely sized and I even got upgraded! cons: Nothing

pros: Comfy beds friendly staff free minibar really good breakfast and coffee cons: Shower wasn't super clean and the waterfall setting didn't work. AC kept turning off had to call reception to get it reset.
pros:  cons: Bathrooms are a bit small if you have little babies but as long as you shower with them you ll be fine.
pros: Great location friendly staff and comfortable rooms cons: Air conditioner controls kept being reset but a call to reception and they were able to fix on their end.

pros: I loved everything about the property. The breakfast was fantastic every morning the service was top notch and the rooms were very comfortable. I also can‚Äôt say enough about the location. Walking distance to many many things and if not walking distance very close to public transport. cons: Nothing! Loved it all.

pros: Many nice healthy choices for breakfast was available. Location was on a street in Baixa with some construction but more quiet and less trafic than other street. Very safe. cons: Rooms are small not sure if you can do anything about it but very nice setting
pros: Staff and hotel were great. cons: Street is a little loud if you‚Äôre on a lower floor.

pros: Great property.  Excellent facility staff and accommodations.  Recently renovated Room and bathroom was perfect.  Staff was attentive and helpful.  Food was some of the bet we had with a nice blend of Portuguese & Europeans.   Cocktail lounge was intimate with nightly music.  Location was in heart of old city 5 min from harbor. 
Highly recommend cons: Perfect just the way it is
pros: Everything especially the reception staff were very welcoming and helpful at all times cons:

pros: The hotel is very centric on the old town of the city. Accessible to public transport restaurants gift shops museums and stores. 
The hotel was very clean. We stayed here for 3 days and every time we go back to our hotel it's like we have checkin the first time. The staff are very nice cheerful and helpful. We also got an upgrade in our booking. Breakfast is also good. They also have a bar with live music. cons:

pros: Extended our stay in Lisbon with two more days so had to find a hotel that was available. Hotel Baixa was available so booked last minute. Staff was GREAT.. we checked in early so they stored our luggage and upgraded our room. Great value cons:

pros: Hotel was lovely and staff very friendly and helpful.  Center city location was perfect for sightseeing and shopping. cons: Breakfast buffet could have served eggs made to order.

The room was very nice comfortable the size was good enough. All the equipments were new  high tech. The showers were good wifi was good  breakfast is really good with champagne every morning üòä cons: The location is very central but it was still quite while we are staying because the main street was closed due to an infrastructure construction so i am not sure how will it be if the street was open to traffic. It is sth to consider if you are looking for a peaceful  quits time at your hotel.

pros: Excellent staff and location. We were graciously upgraded to a beautiful room upon arrival by wonderful staff that made sure we had details about food and things to do/see. They also made sure our airport transport was confirmed and timely. Would definitely recommend a stay here! cons:

pros: Excellent location & guest room facilities 10 out of 10. Breakfast very good. Live music in the bar is a bonus. cons: Staff are a little moody.

pros: Location great. Near all of the sights . Staff was the best! Breakfast was wonderful . They have a bar on site and restaurant . Everything just wonderful. Rooms beautiful and comfortable. Rain shower very luxurious. No complaints! cons: Nothing

pros: Location close to the water. Super clean. Beds were super comfortable with a mattress topper so you can sleep like a baby. Room is small but the closet space makes it easier to store your items. Complimentary drinks in the fridge. staff was very accommodating and spoke English. I would stay here again. cons: street was closed due to construction which is temporary so we had to walk with our luggage 2 blocks to catch Uber.
pros: I really liked the decor of the room and the bathroom and the bedroom was a good size.  Breakfast was really good. cons: A bit of noise in the street but it usually stopped after midnight.

pros: Friendly staff
Amazing service
Located in the City Center
Close to the train station
Hair Iron / straightener is available in the room :) cons: Nothing

pros: We really loved the central location very helpful staff comfortable beds fabulous power shower and all the little extra touches in the room - free mineral water and soft drinks etc. cons: A small detail as a tea drinker I would really appreciate a kettle in the room. The hot water from nespresso coffee machines always tastes of coffee.

pros: Fantastic location in the heart of Lisbon. 
The staff were very accommodating and friendly.
Rooms were spacious and recently renovated.
We enjoyed the al fresco breakfast on the pedestrian street. cons: Lack of parking was a bit of a problem but the doorman arranged for drop-off and pickup
Would have really liked it if there had been a small gym for a bit of exercise.

pros: It was nice to stay here. the location is great. you can access all the city centre easily also transportation too. customer services has been very nice and kind. they inform us everything before check in. thank you all :) cons:
pros: Fantastic location super friendly staff who went out of their way to direct us to find parking even came with us so they could bring all our luggage back!! cons:
pros: Super clean friendly staff fantastic locations  cons: Nothing to even mention everything was awesome

pros: Luxurious classic decor with a modern twist - greeted by exceptionally friendly staff with all sorts of gifts including the Portuguese nata pastries - impeccably clean hotel - upgraded to an impressive sizable deluxe rooms with street views.  The breakfast buffet with sparkling wine was a pleasant and abundant way to start the day. cons: Would love to have a shaving shelf added to the shower.  Took the stairs (beautiful staircase) when elevator was crowded.

pros: Excellent location in the heart of old town; very friendly hotel staffs; very nice hotel design and facilities cons: Shower tap user guide is a bit misleading which shows turn left is cold water and right is hot  but actually is opposite; the shower head needs to be descaled

pros: The customer service was wonderful and we were always treated nicely. The breakfast was nice. The location is great! Easy access to all the historical attractions and also transportation. They contacted us before our flight and asked if we needed transport from the airport and they arranged that for us. Our driver was very kind. I would come back to this hotel! cons: Nothing to report

pros: Location is great and breakfast was really good each morning.  Staff were all courteous and helpful.  The room was clean and was a good size and I really liked the shower. cons: The street noise normally stays loud until a little after midnight so if you prefer an early bedtime you may want to bring a fan or some earplugs.

pros: We stayed at the hotel twice once when we arrived in Lisbon and again before heading home at the end of our trip.  The staff was extremely helpful and very service oriented.  The rooms were comfortable and the location was perfect.  I left a book at the hotel and when we returned for the second leg of our trip I told the receptionist about it.  I assumed I wouldn't find it waiting for me but sure enough the receptionist gave me the book upon arrival.  That has never happened to me anywhere else!  We requested a late check out and they gave us a discounted price for an extra room. Everything was wonderful and we highly recommend this hotel. cons: There could have been more gluten free options for breakfast.  Some of the rooms face other buildings that are a bit run down.
pros: Beautiful hotel. Staff were very friendly. cons: Nothing
pros: Good location comfortable room good breakfast cons: Windows of my room faced the wall and other windows in a couple of meters
pros: Perfect location- walking distance to the best of Lisbon. cons:
pros: Such a lovely boutique hotel super nice friendly staff cons:
pros: Location and services cons: Nothing
pros: Staff was fantastic - they made us feel like VIPs and the location couldn't be better. Best experience of many hotels on our trip. cons:
pros: Whats not to like  its a beautiful hotel in a great location ( a little difficult to find ) cons: That we couldnt stay longer

pros: Charming hotel staff was so friendly and the room was small but very comfortable. Bathroom was a really nice size. The restaurant in the hotel was very good and the bar was a great place to lounge and grab a drink. cons:
pros: Really convenient location close to main square in the heart of the Old Town incredibly helpful staff beautiful room - very comfortable  and a good breakfast. cons: nothing to dislike

pros: perfection location the best thing however about the hotel is the staff. beyond helpful and supportive extremely courteous and caring. the hotel is fairly generous with beverages minibar water bottles nespresso coffee etc. very good breakfast spread cons:

good breakfast
staff excellent cons:

pros: We checked some info before we made the reservation and saw that the hotel really has very high service quality. Not only the building itself is a very nice old building and all the small details on the decorations make it better. The staff was perfect really..Our boy-9 years old-was telling us the last day ' when we are going to come again ? cons: I don't want to offend the bartender but more interest could be added on the cocktail menu and preps..he was very positive on the other hand..

pros: Staff at the reception is super excellent cons: We ordered 2 equal rooms but it was very different rooms for the same price. One room was big and another was very small. Breakfast is not bad staff is very good. Small glasses for juice (like in low cost hotels) no fried eggs.

pros: Staff was lovely.  Always superceded our expectations.  Flowers and Champagne in our room was lovely after a long trip from Las Vegas.  Room was upgraded.  Very comfortable rooms.  Breakfast was great! cons: Nothing-except street out front is under construction so taxi's were a walk to get to.  Not the hotels issue.

pros: They gave us free UPGRADE!!! We had booked classic room with no breakfast. They offered us upgrade with free breakfast free minibar and a bottle of wine as a surprise in our room!!! 
This was the best stay we ever had. Location is amazing. It can not be better than this. 
Centrally located and still very quite place. Rooms are soundproof. 
After checkout we sat in lobby for few hours and there was an option to read books have coffee/juice/snacks. It was simply AMAZING!! cons: Absolutely nothing!

pros: The hotel staff was very pleasant friendly and accommodating from the minute we arrived. Our bags were held and delivered to our room while we were out exploring. Hotel and rooms were clean. Food was great. cons: Nothing to comment
pros: Location very good and cleanness of the hotel cons: Breakfast was very good but need to change everyday and don't put same thing every day

pros: The staff was amazing and helped us with all requests! cons: Breakfast was not overwhelming.

pros: The hotel was excellent in every way: the room was comfortable the location was perfect and the staff incredible. Every single person was so nice. I would not ever stay anywhere else in Lisbon. cons: Nothing.

pros: position of the hotel is perfect. near every attraction of lisbon 
the rooms was clean and a good breakfast.
staff of the hotel very helpful. cons:

pros: Booked the hotel at incredibly short notice and was able to check-in a mere five minutes after booking it. Received a welcome drink of our choosing upon arrival also.

Room is of a very modern design and hotel is located in a perfect location to explore Lisbon. cons: N/A.
pros: Friendly staff great location and very clean. cons:

pros: Location was fantastic and very centrally located. cons: Nothing
pros: Great location and beautiful decor cons: the food at the restaurant

pros: The hotel was a nice surprise. The staff was lovely and helpful. Our room was upgraded to a better room with a view of the street. It was large and airy and quite comfortable. The location in the Baixa area is in the middle of lots of restaurants and shops. There were snacks available in the lobby in the afternoon and a couple of tarts waiting in our room as well. Breakfast was a nice buffet full of choices. The staff went out of their way to be helpful one gentleman even carried our heavy bags to the parking garage a block away. cons: The parking situation isn‚Äôt the best but that is not the hotel‚Äôs fault- the street is currently closed for repairs so if you have a car you must park a block or so away but the hotel did offer to come to the garage to help with bags which is amazing.

pros: The best place to go if you wanna visit Lissabon. It's great located in the middle of town and you can walk from there everywhere. Coming from the airport you take the metro and jump of at the station "Rossio" whoch is two minutes by foot away from the hotel. The hotel is just amazing! We are a couple and we often go to 4 or 5 star hotels and this is one of the top hotels in our opinion. They are outstanding nice it's clean and super pretty. I told them upfront that it is my birthday and they surprised me with a cake in my room. At the check-in they offered us water juice beer...whatever you like. I can't imagine a better place to stay if you wanna visit Lissabon. cons: It was perfect!
pros: location & friendly helpful staff cons: bathroom abit small for us.

pros: I travel a lot for work and this was one of best hotel experiences I‚Äôve had in recent years! Everybody‚Äôs so friendly and tries to make your stay as enjoyable as possible! Obrigado! cons:
pros: beautifully designed perfectly located in the very center of Lisbon very nice and extraordinary service. We even received an "Easter-Cake" as a surprise. Enjoyed the breakfast a lot! cons:

pros: The staff at this hotel were thoughtful and kind. This was my 12 year old son's first trip abroad and they warmly embraced him and made him feel as though he was among family. This anecdote is emblematic of how wonderful this hotel it's staff and generally speaking the people of Portugal are. Thank you to the entire crew at the Hotel da Baixa obrigado por tudu!! cons:
pros: Perfect cons:

pros: Excellent location in the heart of Lisbon very professional staff and great buffet breakfast included in room rate. cons:
pros: Everyone was very helpful. Great breakfasts with attentive staff. Great location. Would love to return. cons: Nothing.

pros: This is a class hotel. Everything about it exudes elagence. A really great hotel. cons: There was nothing not to like

pros: Staff is very friendly and helpful location is excellent and rooms are very clean. They offered us brakefast (that wasn't included in our reservation) and gave us our room before check in time so we were able to rest after a long flight...We really enjoyed our stay at the hotel cons: The "cool" function in the A/C was centraly controlled by the staff (it was off) so i got hot the first night...I called front desk and they fix it right away. pros: The hotel is conveniently located close to shops restaurants and tourist attractions. You can walk to almost everything from the hotel and very close to a Metro stop. The beds are comfortable and the bathroom is spacious. cons: The shower in the bathroom was non-functioning and nobody could fix it on our first night and had to wait the following morning. They were very apologetic and took out one night from our bill. But it was still a very disappointing experience. Breakfast is available with the accommodations but it was nothing to rave about.
pros: everything was perfect. could not fault. cons: nothing. everything was brilliant certainly go above and beyond for their guests

pros: Amazing hospitality and service. First time I have been offered extras for free and got room already at 11 a.m..
Cozy and friendly atmosphere. Very good breakfast with nice choice. Nice bar with perfect drinks. Big bathroom. cons:

pros: Excellent location close to many of the main sites. The hotel was well appointed with friendly staff. 
The room was nice very clean with a very comfortable bed and pillows. The shower was fabulous - if I could have taken it home I would!  Breakfast had a good range of options. There was coffee in the room - which was nice too. We had a room out to the street and it was generally quiet with a bit of street noise at night with the window open. You can easily reach this hotel by metro from the airport take the red line and then blue to Baixa-Chud and walk down Victoria Rua - 5 minutes to Rua Prata. cons:
pros: location was great cons: room was very small.  with two large luggages there was no room.  had to keep one luggage inside the bathroom.  so verify the room size before booking.
pros: Comfort and cleanliness cons:

pros: Fantastic location near the metro. Hotel is lovely not too big very personable staff. Excellent Wi-fi & facilities.
What makes the hotel is the little extras. Portuguese tarts in your room on arrival welcome note small souvenirs. They restock your mini bar each day bar with free soft drinks & a beer.
Breakfast is till 11am so we went for a morning walk and then took brunch. Wide selection buffet style. I had fruit yogurt and scramble eggs withs smoked salmon each morning.
Rooms are good size big beds comfortable large TV little fridge and a coffee maker. Bathroom was large double sink and a walk-in shower. We had room 111.
Hotel felt very safe and so was the area it was in.
The bar was cosey good value and had entertainment on the Friday night we was there. 
Loads of restaurants nearby. Short walk to many of the Lisbon attractions and shopping area
This is a 4 stat hotel offer 5-star service
We will be back. cons: we had to leave to go home

pros: it has a lovely charm and character 
very clean and great attention to detail cons:

pros: clean great location nice design new great staff at the reception/ front desk cons: unfriendly and unprepared staff at the restaurant especially breakfast!! unorganized regarding plates glasses & co. really unacceptable for a 4 star hotel

pros: Staff very friendly and helpful.  Hotel clean comfortable and modern. Room was excellent! cons:

pros: Very nice and helpful staff. Very good location . Good breakfast. Nice lobby and rooms . Highly recommended cons:

pros: We stayed in four different properties during our trip through Portugal.  They were all fine but this was far and away our favorite hotel of the bunch.  Everything was excellent from the included breakfast buffet to the helpful staff and nicely appointed and tastefully decorated room.  The location is perfect - just a few blocks from Rossio Station Placa Comercial and the Santa Justa Lift.  Tram 28 and the Bus 737 (for the castle) both leave from the square a block or two from the hotel.  Everything could not be more convenient.  Plenty of restaurants in the immediate area too. cons: I usually try to include a few dislikes for the sake of a balanced review but this hotel was truly flawless!

pros: The hotel is fabulous it is in a central location with plenty of shops and restaurants to chooses from. The staff are outstanding friendly cheerful helpful and nothing is too much trouble. The breakfast is excellent with plenty of choice. We were upgraded to a premium room and it was clean spacious and had everything we needed. In addition to the upgrade we were treated to a drink on arrival a bottle of sparkling wine in the room to welcome us and another bottle the next day for my birthday. It was very reasonably priced to eat and drink in the hotel. cons:
pros: The kind of place you want to come back again. cons:

pros: We enjoyed a wonderful two night stay at Hotel da Baixa. We found the hotel clean comfortable and with all the modern amenities yet still plenty of old world charm that the Baixa area is known for. We had breakfast included with our stay and they provided a varied and delicious spread. If you bring your own vehicle valet parking is available at a reasonable price. Last (but certainly not least) I can't say enough about the staff. From the moment we arrived they made us feel like VIPs. cons:

pros: The hotel is situated in a fantastic location and the terrain is flat - unlike a lot of Lisbon! It is very easy to walk to shops cafes restaurants trams and tourist sites. We had an issue with the A/C so the hotel gave us a fan and then moved us to another room. The first room was fabulous and the second not quite as good but it wasnt a downgrade - we had just been very lucky with the first room. This was a small issue though and the staff resolved it very quickly.
The rooms are very comfortable clean modern and a good size for such a great location. The staff are a credit to the hotel as they are helpful friendly and were very attentive to our needs. cons:

pros: We loved our room: the decor is very nice bed is so comfortable bathroom is very spacious with marble tiles and give luxurious feel.   Food is amazing we had the best fruit at breakfast and best salad for late night dinner.   Hotel offers complementary pastries coffee and live music at bar.   Hotel is right at the city center and tourist area but we did not hear
any noise not sure if our room is on the higher floor or good sound proof.    
Excellent front desk special kudos for Diogo Seixas he was very attentive for our early arrival took good care of us and our baggage; we'd like to thank for his superb service. cons: Breakfast is a bit pricey however food is amazing.  Room is on a small scale although we booked for a large double room storage is carefully engineered but the closet is still clamped with bedside table not easy to open; so we
gave up to hang our clothes.   If we stay for more night we may request a room with easier access to closets.

pros: The location is very central - with the exception of riding 28 tram we walked everywhere. 
little touches - courtesy drinks in mini bar and cafe in the lobby with cakes. 
We don‚Äôt usually dine hotel restaurants but we dined twice at Hotel da Baixa in the evening - the food was exceptional! cons: The drinks at the bar are rather pricey ‚Ç¨12 for Aperol Spritz is more expensive than Central London. 
Better maps available for tourists - only the tour bus map was available although the receptionist did print off directions when asked.

pros: The hotel was beautiful inside and out. The staff were very nice. They had free pastries and water at the front as well as expressos. We had not planned to eat breakfast at the hotel but it smelled so good that we ended up getting it the next day and it was very delicious. I think it is a lot cheaper if you book with the rate that includes breakfast rather than getting the breakfast separately so I definitely recommend getting the breakfast with the room when you book. They had champagne with breakfast which is awesome. The bed was very comfy and the AC works well which was a must for us as my husband runs very hot all the time. My husband and I also loved the shower. They give you slippers and robes as well. The location of the hotel was also perfect. We have stayed in other hotels in Lisbon and this one was my personal favorite. Next time we are back in Lisbon we will definitely be staying here! cons: I had no issues. Highly recommend!

pros: The location is perfect: downtown Lisbon. The service is outstanding: I got a birthday cake on my birthday when I ripped a button off my coat they took care of it and they booked a wonderful trip to Sintra for us. Thank you Hotel da Baixa! cons:

pros: Beautifully designed hotel. I shared a room with my 76-year-old mom. But Hotel da Baixa came through with all of the above. Our room also had high ceilings and a lovely sitting room which gave us a sense of space. Not cramped at all. Plus wonderful staff! Highly recommend. cons:

pros: We spent five beautiful relaxing days in Lisbon and our stay at the hotel certainly contributed to that. The rooms were super clean the service was attentive and the hotel's location was great. The rooms were exactly as promised by the photos. It was especially nice that we could check in before 3:00 PM allowing us to relax a bit after an early flight before exploring the city. cons:

pros: I‚Äôm very pleased with my stay at Pestana Rua Augusta in Lisboa! The hotel room is very comfortable and immaculately clean. I greatly appreciated the daily house keeping of the room and bathroom. I originally chose this hotel due to its excellent location to public transportation and city highlights. But what truly stood out to me during my stay is how friendly and welcoming the staff are. They went above and beyond during my stay to ensure my comfort ease of travel and even surprised me with a present in my room for my birthday despite me not mentioning it at all! I can‚Äôt recommend this hotel enough for the most convenience and comfort during your travels to Lisboa. cons: N/A

pros: Staff excellent. Very kind very considerate very professional. Will definitely recommend hotel to others cons: Maybe full free breakfast buffet but not nevessary. No
Complaints
pros: Fantastic location and friendly helpful staff. Great coffee and tarts! cons: Nothing to report
pros: Great location! cons: The bathroom doesn‚Äôt feel so clean.
pros: Location is great the room is nice! cons: a bit expensive
pros: Perfect location!  Best in Lisbon! cons: No breakfast included.
pros: Location staff lovely room and it was quiet. cons: Nothing
pros: Great location close to all attractions but importantly for us quiet in the evenings.  Modern hotel very clean with cool bar and restaurant cons: Nothing
pros: Great hotel with the perfect location for exploring Lisbon. Rooms were really comfortable and quiet considering the hotels location. cons: Iron in the room would have been useful.

pros: The hotel exceeded our expectations. The location is great and very close to almost everything that you need (restaurants tram markets city center beach) the staff was very friendly the room was spacious and comfortable. cons: Nothing that we can think off at this moment.
pros: Great location absolutely stunning hotel! The staff were ver welcoming and friendly. cons:

pros: Excellent location right by the arc. Very central and the perfect location for visitors. Lots of shopping and restaurants nearby and right by the marina for boat tours. Very close to alfama. Wonderful service by the excellent staff who were very helpful when needed. Very clean room and facilities. Would definitely stay here again. cons:

pros: Super central location with friendly and knowledgable staff. The room was a good size with a comfy bed and all the amenities you would want in terms of hanging space safe lighting hair dryer fan as well as AC toiletries etc. A nice bonus was having free choice of anything in the mini bar and the hotel laid out free coffee and Pateis de Natas in the mornings. As two female friend travellers we felt safe and comfortable. cons: Honestly nothing we didn't like :)

pros: Central to everything
Clean cons:

pros: Location location location 
Rooms are cute and comfortable cons: Coffee machine didn‚Äôt work
There is also no way to contact front desk from the room which is frustrating

pros: Best location in town. More central impossible. Beautifully renovated building. Modern cozy cool decoration. All the staff cannot be nicer and helpful. Beautiful spacious room and bathroom. Excellent amenities. Common areas again very comfortable beautifully decorated. Breakfast and Restaurant is really a quite a la carte fusion experience with a cool yet trendy ambience and again excellent staff. Cannot say anything more than thank you Pestana Rua Augusta for taking care of me. cons: Loved everything

pros: Friendly and very helpful staff 24/7 reception exceptionally clean rooms very comfortable beds regular towel change environmentally friendly policy great bar. The location of the hotel is very communicative and the best possible both for tourists and people who are in the city for work. We would come back here when we are in town again. cons: the only slight inconvenience was the lack of a wardrobe in the room
pros: Hotel is in a great location and staff were very efficient and friendly. cons:

pros: Loved all of the staff.  I want to compliment especially Tiago Leonel Sara and Lynkon for their never ending efforts to inform me and guide me to where I need to go (and more importantly how to get there).  They are true delights on both a professional and humane level.  Oh that infectious smile of Lynkon made me want to return very soon.  They are a credit to your company.

I also salute  you on the spotless condition of the room.  It was impeccable all together. cons: I would simply like to make a few suggestions as regards the room.  I think it would be a good idea to install a grab bar and a more "roughed up" surface in the shower floor.  This is especially important for senior citizens (I am 81 years of age).  There really is no way to catch yourself should you slip (I nearly did) in the shower.

My other suggestion regards the esthetic of the "closet and shelves" area.  I thought that copying the same lovely pattern on the wall to a roll up shade would be much more attractive than having to look at your belongings when the area is not in use.  It just looks so disorderly and unattractive.
pros: We had breakfast in Olive once and it was lovely. The only reason we didn't go again was because we wanted to try other places. cons: We can't think of anything we didn't like.

pros: Superb location! Room was very stylish and quite spacious. Highlight was that my husband got a bottle of sparkling wine and cakes for his Birthday without us ordering any (I guess they saw in the passport at check-in). We were so pleasantly surprised! cons: Nothing much to say here. We didn't have food at the hotel so can't comment on that. There is no gym which was a bit annoying but walking the Lisbon hills was a great substitute haha
pros: Really near to everything - good restaurants and the port area cons: No wardrobes

pros: Staff were helpful. Shower itself was very good. Well positioned centrally and easily accessible by metro.  Entrance area was welcoming. Breakfast at the 'sister' hotel was very good cons: Lack of cleanliness in the shower room. It smelled as if the area around the toilet had not been cleaned from previous occupants. Filled out one of their assessments while at the hotel and nobody replied to it
pros: Beautiful staff. Lovely hotel. Great location cons:
pros: The location. cons: A bit difficult to find as there is another Pestana nearby and we went to the wrong one.

pros: The location of the hotel is just perfect! The staff was very kind and the hotel was very clean! One of the best hotels i've been to cons: The beds were hard. Ok for a few days but we stayed 1 week. No reason not to book but it was noticable

pros: Fantastic hotel. Staff were helpful full of information professional. Hotel location was amazing comfortable clean quiet. We would go back and recommend it. cons: Our room window was facing a wall and the only way to see outside was to look up a little opening for a glimpse of the sky or go out of the hotel.
pros: Perfect location room is clean and comfortable cons:
pros: Excellent location cons:

pros: The location was ideal for touring the city. The staff and facilities were very good. cons: If you are light sleeper then you might get slightly disturbed by the distant noise of revellers gathering under the arch in the early hours of the morning.

pros: Very comfortable bedroom. Excellent central position in city.

Nearby hotel Pestana CR7 provided excellent breakfast at 20 Euros each. cons: Breakfast not included in our booking (I thought I had ordered it when booking through Booking.com).
Breakfast not available some days.
Breakfast not available before 09:00.
pros: Superb location. Lovely room. cons: Restaurant limited. I would go for room only excluding breakfast.

pros: Staff were very friendly .
Location superb. cons: Somewhat pricey..breakfast not included.
pros: Breakfast can not choose time cons:
pros: very nice rooms. The location is perfect. cons: there was no breakfast available only you could buy a sandwich or similar products at the adjacent restaurant
pros: Great location cons: Shower very slippy.  Needed either a mat or non-slip shower tray.
pros: Everything was incredible I would absolutely stay here again! cons: Everything was perfect.
pros: Cleanliness and location! cons: N/A
pros: Very accommodating and remembered my birthday! cons: N/a
pros: Everything. cons:

pros: Location is perfect the rooms are confortable and people are very polite. Thank you cons: I m still waiting for your pay back of my deposit about 1200 usd pls let me know why it is not still paid back. Senem Kilic
pros: Perfect location helpful and knowledgeable staff thoughtful room layout cons:
pros: Very well located. Very clean great design and well appointed room and bathroom. Staff was courteous and efficient. cons:
pros: Perfect location. Friendly staff. Room is clean and spacious. cons: Nothing.

pros: Design of the hotel. Very pleasing surroundings 
Calm tasteful. Well thought out cons:
pros: Everyone was nice helpful and accommodating. Friendly engaged staff and feels like they love being there!!! cons:

pros: Location is just amazing right next to the Arch of Lisbon. Walking distance to many attractions. The room was new and great. The heating was excellent. Breakfast was provided at a nearby 5 start hotel of the same group and was really worth the 2 minute walk to get there. Probably was the best breakfast we had in Lisbon. cons: Nothing

pros: I did not have breakfast there. 
Actually I did not know that it was available. cons: Nothing. 
Everything was great! 
Hotel was very clean and the location can‚Äôt be beat.
pros: Great location helpful staff and excellent facilities. cons:

pros: The room was comfortable and we particularly liked the spacious bathroom with plenty of room to place our toiletries -  quite rare!  The hotel was right in the centre of Lisbon and fortunately on a quiet road which is a real bonus. Staff were friendly and helpful. A new cafe attached to the hotel but also available to non-residents provides an excellent light breakfast at to our minds at least a reasonable cost.  We ate there all of our 4 mornings. cons:
pros: Location staff interior cons: late breakfast barely any storage

pros: confortabile and clean accommodation good  location kind staff excellent breakfast served in an associated hotel (Pestana Pousada Lisboa) located at walking distance cons: my room was not very large
pros: Location is amazing. We upgraded to a junior suite and had some much room cons: Nothing

pros: Breakfast is excellent although at a different hotel. However a coffee station is kindly provided in the bar in the mornings. The beds are fabulously comfortable and the shower is great. Lovely VIP gesture provided for my partners birthday and the staff we very helpful especially Joao and Sara cons: The room was quite cold and we had to request heat. No body lotion provided and apparently you have to request this too. Not sure about the bathroom only having clear glass doors.
pros: Perfect location staff was excellent sparkling clean cons: No such thing
pros: Nice modern rooms in a great location. Staff were incredibly friendly and helpful cons: Nothing

pros: I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at this hotel appreciating everything from the friendly and cheerful staff to the fantastic location. The breakfast was delightful and whether interacting with the staff in the breakfast corner or at the reception everyone was exceptionally welcoming. I had an amazing time during my visit.

The room is clean and the location is truly outstanding; a mere turn around the corner leads you to the mesmerising ocean. The street being an inner one ensures a quieter atmosphere at night. However for those who enjoy parties or music just around the corner offers vibrant options. Overall I would unquestionably choose to book this hotel again! cons:
pros: Location  nice staff nice rooms cons:
pros: Great front office and bar staff! The hotel itself was also nice cons:

pros: perfect location to start exploring Lisbon.
Close to the main square restaurants at a very short walk everything it's close!
The breakfast is rich and there are plenty of options to choose from.
The staff is was very helpful as well! cons: The view from the room...as there was a construction site in from of the hotel.
They blocked two times the value of the booking and the money got released after 2 weeks more or less....this was due to their bank. So pay in advance for everything or use the same card otherwise you might be double charged (for a short period)

pros: Great location. We had a really nice room. Good buffet breakfast. The welcome snacks and drinks were a nice touch. cons: When we were checking out they couldn‚Äôt verify which card we‚Äôd used initially to pay for the stay and I had to produce the receipt to prove that it was paid upon check-in. This delay almost caused us to miss our flight.
pros: Location and staff cons: Rooms are to small

pros: We loved EVERYTHING about our stay. You're in the city center location is just perfect.
The room was beautiful the bed comfortable the bathroom and shower big and perfect. I looove when there are slippers in the room and there were !!! 
The lobby is beautiful too the bar is superb.
Now of course the best of the best : the breakfast. OH.MY.GOD. My partner said 10 times "I think I never had such a good breakfast". It's true it was amazing. ALL the products seem to be homemade and fresh and taste so good. You have everything different breads potatoes eggs bacon sausages veggies (and all of these slightly change day by day) and everything to go with them and sweet choices to die for cakes pasteis de nata of course (amazing) pancakes yogurt granola peanut butter chocolate paste different seeds and so on ! Omg so much I've uploaded a video of the buffet on my google review !
Also the little attentions from the hotel were sooo cute and pleasant !!! First day we got back to our room we had two pasteis de nata waiting for us and a little bottle of ginja that was awesome !!!
Next day they had hot chocolate downstairs (see pictures) with christmas cake ! and in the room we found a little pot with everything inside to make the same hot chocolate as theirs with a note and explanations. We traveled a lot but it was the first time we got stuff like that. cons: I can only put the highest note because it was perfect. I would just say we did miss one thing : more pillows ! Because at home we have like 4 pillows each we are pillow lovers xD in that room we only had 2 little ones and sometimes in hotels you open a closet and can find others but not there there is actually no closet. Maybe if we asked the reception we would have get some more but it really wasn't that important.
pros: Good breakfast.  Location is perfect. cons: Nothing

pros: I am a very experienced traveler across the world and I found everything to be perfect and ideal - the location room cleaning breakfast and cooks there worked with true love. The receptionists were very helpful. Very welcoming environment. cons: I recommend that the hotel manager build a reception office that would be pleasant representative and comfortable for workers. There are just a couple of desks in the lobby for receptionists which doesn't look like a proper reception area. Moreover it's quite cold and even windy in that place now which are inadmissible conditions for receptionists' work.

pros: We liked everything about this hotel! The location was absolutely ideal for us the staff were all exceptionally friendly and helpful the breakfast was brilliant our room was lovely always clean and tidy and very comfortable. We received some lovely complimentary gifts in our room and there was fresh water and a coffee maker. We requested a kettle and that was delivered in an instant. And even though we were in a very busy part of the city the room was quiet and cosy. cons: There was nothing we didn't like! Everything was perfect! We wondered if we should have chosen a hotel with an evening restaurant but the reception staff recommended some lovely nearby restaurants and it was always nice to return to the hotel for a late night drink after dinner.

pros: Amazing location right by the town center walkable distance to everything from the water/Praca do Comercio to Church of St Anthony Castelo Sao Jorge to public transport and other stops like Rossio Square Santa Justa Elevator and just really too many to note down. Amazing streets filled with restaurants and Portuguese Tarts and even hole in the wall spots selling succulent Bifana (pork sandwiches). The hotel itself has sound proof windows so has all the location look and feel of  brand new hotel and window views without sacrificing a quiet nights sleep (not that it is noisy but if you like to sleep in between walks or wandering you can do so in peace). The bathroom is slick and nice and the soaps were moisturising and nicely scented. The soaps and shampoo/conditioner were pumps so felt easy to access. The hotel has decent breakfast selection from cold to hot foods and the complementary welcome cherry drink and tart was a nice welcoming gesture. The lighting in room was beautiful and illuminated certain areas giving this a 5 star feel.  The mini bar fridge had complimentary drinks (1st round stocked) which was unexpected and very nice. The different staff at the front desk were all so welcoming and willing to spend time with us to help share their views of Lisbon. Super friendly! cons: The rooms could be bigger although this is right in an incredible location so I'm guessing this would have been difficult and might not be possible for the area and really if you are spending more time in the hotel I daresay you are doing it all wrong :)

pros: Fabulous location and the staff couldn‚Äôt be more attentive. Special surprise for our 23rd anniversary and room upgrade. Amazing breakfast. Loved it cons: Rooms are on the small side but with this location no reason to stay indoors !

pros: The location is amazing. It's literally connected to the arch at the Plaza Commercio (the main square). Every touristy location is pretty much walkable except for the hill with the crucifix. 
Also the staff are so professional and courteous. Special mention to Sarah and Joao -- they are 100% SUPERSTARS! Thank you Sarah for the recommendation of Maria Cantita for lunch (we still remember this fondly) and thank you Joao for making our breakfast chit-chats so memorable. cons: Nothing. It was perfect.
pros: The staff were extremely nice and helpful. We had some issues with our flight and they were so kind and nice to help out. cons:
pros: Everything was perfect: great and professional careful staff hotel rooms and services cleaning location! cons:

pros: The hotel was very centrally situated to all amenities.  The rooms were a good size spotlessly clean with a fairly large en-suite shower room. The breakfasts were lovely with lots of different choices available.
The staff at this hotel were extremely friendly and very accommodating cons: My only criticism at this hotel was the bed was too firm for me.  I asked for a topper and this was sorted immediately.  I was then able to have a better night's sleep.

pros: Friendly staff comfortable bed very clean hotel and excellent breakfast. cons: AC system needs improvement. Had to be transferred to another room after check in because AC didn't work. On fourth day AC stopped in the morning and switched to heat system had to be rebooted. Fortunately slept well with good AC every night.
pros: Breakfast was great. The rooms could have been a bit larger but no changing that now. cons:

pros: The location is awesome customer service is awesome. I can‚Äôt stress how important customer service is especially when you are staying in a 4/5 star hotel. I will stay here again. cons: Nothing.

pros: The location was perfect the hotel was beautiful and the staff were so helpful. They went above and beyond! Made our anniversary stay here so special. We will be visiting again and would definitely recommend. cons: Nothing. It was amazing
pros: Very helpful and friendly staff. cons: Some street noise until late.
pros: Excellent location. Very good and helpful staff.  Great breakfast. cons: Room did not have a wardrobe.
pros: Beautiful clean new hotel in an excellent location with very comfortable beds. The breakfast was fantastic just wished it was offered earlier than 7 30am. cons:

pros: Excellent location. The breakfast was delicious and the staff made our stay very comfortable. The USB ports in the room were great and should be noted on the booking. cons: Some milk for coffee would have been nice in the fridge but I‚Äôm sure if we had asked we could have got some- not a big problem!
pros: Perfect location for exploring the old city close to Metro and trains very walkable with lots of attractions and restaurants nearby. cons:
pros: Great cons:

pros: Hotel was fantastic! Great location modern clean and extremely comfortable. Best part about it all though is the staff! All very helpful and gave great recommendations on places to go. Special thanks to Carolina Douglas and Jo√£o made our stay fantastic! cons:
pros: Excellent service food personnel and location cons:
pros: Classic hotel breakfast that included hot and cold food selection of juices and two coffee machines that both worked cons:

pros: The hotel was really a hit. I worked for a couple of hours every morning after an exceptionally good breakfast. Great room with an alcove with a desk. Perfect cleaning wonderful beds and bedding in the best quality of cotton. This is a hotel that there are not many of. Could hardly be a better hotel if you want to discover Lisbon and its surroundings. Right on the threshold of the historic part of Lisbon taxi outside the door the tram is 100 meters away and 300 more and there is the subway. Perfect for those of us who love to share a fantastic city and its history. And just as perfect to come home to after a day of 100 stairs steep streets vibrant culture and overwhelming experiences. cons: Everything was thought out down to the smallest detail so there is nothing to complain about. The first time I leave such an overall positive review.
pros: Everything. The staff were super helpful and decor was very stylish but comfortable. Spotlessly clean and an excellent breakfast. cons: N/a
pros: The location is superb. The Staff very friendly and helpful. Excellent breakfast. cons: The inclusion of a good restaurant (for dinner) would have brought the rating even higher.

pros: The position in the city is very close to all necessary points.
The kindness of all the personal.
The breakfast the rooms the lights and all are extremely clean and organised. cons: The guardarobe  furniture is minimalist some like that some not.
In this moment there are renovation works around in the area. Luckily the windows are insulating enough.
pros: Great location and friendly staff. cons: Nothing

pros: Breakfast was the best hotel breakfast we have ever had.  So much choice and all freshly prepared excellent service and staff all very friendly.
Location was perfect for seeing the city. 
Loved the decor downstairs.  All the staff were friendly and helpful. cons: TV in the room did not switch off but staff organised a room change straightaway.

pros: It was quite central right beside the arch and Pra√ßa do Com√®rcio where all the tours and trams and buses depart so easy to get around. It is a beautiful hotel friendly warm staff good service and great choice for breakfast. The bed was super comfortable and there were complementary drinks and snacks in the room! cons: Can't think of anything!

pros: Everything!! ALL staff so friendly and helpful location couldn‚Äôt be better rooms well appointed breakfast so nice complimentary first use of mini bar I could go on all day an exceptional hotel stay. cons: Cant think of anything
pros: Very comfortable clean friendly staff and central location.  In main area but soundproofed windows were excellent. cons: Nothing

pros: Excellent range of gluten free bread provided for one in our group every morning. 

Knowledgeable friendly and thoughtful staff. cons:
pros: Location decor delicious breakfast. cons:
pros: Brand new very clean just excellent cons: Location
pros: The hotel location couldn't have been better and all staff in the hotel were extremely helpful and very friendly. cons: I cant say that I really disliked anything.

pros: Staff were very helpful and friendly.
Breakfast was great (homemade items wide variety Buck‚Äôs Fizz).
Room for 3 was a king bed and a separate (windowless) room - not totally suitable for our 2 year old but adequate.
Lobby is lovely.
Location for convenience very good. cons: Room was directly above the primary landmark )arch where buskers play music until very late. The double glazing is impressive but inadequate - we would have liked to have known this as we‚Äôd have chosen a different hotel.  The hotel maintained there was nothing they could do about it. For the price of the room I‚Äôd have expected no sound inconvenience like this and a more constructive response when we complained (response was that they have double glazing and they can‚Äôt control what goes on in the street).

pros: The hotel is wonderful. Particularly the room and staff. The rooms are so spacious beautifully decorated and comfortable. cons: The only complaint I had was there was building work going on next to the hotel so every morning there was drilling noise so loud this was extremely uncomfortable to listen to daily.
pros: Great location close to restaurants and public transport cons:
pros: Location breakfast service cons:

pros: Very clean. Very close to everything we needed. Young lady at the front desk was very friendly and very helpful- ready to help and explain. Great breakfast. Staff in the restaurant pleasant and helpful. Great location. cons: Price was higher than similar properties around.

pros: Real quality feel staff were excellent high standard of service. Breakfast was special. Located 2 mins from the main plaza. Great walk in feel to main foyer bar. Very helpful reception. Very comfortable rooms only months old cons: I didn't stay long enough!
pros: It was fine but not remarkable.  It was OK... cons: The machines for coffee took some time to learn
pros: Stylish hotel in a lovely downtown location near place do comercio and the waterfront. Exceptionally helpful staff comfortable lounge area and excellent breakfast. cons: Nothing
pros: The location the facility and the staff were great. cons:
pros: Great location great customer service and good value cons: Nothing

pros: Location is great. Staff very friendly and helpful. It was open only for a month or so when we stayed so still quite new and clean. Room style was lovely with fab wall paper and black trims in the bathroom. Breakfast was great tasty glad it was included in room price. Wonder if it will stay like that in future. Double glazing was amazing!!! Definitely needed if staying street side but when closed you can't hear a thing. cons: The headboard was glued on in the wrong place blocking power sockets and light switches on one side. Rushed job by the builders. Room service to make the room was crazy early on our first morning when we were still snoozing. So we said not now. They never came back that day and were patchy in the days after. So we just asked for new towels.
pros: Location is amazing staff were incredibly attentive and the facilities were great. cons:

pros: Staff very friendly and helpful. Room was perfect quiet when windows were closed as it was right in the center and near Rue Augusta. Breakfast was great but could have offered more fruit. Would definitely recommend and look forward to staying in Pestana again cons:
pros: The property was beautiful and in the perfect location! the breakfast was also very good. cons:
pros: Beautiful new hotel in the heart of the Baixa neighborhood. Young attentive front desk staff. cons:

pros: Excellent location within walking distance of major attractions metro and train station. Really good breakfast of fresh fruit pastries cereal continental meat/cheese  omelette station etc. Overall it was brilliant and I would recommend the hotel to friends and family cons: Slightly bumpy start at check-in due to volume of guests compared to staff and not all info relayed to guests in a consistent manner. Seemed to be overwhelming for the staff especially as the rooms weren't ready for 3pm. As a result there were alot of guests waiting with very few staff on hand to help expedite.
pros: Place at tje city center super clean and nice functional design staff was really nice cons: I would prefere softer pillows blanket was great
pros:  cons: The breakfast facility is too small fora comfort level

pros: The location was great - close to everything (but count on the loudness since it is near Rua Augusta).
The room was spacious and beautiful staff great and polite and breakfast amazing. cons: -
pros: Very clean and beautiful hotel.  Great location next to everything we wanted to see near center of downtown.  The concierge was knowledgeable and helpful with all of our questions. cons:

pros: Amazing location! The staff were wonderful from the front desk the restaurant & housekeeping staff.
Lots of room in the Junior suite. Good breakfast. cons:
pros: Super friendly and welcoming staff very clean rooms fantastic location. Good breakfast. cons: My only minor complaint was that the bed was not comfortable (very hard mattress).
pros: Super convenient location. cons: Nothing.
pros: The location was amazing!you walked out the old palace walls to the oldest restaurant in Lisboa and into the arch.    Inexplicably. Amazing hotel ! cons:
pros: The breakfast was amazing. The rooms were beautiful. The location was perfect. cons:

pros: The cleanlinesscomfortlovely breakfastlocation and especially friendly and helpful staff.Juan at the front desk went out of his way to interact with guests in an authentic and friendly way which enhanced the stay. cons: At times the music during breakfast in the dining room was a little too loud for that time in the morning.
pros: Location was fantastic. Staff was friendly and helpful. The hotel is brand new. Everything was spotless. Best breakfast buffet with many choices. cons:
pros: New hotel perfect location friendly staff cons: Nothing everything was perfect
pros: modern clean vibrant design friendly staff great breakfast and comfortable room cons: nothing

pros: The hotel is very bright and clean which we loved. It is perfectly located in walking distance to very nice sightseeing options restaurants and shops. 
Breakfast was very delicious and the staff was lovely. Especially Sara and Ivan from reception were really kind and helpful. 
We strongly recommend the hotel and would definitely come back for another stay. cons:

pros: New Hotel.
Clean & Modern. Easy to find. Smelt amazing. Breakfast was great. Staff really helpful. Location is perfect for visiting Lisbon cons: Bed was a little firm but that‚Äôs just personal choice
pros: The location is great breakfast was amazing. New; modern rooms with a very homely feel. cons:

pros: The staff especially Sarah at the front desk was amazing. The location is central to everything and the room and amenities were very great. cons: The parking lot was a little distance away but they arrange for a discounted price and unloaded our luggage before checkin so that I could avoid being ticketed or towed.
pros: The staff were incredibly helpful and friendly and the hotel was situated in the heart of everything. The breakfast was also amazing. cons: That we had to leave.

pros: Great location right near the arch. Good size room. Cleaners did a great job and were very thorough. Staff were very attentive and kind. Breakfast was great and there was lots of choice. We had a great stay! cons: Only downside was the bathroom door being glass which meant there was less privacy than we would‚Äôve liked. But this was only a minor thing!

pros: This is a new hotel in the best possible location in Lisbon. Everything is a short walk away from the hotel about 10 mins to Alfama or Chiado and Rua Augusta is literally at the doorstep.
The staff are extremely helpful and professional. Ivan and Sara at reception are absolute stars and nothing is too much for them. They booked us a perfect 8-hour city tour which was the best thing we did. Rui our guide (he's not really a guide but extremely knowledgeable and a perfect host/guide took us to all the key sites explaining the history and relevance in great detail.
The hotel itself is very clean rooms well appointed and breakfast is very sumptuous. They will happily make anything for you if it is not in the buffet.
Overall a fantastic short trip and we were well looked after at Pestana Rua Augusta. We will definitely stay here the next time we visit Lisbon. cons: Nothing really to fault though bear in mind that as it is a new hotel in a newly renovated building so the walls are thin and you can hear people in the corridor outside the room. Did not really bother us much though.

pros: Great new hotel with very beautiful design  amazing breakfast and very kind and welcoming staff. Located in the heart of Lisbon but due to perfect soundproofing you don‚Äôt hear anything at night. Highly recommend ! cons:

pros: Great central location near the river and city centre. Loved that everything was quite new and clean. Some of the staff were really excellent. A lot of breakfast options. And the welcome gifts were a nice touch! My compliments to the staff at the breakfast area. cons: If you look past the fact that they just opened and everything is still sort of new: price wise it‚Äôs a bit overrated in my opinion. Not the best Pestana hotel we‚Äôve seen. Yes the room was clean (I did find hairs in the shower) and yes the location is very central. However the check-in or reception area is a bit off compared to the rest of the well designed lounge. No privacy while checking in or out just chaotic - not enough space for people and luggage. Our room was on the side where you could hear the construction works on the other side. The room was a bit small not enough space to move with your luggage. No clear welcome sign with phone number of reception or any info about facilities in the hotel. Staff: some were excellent and some just ignore you completely. The service at the bar could be better: more options please not everyone wants alcohol beverages or coke. During our four night stay we had an almost empty tissue box with 4 tissues and nobody refilled the toilet paper - i had to request this that seemed weird to me. It just wasn‚Äôt worth it you pay for the location I guess.
pros: This was a spectacular stay. I will never stay at any other hotel in Lisbon on my annual visit ever again. cons: It was literally a perfect stay. No complaint whatsoever.

pros: Location 
Friendliness of workers
Cleanliness cons: Nothing to fault

pros: Downtown near Pra√ßa do Com√©rcio and next to the arch. 
I found all staff to be quite nice (reception restaurant cleaning). Also it was my birthday during my 4 night stay and I received a bottle of champagne and brownie (nice touch) 
It‚Äôs a new hotel near the river and if you want to go on boat rides it‚Äôs the ideal location. 
Coffee machine (no electric jug for tea though). cons: Room a bit on the small side especially wardrobe (enough for one person and for a short stay) no place to put suitcases and the space between the toilet and bathroom sink - a bit of a tight space. There was a bit of construction on one of the days that I intended to sleep in longer but this was once during my stay.

pros: Rua Augusta just opened this summer. Everything was brand new! cons: The property is so conveniently located right in the heart of Lisbon right beside the arch. There was no need to rent a car as most attractions were in walking distance.

pros: Property was just opened 2 weeks and everything was nice and clean inside and outside the rooms .  Fresh beddings and towels were fantastic the location for walking to all locations was also amazing . cons: As a bonus only it would be nice if there was a pool and gym.
pros: The breakfast is great with fresh produce and nice variety. Staff was outstanding in particular Joao cons: Everything was great

pros: Amazing hotel in a very ideal location! Staff was always polite and helpful. Rooms were super clean spacious and nicely decorated. Complimentary drinks and chocolates were offered every day. The hotel is centrally located right next to Augusta Arch and closed to restaurants coffee shops bars museums and shops. Absolutely recommend and we will be back for sure! cons: A minor detail there‚Äôs no kettle or coffee machine in the room.
pros: Great location..friendly staff cons: Tea & coffee machines in rooms

pros: Great location. Very quiet room. Easy check in and check out. Nice to have a Nespresso machine in the room. cons: Food room service not handled internally barcode order did not work. Needed to make an international phone call to order! Did not do this. Misleading to have food room service brochure in the room. Coffee cups not cleaned one day. Milk for coffee not available nor tea making facilities.

pros: Location was good.  Staff was superb.  Facilities were not a wow for the price.  I don‚Äôt think I will stay there again. cons: Facilities left a little to be desired for the nightly charge for the room.  Pretty barebones

pros:  cons: During our entire trip in Portugal I have never left my backpack bag unattended except while staying at this hotel when I left the bag in our hotel room.  I have some cash (RMB) in an envelop which was placed in a zipper-sealed inner pocket of the bag.  I didn't notice but after we returned home I found it missing.  I suspect someone took the money while we were out sight-seeing.  I would not seek hotel investigation but just want to make people aware of the potential risks of theft even in this pricy (nice location though) hotel.

pros: Nice hotel cons: The hotel charged my account twice. This incident which they are not attending to has ruined my overall experience with them.

I have to keep calling and emailing on my end with no help on their side. Even booking.com is not being of any assistance

pros: Clean and new cons: Understaffed

pros: The location is excellent. It is in the flat portion of Lisbon. It makes returning from a long day or eating/drinking and sightseeing downhill. The hotel is in a main tourist area but it was quite in our room. The restaurants around the hotel are not very good but the staff does give OK recommendations. cons: The hotel does not give guests control of their room‚Äôs thermostat. I had to call multiple times to have them change termpeature in our room. Overall their dinner recommendations were only ok and were very pricey options.

pros: The room was comfortable and bathroom was fine. cons: I thought the hotel was pricey for what we received. Breakfast was not served until 10:30 am ! nor was its included in my room cost which was $350/night.
pros: Location is brilliant a 1 minute walk from the Arc cons: The staff was not friendly and pretty rude
