pros: Room was very comfy loved the roofrop bar. cons:
pros: I have stayed at the H10 several times and it never disappoints. The hotel is well equipped and maintained and has a more intimate feel. cons:

pros: The room was fantastic loved the details and the welcoming drinks 
Breakfast amazing the staff was so kind in every depart of the hotel
Had amazing New year¬¥s experience with the hotel dinner music and atmo highly recomennt for a stay during Chrismas and NY cons: Everything was good

pros: Lovely decoration overall hotel ambience lobby library.  Fabulous welcome with lovely fizzy drink and sweets.  So much thought went into this hotel it's a lovely experience. cons: We liked everything about our stay in this hotel.

pros: A beautiful charming and comfortable hotel with a roof terrace - perfect for sundowners. The staff were very friendly and accommodating. cons: We found the pillows to be quite hard on our necks and it would have been nice to have a smart TV in the room. There were not many English channels available on the TV. The hotel was a little out of the way of all the main attractions but within walking distance.
pros: nice decoration of the room cons: The sink is a little bit clogged

pros: The staff is amazingly helpful kind and positive. Would like to thank all the staff. They made our trip truly memorable. cons: The walls are really thin so if you have trouble sleeping you‚Äôd better bring earplugs

pros: The hotel is absolutely beautiful and amazing! It was a best decision to choose it for our trip! I really highly recommend it!
The stuff was super nice and helpful everyday cleaning quiet and peaceful place. cons: Didn‚Äôt have any problems at all
pros: Perfect location lovely little boutique hotel. Rooms were comfortable and clean and staff went above and beyond cons: The rooftop bar closed quite early
pros: The room was gorgeous loved the little extras.  The rooftop bar is a must visit with views over the city. A stunning place to stay in Lisbon would definitely book again. cons:
pros: Room was spacious and clean. cons:
pros: Everything cons: Nothing
pros: Food excellent cons:
pros: Very nice staff and service cons: Top floor bar & restaurant closes too early and open too late.
pros: Room very spacious. Staff fantastic and gave kind gifts. cons: Wifi wasn't amazing
pros: Absolutely everything cons: We loved everything
pros: The location was perfect and within walking distance of the metro and great sites. cons: Nothing

pros: Beautiful scent all around and lovely staff room was super comfortable cons: Nothing major if I was not picking I don't drink alcohol so they provided me with a bottle. Would have been nice to ask if I would prefered non-alcoholic beverage but no major issue
pros: Excellent location beautiful calm design elegant clean and very comfortable spacious rooms. cons: The hotel doesn't offer Spa facilities (pool gym etc.)

pros: It‚Äôs a beautiful boutique hotel and I would stay there every time we are in Faro. Most of the staff are exceptional. It‚Äôs very clean. Beautiful. Gorgeous rooftop view and service. cons: The only complaint was that the walls are very thin. We listened to a couple argue late at night and the sound of high heels on the wood floors made it very difficult to sleep. My point is not the argument but the insufficient sound proofing.

pros: I thought the hotel was outstanding. Really comfortable quiet great staff delicious breakfast and generally great vibe. I would highly recommend it. cons: The internet was too slow and cut out from time to time.
pros: Everything cons: Nothing
pros: My room was huge and gorgeous cons: Nothing it was great
pros: The breakfast was very fresh and you could tell the food was very high quality. The staff was very friendly and welcoming. The service was exceptional. cons:

pros: room set up with sliding dividing door. proximity to public transport. sweets by reception. Prosecco in room. toiletry sets in bathroom. ritual shows feel and shampoo. cons: pillows that didn‚Äôt work with the hard mattresses. bathroom couldn‚Äôt be locked. odd smell on floor.
pros: Very comfortable bed. Great rooftop bar. cons: Terrible Wi-fi.

pros: Very good hotel. Beautiful rooms and lobby.
Nice view from the rooftop bar.
Good service at the reception desk. cons: Food and drinks are a bit overpriced.
pros: Very beautiful place friendly staff and  great rooftop bar! cons: Nothing!

pros: The room was very clean. Bed was very comfortable. The staff was excellent. The restaurant and bar were very good. cons: It would be nice to be able to log into our Netflix or other American video streaming service on the TV.

pros: Beautiful real picture of what Portugal looks like
The staff was Aplus. cons: Hard to get in tithe 10th floor
pros: Breakfast was phenomenal. Staff were wonderful. Rooms and Facilities were very comfortable and loved the decor. cons: No negative comments
pros: Interior comfortable room breakfast cons: Guests in room above very loud
pros: Location staff and facilities cons: Instead of welcome with sparkling wine in the bottle it would be great to provide drinking water on a daily basis.
pros: Loved the small amenities and the rooftop bar cons: The map for directions to the parking garage is difficult to read/understand at night in a dark car interior

pros: This is perfection in Lisbon. Perfect location to everything. Gorgeous interior. The rooms are bright airy and thoughtful. The rooftop bar is amazing at night. The staff is so friendly. cons: Nothing other than if you have a car they have parking but plan on driving a bit to get to it. Not an issue you just need to check in and understand how to access it. Elevator will reach the garage. Don‚Äôt let this stop you from staying just plan ahead.
pros: Location cons: N/a

pros: The decor is crisp and welcoming with comfy sofas and armchairs in the lobby and traditional tiled wall art. The roof terrace has stunning views and relaxed service and the same stylish look. The bedrooms are spacious and beds comfortable. Our adult children shared a room with a cushioned window seat. cons: We were lucky that we visited the roof terrace on the first of our two nights as on the second it was closed for a private function. Guests should perhaps check before travel.

pros: We've stayed at 3 different accommodations in Lisbon and this has by far been our favorite. It is in a PERFECT location!!! Close to the downtown without having to deal with all the noise. It's a beautiful from the hotel down liberty street towards the water and there is a beautiful park nearby. The staff were absolutely lovely. We had 3 rooms for my family trip and everyone can say the same about how amazing it was.  They greeted us with sparkling wine and treats when we arrived to the hotel. We then were surprised with sparkling wine in our rooms after coming back from exploring the nearby area. The views from the rooftop bar were also spectacular! We had beautiful views and cannot speak more highly of this hotel. cons: Nothing it was great. Beautiful facility amazing staff.

pros: Absolutely loved this property staff were very helpful and kind the rooftop bar had some amazing service food and drinks. The view and atmosphere was so enjoyable. The room was beautiful and comfy bed. We had a wonderful stay here cons:

pros: Beautiful hotel with great amenities. Staff are lovely and super helpful too. cons: About 20-25 mins walk away from tram 28 stop and outside of busy Lisbon streets. If happy to stay a little bit out of the hussle and bussle but still in the city centre close to public transport this is a nice place to stay.

pros: Location good 
Facilities fantastic cons:
pros: Beautiful hotel. Great restaurant. Very helpful staff cons: Paper thin walls
pros: The view from the terrace bar was fabulous. Friendly staff and well appointed room. cons: The room didn‚Äôt have a window that opened up. High up and draped
pros: Great location with roof top terrace with views of the sea. Great for drinks and lunch as well as light dinner. Room was super clean and cosy no noise from streets. Good breakfast. cons:

pros: The hotel was beautiful had a very nice restaurant and rooftop bar. Our room was so much nicer than we expected it to be - it was absolutely beautiful and we loved it! cons: Room service was a little difficult to work - you could order through a website but it seemed like you had to pre-order so we were never able to order anything. You may be able to call down to the front desk but we didn't try that. They have a bar in the lobby for drinks/coffee but we never saw anyone working there so we never ordered anything.

pros: Friendly staff !

The shower was great and the Ritual products were a treat thank you cons: We upgarded as the standard rooms very small and dingy.
The upgraded room as a good size but the curtain was too small for the window so we woke up very early with the sunlight. This would need replacing to make it perfect !

pros: Great rooftop to chill with drinks and snacks in the afternoon / evening.
Great breakfast selection. cons:
pros: The property was beautiful!  A lot effort was put in to the design and it was exceptional.  Just what you would think of Portugal. cons: Nothing was wrong that I could see.
pros: Old but well restored. cons:
pros: Beautiful hotel with . Everything was perfect cons:

pros: Incredible property! Wonderfully decorated. Really felt like a unique stay in the middle of the city. We booked this hotel for the rooftop balcony and vibes - this did not let us down! The staff was amazing and immediately made us feel like VIPs! We cannot recommend this place enough and look forward to checking out their other boutique properties around the world! cons: Rooftop was closed at 4pm on our check in day for a private event. We went up earlier in the day to get a drink and service was quite slow. I ended up tracking down a waiter to get it placed.

pros: The receptionists went above and beyond. 
Professional and kind. cons:

pros: The breakfast spread was really amazing. Also the hotel went above and beyond with a special welcome treat that was left in our room the first night. The beds were very comfortable and the room was well appointed. The location was really great as well - very close to the train station so it was easy to get around Lisbon. cons: The lack of amenities - no fitness center or pool but it‚Äôs a boutique property so not fully expected.

pros:  cons: I selected the option for two seperate beds at the time of booking months before our stay. Upon arrival I was informed that option was missed and no rooms were available. No effort was made to find another suitable option.
pros: Nice property clean welcoming it‚Äôs located near the center of town access to urban transportation. cons:

pros: Great breakfast  beautiful decor. Lovely friendly staff.
Complimentary champagne and sweet each afternoon at reception was a lovely surprise on arrival. cons:

pros: Our room was great (we had the suite) the location was very nice - close to the center but also not directly down town room service surprisingly good the staff was very friendly cons: There was no gym you had to pay extra for parking
pros: Lovely room. Great breakfast. Friendly staff cons:

pros: Beautiful hotel with a stunning rooftop bar. We stayed with our little one the staff were super friendly and went above and beyond to accommodate our needs. The breakfast was delicious with a good variety of traditional Portuguese pastries. Ageda and her colleagues at the restaurant were really attentive and made us feel very welcomed. 
We definitely recommend H10 and hope we can return soon. cons:

pros: Upon arrival we were greeted with a beautifully decorated lobby and excellent service from the staff. Check-in was smooth and we received clear instructions about parking.

I had booked two rooms one for my partner and me and one for my parents. Both rooms was very beautiful. The interior design throughout the hotel was very elegant and well-thought-out.

One evening we spent time at the rooftop bar which had a stunning view. We enjoyed snacks and cocktails which were good and the staff were very professional and friendly. Breakfast was tasty but the portions were small so it was good that it was also buffet-style.

All the staff were very nice and professional making sure we were comfortable and enjoyed our stay. cons: However there were some issues. First the hotel could be accessed from two street levels which was new to me and initially seemed interesting. However we realized our rooms on the second and third floors faced a very noisy street making it feel like we were in a basement. The third-floor room was an accessible room which none of us needed and it felt like we were taking it away from someone who might.

In the second-floor room I was disappointed because the bathroom wasn't clean. I found hair on the sink mold on the shower walls and there was no ventilation causing the mirror to fog up and making the room damp. The toiletries were supposed to be refillable but were half-empty when we arrived.

Additionally the hallways on both floors smelled likely due to plumbing issues as there was public restroom on the third-floor.

pros: Lovely and bright
Fabulous bed
Lovely room on 9th floor
Excellent design 
Great bathroom
Fabulous toiletries cons: Staff were fine but nothing special
Breakfast was ok
pros: Central location large comfortable room great breakfast + bonus rooftop bar cons: No issues or concerns
pros: Staff was great. Food was excellent and the decor was beautiful. cons: Rooms were a little small.
pros: The hotel was beautiful the staff were amazing. The bedroom was lovely and comfortable and the bed was very comfortable. The location was very convenient for everything. cons: Nothing.
pros: Lovely hotel with a great rooftop bar. We appreciated the cake & complementary wine for my girlfriends birthday. We will be returning! cons:
pros: Housekeeping staff not friendly. Room was not cleaned after the first night until after 3 p.m. cons: Did not know that reservation could include breakfast which I would have purchased.

pros: Love the H10 group of hotels . Excellent customer service. amazing breakfast beautiful room & decor throughout hotel. Good roof terrace and lovely smell throughout hotel. cons: No USB plugs in room   bathroom has sliding g doors which don't quite close completely  - leaving privacy a bit compromised. Only minor negatives  wouldn't stop me going to a H10 hotel in future.

pros: we liked the rooms
-comfortable bed and shower/bath was very good
staff were friendly and helpful
-location was close to Metro and sightseeing buses
-rooftop terrace bar was very good cons: Breakfast was good- but
Bacon was cold when it arrived( pointed this out to waitress and she agreed with me but did nothing to resolve)
Hot milk at "Nespresso" machine was not refilled(or very hot)
Couldn't toast Gluten free bread in kitchen

pros: The hotel and our room were beautifully done. Daily housekeeping did an impeccable  job and attended to anything we could have wanted. . Nightly inspiring notes slipped under the door were fun to read after being in the city all day/eve. The roof top bar was gorgeous and served delicious cocktails and small menu items. cons: Wish the roof top deck was open longer hours and that hotel guests had some priority to seating.
pros: Location staff and furnishings were amazing. cons: Rooftop bar staff at night were the only people who didn‚Äôt have an amazing friendly attitude but it did not change our experience.
pros: Beautiful place nice rooftop and breakfast. Great hospitality. cons:
pros: Great location and exceptionally helpful staff. cons:

pros: The location was exactly what I needed. It was halfway between my conference venue and an easy 30-minute walk down into the old town. There is a supermarket opposite which has its own cheap cafe. The hotel recommended a nearby restaurant "O Cacho Dourado" which serves excellent local food. There is a Metro station within a 5-minute walk which will get you into town or with one change to and from the airport (about 30-35 minutes).
My room was very comfortable and also quiet.
I liked the rooftop bar which provided a place to have a relaxing beer and local snacks
It is not the cheapest hotel in town but one I can recommend and I would definitely return to. cons: n/a

pros: Beautiful rooms and attentive staff cons: We booked partly due to the rooftop bar.  However  it‚Äôs only open during the heat of the day and early evening. Doesn‚Äôt allow for a post dinner drink or relaxation.
pros: Everyone from check in to check out was excellent cons:

pros: The staff were so friendly and accommodating- they went out of their way to bring us bottles of champagne and chocolate-dipped strawberries since they knew it was our honeymoon. cons: I was a little confused about parking- they say they have parking online but then in person we did street parking and fed the meter.
pros: The rooms were very large and comfortable.  Very clean and quiet. The location was close to everything. cons: The staffing in the restaurant at breakfast was lacking.
pros: Beautifully decorated and maintained hotel cons:
pros: Breakfast was excellent.Lots of food choices.staff is very friendly. cons:

pros: Everything was clean and beautiful. 
The bed was comfortable the room was cozy . 
Breakfast was good too cons: We booked a superior room and when we arrived at the hotel the lady gave us the room‚Ä¶ 
Unfortunately was a small room  not like in the picture‚Ä¶  also in front of our  window was all the garbage containers ‚Ä¶
pros: Great location lovely rooms and bar areas cons:
pros: The room is clean & comfortable tastefully designed cons: Hotel staffs lack of hospitality

pros: We loved the attention to detail and the little treats that the hotel treated us too. We also loved the boutique feel and the location. We mostly loved the patio upstairs with the amazing view and the opportunity to wind down after a long day of sightseeing. cons: Nothing :)
pros: Everything. Room breakfast bars (especially the rooftop bar) concierge assistance ambience. First rate. cons: Shower was a bit temperamental.

pros: Beautiful hotel with up to date rooms. Clean  great service . Always ready to help . Liked the little touches such as cookies  pastries and drink at the check in ; the prosecco in my room . The roof top bar was beautiful and enjoyable to take guests for a drink .Breakfast was superb with every option . cons: Location wasn't great for me as I needed to take a Bolt everywhere but to be fair  this was similar for other colleagues staying at other hotels in Lisbon . Won't deter me from staying here again.
pros: Gorgeous hotel lovely roof terrace great breakfast cons: Slightly noisy - we could hear the room above us moving around furniture late at night (may have been staff quarters)
pros: Beautiful boutique hotel. Roof top bar and lobby bar great for a drink at the end of the day. cons: Only received water in the room the first day.

pros: We loved the room and I particularly liked the Rituals toiletries and the powerful hair dryer.  The breakfast was one of the best we have ever had with excellent choices and the staff were extremely helpful and friendly.  We found entering the hotel initially confusing as the entrance wasn't obvious and the automatic doors didn't open immediately. The location was ok not central but we knew that on booking. The highlight of our holiday was the stunning roof top bar with reasonably priced drinks. cons: The major disappointment was that the stunning roof top bar closed at 9pm which meant if we had been out in Lisbon for the evening we couldn't come back to our hotel roof top bar and look at the stunning view.  I was amazed that it closed so early as it is such a huge advantage of the hotel to have this view.  I understand residents don't like late noise but 10pm although still early would have been much better and more reasonable.
pros: All the staff are very customer friendly and helpful. The front desk staff is awesome! cons: None

pros: This was my 2nd time at the hotel.  The decor is beautiful (particularly the blue tile work) staff is helpful and friendly and location is generally close to activities and restaurants.    Hotel size is also nice.  I like the boutique feel.  Beautiful breakfast. cons: I was disappointed the rooftop bar was closed for remodeling.  I loved the views and having drinks up there last time.  Also my room (the basic) seemed very small for two people w/ lots of luggage from having been on a cruise prior.  I would get a larger room next time.
pros: The decor was amazing the room was so comfortable and spacious and the rooftop bar was incredible! Incredible views! cons: Nothing everything was excellent

pros: The decor was stunning the smell when you walked into the hotel was amazing. I need to know the scent for my home! The little touches like the vanity sets bottle of fizz and chocolates robes and slippers. The cakes and sweets available at reception. The roof top bar was beautiful relaxing and fantastic drinks and view. cons: You get what you pay for would I have paid less yes. But it was worth it. Breakfast could be a little cheaper ¬£25 a head is a bit expensive.
pros: Loved the top floor patio cons: Originally had a room on the patio floor but found it too noisy so we changed rooms for the remainder of our stay.

pros: So accommodating.  We arrived a couple of hours early and were promptly checked in allowing for a refreshing nap after a long journey.  Restaurant was great‚Äîtasty breakfast and one dinner. cons:
pros: Everything was fantastic from the room to the rooftop to breakfast to check in and check out! cons: There was nothing that I didn‚Äôt like

pros: It was beautiful clean and the room was extremely comfortable. The bed was the perfect combo of soft yet firm and the hotel was quiet at night so we slept well cons: The rooftop terrace closed at 9pm 
The restaurant on site was fully booked for a special event that was not for hotel guests and we didn‚Äôt have a chance to eat there
pros: The room were absolutely lovely light and airy with great views across the city cons: The rooftop bar was shut for a private function on one of the evenings

pros: View from the queen room was fabulous!!
Breakfast was excellent cons: The towels are not soft
pros: Beautiful hotel located in a convenient location. Tastefully decorated with a great breakfast! The view from the rooftop is breathtaking!! Thank you for a lovely stay in Lisbon! cons:
pros: Room lobby and breakfast were wonderful cons: I didn‚Äôt know until check in if they could give me 2 beds. Was traveling with my friend and we didn‚Äôt want to share a bed.

pros: Room was amazing!  Well appointed and modern. Bathroom exceeded my expectations. It was modern beautiful and clean. Provided amenities were outstanding. Air conditioning was awesome! cons: I don‚Äôt have anything to write here. There was nothing I didn‚Äôt like. We arrived before checkin and they were able to get us in early. Staff and facilities were wonderful.

pros: Lovely design spacious rooms great location for sightseeing. Good pastry shops and a supermarket nearby. cons: Thin walls bring some neighbour noise inside. We could hear the neighbours talking and watching TV almost constantly. Also despite the staff being excellent overall one bartender was rude to me for some reason.
pros: Clean kind friendly helpful location cons: Terrace restaurant wasn‚Äôt open when I was there ( April 9-12) I would like to have dinner in there .

pros: The room was lovely. Very clean  big comfortable bed and very spacious. Great facilities in the room. cons: The rooftop bar wasn‚Äôt open which was very disappointing as this is why I chose this hotel over another.

pros: Great location comfortable and looks great. cons: The only thing was that we expected the roof terrace would be open again as it was closing for winter and we were there in April. This wasn‚Äôt very clear at the time of booking and was the main reason we chose it.
pros: Very pretty hotel with great accommodations. Wonderfully comfortable beds and very clean room. The staff is friendly and helpful. Would highly recommend. cons:
pros: Beautiful property. Friendly staff and the family room was perfect for our family of four. cons: We got in late and ordered room service which was just average at best
pros: Loved the view from the 8th floor.  It was nice to wake up to. cons:

pros: i liked the location and staff attitude cons: lack of concierge or knowledge from the staff to recommend places or to help confirm reservations etc.

also for example you have a coffee machine in the room but they don't give you water for it......

room in pictures is a bit misleading

pros: Really lovely hotel great decor and comfy bed. Very accessible to the metro stations and overall great feel about the hotel. Even left a complimentary bottle of cava and cake on my birthday! Really nice bar area and overall great stay. cons: The roof terrace is not open over the winter months for renovation. However this is not advertised at all on their website (or when winter months are - we stayed in spring) we only found out from other reviews and then a small notice in the hotel once there. It‚Äôs a real shame this isn‚Äôt advertised more as it was one of the main reasons we chose to stay here. Breakfast was fine but not exceptional. Glad we tried it but wouldn‚Äôt recommend getting it included as there is so many good places nearby.

pros: We loved everything about our stay. The staff was so warm friendly and helpful. The breakfasts were outstanding! The room was 
very comfortable and quiet. We highly recommend it. cons:
pros: In a nice area. cons: The sounds between rooms lacked privacy. Exiting the wrong door puts you on a lower street. That was confusing.

pros: Very clean great space and staff. Amazing location walking distance to most of Lisbon. Staff offered restaurant recommendations and allowed us to check in early when arriving from the states so we could change and be ready for our day. cons:
pros: Front desk staff were phenomenal! cons:
pros: Location was perfect quiet yet near all the fun and easily accessible public transport. Room for three had double doors separating us from our son really clean and beautifully decorated. cons:

pros: Great location. A 5 minute walk to the Eduardo park where all the bus tours start from. 
The hotel is clean with exceptional staff. Eddie Nuno Bruno Hallelujah & hudrigo were fantastic. 
The room wasn‚Äôt huge but it was very clean. Hairdryer was very powerful and the complimentary toiletries were fantastic (no need to take soaps shampoo / conditioner as there‚Äôs tons) 
The rooftop wasn‚Äôt open when we were there due to refurbishment but that did not take away from the hotel. cons: The hotel is bright clean intimate. Great bed linen fab toiletries and bar staff. Lovely extras on arrival chocs and biscuits. Great drinks at bar.

pros: Beautiful property comfy beds luxurious bathroom and all centrally located. cons: The whole reason we booked this property was for the stunning view pictured in their gallery from the patio. Sadly the patio was closed for construction. If you‚Äôre planning on going here because you fell in love with the view double check and make sure the renovations are over.

pros: The hotel was beautiful. I loved how it was decorated in the main areas. We added the daily breakfast to our reservation and it was definitely worth it. They had a very nice selection of pastries fruits breads cheese and meats out. You could also order hot foods for no extra cost (unfortunately this was not explained to us until our 3rd day). There was also sparkling wine and fresh juices out every morning. The location is about 1.5 miles from the heart of the action so it was quiet but still an easy walk (if you don‚Äôt have any limited mobility). cons: My only complaint was the lack of wash clothes provided. I thought it was strange to provide hand towels and bath towels but no wash clothes. I had to bathe with a hand towel which was a little cumbersome.

pros: My wife and I were visiting Lisbon for a conference and stayed in this hotel for a week. While the property itself is of exceptional quality and design for us it was the staff at the restaurant and the bar that made our stay in Lisbon outstanding. We became very good friends with Bruno Rodrigo Edir Daniela and Ali. They went above and beyond to ensure that our stay is as comfortable and pleasant as possible. It was their kindness their passion for their jobs and their friendliness to their customers that made a world of difference. It is their efforts that made our stay one of our most memorable experiences in the recent years. Naturally the strategic location of the hotel its stylish design and its superb breakfast also contribute to the overall quality. cons: Nothing comes to mind. Keep up the great work!

pros: Fantastic breakfast
easy to get to local metro station cons: nothing

pros: The property is just in the fringes of the main area a 20 - 25 minute walk into the centre of Lisbon. The hotel has a traditional modern feel to it and the staff are all professional courteous and helpful. 
We booked a superior room for 3 nights which was really nice and spacious with a very comfortable bed. 
We didn‚Äôt eat at the hotel but used the lobby/lounge area for post dinner drinks and afternoon tea all reasonably priced and of good quality. 
We had room service breakfast on one day but chose to eat out on the other days. There is a lovely cafe maybe 30m to the left of the property that serves a great breakfast. cons: I don‚Äôt think there was anything major we didn‚Äôt like. We booked this hotel for its rooftop bar which was closed during our stay for refurbishment. 
We booked a superior room which was actually down two floors from reception and looked out onto the side of the building into a very busy street with a huge residential building in your eye line. Not one for city views I‚Äôm afraid.
pros: Breakfast was fantastic. Rooms were very spacious and  beautiful cons: The main reason I booked this hotel was for the roof bar and when we arrived it was closed the whole time we were there
pros: Room & breakfast - lovely room - terrible pillows. Breakfast was wonderful but you need larger teacups! cons: We were disappointed that the terrace was closed.

pros: They were extremely accommodating with exceotional service. The quality of accommodations and breakfast were outstanding! Amazing amount of choices and healthy. Quality and boutique very fitting. cons: Can't think of a thing.

pros: The hotel was in a very good position. The staff was excellent.  We had trouble with the electrics a couple of times. Also we booked it for the rooftop bar . But when we got there it was being refurbished so couldn't use it . That was very disappointing cons: Staff location
pros: Excellent breakfast. Good rooms. Very comfortable cons: No gym. Rooftop was under renovation

pros: From when we arrived the staff were so friendly took our bags in and got us into our room earlier than check in time. It's a wonderfully decorated reception with a nice bar area too! This hotel took care of all of the little things delivering our luggage to our room for us giving us chocolates each day free class of sparkling wine whenever you fancy it from reception and some snacks provided from 12pm to 12am every day. The room was amazing coffee machine provided and the bed was huge and so comfortable. Bathroom was supplied with rituals shampoo conditioner and bodywash and we had a lovely view right down to the water. cons: Nothing

pros: Lovely boutique hotel. Excellent service from the extremely kind and helpful staff. Went out of their way to get our room ready for an early check in after our long international flight. Good sized room nicely appointed comfortable king bed (superior room) Nespresso machine with coffee milk and sugar. Also tea pods. We were on front of hotel roadside but with windows closed we slept like babies. Ate dinner once in the hotel restaurant excellent service and food was good. cons: It was a bit of a walk to the core areas about 30 minutes however we like being away from crowded areas. It was an extremely wet day on Lisbon‚Äôs very slippery tile sidewalks so on a nice day it will take less time to get to the central area. You have to search a bit for dinner restaurants other than in the hotel. To us these were minor issues.
pros: Everythingamazing hotel!Beautiful interiorcleanamazing breakfast. cons: Nothing.
pros: Rooms reception bar boutique hotel cons: No light in wardrobe bloody crazy

pros: Good standard very pleasant staffwith good local knowledge and great recommendations for places to eat and drink.

Flexible and made an effort to get the room ready although we arrived slightly early for check in.

Location was very good and central. cons: Nothing it was a good experience.

pros: The hotel was handily located for the metro and in a quiet area of the city. cons: The roof terrace bar was closed which we weren't told about when booking & our room didn't get cleaned until late afternoon despite being out all day.

pros: Very centrally located hotel with lots of restaurants bars and attractions within walking distance.  Room was a good size and very clean with very comfortable beds.  Loved the fresh drinks and sweets throughout the day. cons: Rooftop terrace was closed despite website saying that even though the rooftop bar closes for the winter the rooftop terrace would still be accessible to guests.  Really looked forward to sitting out in the evenings with the great weather but the elevator would not go to the top.  Also bathroom and room needs more hooks for hanging towels bags etc.  Such an easy thing to do but hotels seem to miss this all day long...
pros: Loved it but with the rooftop bar was open cons:
pros: Great size room loved the ritual products. Comfortable bed. cons: It was a shame that the rooftop bar was closed but we sat near the bar area a few times

pros: A pleasure from start to finish. The staff were pleasant and helpful. The room was bright clean and nicely decorated. The bed was very comfortable. The lobby bar and restaurant areas were also beautifully designed. I enjoyed the little touches such as chocolates left in the room and a surprise treat at check out. The location is fine; not exactly close to the main tourist sites of Lisbon but it doesn't matter when it's so easy to get about. cons: The rooftop area was closed due to the season. I expected the bar to be closed but it would be nice to still go up and enjoy the views and take photographs. While the hotel make clear that the bar is closed in winter I feel the lack of access to the rooftop area in general should be more clearly stated as it was one of the selling points that made me book.
pros: Breakfast cons: Rooftop bar closed
pros: Welcome drinks and snacks. Location was great. cons: Rooftop  terrace was closed which was disappointing. On one evening the downstairs lobby bar was closed due to private function.
pros: Location and the reasonable price. cons: Nothing

pros: Nice boutique hotel and great location. 
Staff at the reception ( Marcia) was very friendly and helpful. cons: NA

pros: Staff were friendly 
Room was clean and loved the rituals products 
Location is great cons: Complimentary water should‚Äôve been given in the room everyday for a 4 star hotel
Wasn‚Äôt told the rooftop was shut in April which is one of the reasons we booked this hotel so that was disappointing
pros: Beautiful hotel espumante on check-in everything was lovely! A bit sad we didn‚Äôt get to experience the rooftop bar as it‚Äôs renovating at the moment. cons:
pros: Liked the room and the location of the hotel cons: The rooftop bar was closed.  But the rooftop was open so overall not too bad.

pros: The staff at the property were really helpful and gave lots of good recommendations. The rooms were very comfortable and clean. cons: It was a shame that the roof terrace was closed for the duration of our stay. We weren‚Äôt informed on this before booking and it was one of the main reasons for booking the hotel.
pros: Loved everything about this hotel room location staff etc cons: Rooftop bar is seasonal...

pros: Very nice accommodation with lovely stuff clean nice rooms everything was excellent. Around 10 min to the citycenter near to the aerport . cons: Just the only one thing the barkeeper at the evening  was absolutely not motivated to work‚Ä¶.And please the cleaning ladys should  respect  if the towel is not on the floor do not change it ‚Ä¶.
pros: The food was lovely at breakfast cons: View from bedroom

pros: The room and decor. cons: When using ride app (e.g. Bolt) the positioning of the building can confuse the GPS location. There were occasions where the driver came to the back/side entrance which is on a completely different street.
pros: Very nice rooms & bathroom. Brunch very good cons: Street parking
pros: THE ROOM cons: NO PROBLEM WITH ANYTHING
pros: Location was great didn‚Äôt have time for breakfast. cons:

pros: I like that the hotel was able to accommodate our requests for a family of young children. Everyone was warm and understanding. cons: Bathrooms - needs to be updated especially the caulkings and the sink was not draining properly
pros: Quiet big room very convenient being right down town. cons:
pros: Everything! The room location staff and it is beautiful. It has been my favorite hotel so far in my travels to Europe. cons:
pros: Room and breakfast were excellent. Great location especially for Christmas markets and other tourist sights cons: NA
pros: Good stay and convenient. cons: Nil
pros: Excellent location extremely courteous and responsive staff comfortable rooms. All our special requests were accommodated by the hotel which made our stay worth remembering. cons:
pros: Location staff and room were very good cons: The water had a brownish color. There is probably something wrong with the plumbing

pros: My room was lovely and much larger than I anticipated based on photos. The location is in a safe quiet neighborhood close to the metro and lots of good restaurants. As a solo female traveler I was very glad I chose to stay here. cons: The breakfast was very good but a bit expensive for the offerings.

pros: This hotel lived up to all expectations. I spent my birthday there and was happy! Wonderful staff and attentive attitude exceptionally delicious breakfast very beautiful interior and convenient location. cons: A bathroom needs a little renovation but it's not critical.

pros: - Nice and friendly hotel staff. 

- Hotel looked very nice in general.
- Coffee and food was very good. 
- They decorated for Christmas which was very cozy. cons: - Top floor restaurant (the one with the nice view) was closed something I wish could be made more clear in advance.
- The hotel seemed to be a bit far away from everything but didn't mind the walk.
pros: Very stylish hotel with cozy and spacious rooms. Great location which is in a walking distance to the centre sights cons:

pros: Great location 
Excellent breakfast
Very helpful staff cons:

pros: The location was really good; not too far from the Main Street. cons: There really wasn‚Äôt anything I didn‚Äôt like about the hotel.  Everything was clean well taken care of and the staff was very friendly.
pros: Fantastic staff beautiful decor throughout the property very pleasant check-in/check-out experience cons:
pros: The boutique atmosphere of the hotel; view from the 10th floor proximity of the center of the city. cons: Room was rather warm but adjusted temperature the best we could.

pros: Personal touches...on arrival offered snacks water juice or champagne and luggage was taken as soon as arrived through the door.  Nothing was too much trouble including explaining about the area/transport/trips. 
The breakfast selection was outstanding best i have eaten.  Rooms clean comfortable and staff very polite.  Fruit and champagne in our room for our anniversary courtesy of hotel.  Lovely quiet area and 5 minutes walk to the metro. Would stay again. cons: Nothing.
pros: Fab location  very pretty boutique hotel cons: Service at breakfast could have been better and generally the breakfast overall was not up to my expectations for the price

pros: The staff was excellent. Their restaurant is amazing. Best dishes we had in Lisbon for sure. 
It‚Äôs a beautiful place very clean and comfortable. 
Location isn‚Äôt exceptional but it was good as well. 
Sure would stay there again. cons:
pros: Very clean comfy bed attentive staff and tasty snacks! Amazing rooftop scenery! cons: Loud could hear upstairs but may just be our room position
pros: Room was beautiful Service was great cons: Hotel Rooftop Bar Closed a bit early..

pros: Very kind and friendly staff good breakfast nice design of the hotel everting is clean and tidy. cons: We were really unlucky with the room: very small and gloomy with only one tiny window hidden in the corner.
Several of our friends had a much nicer bigger and brighter rooms in the same price category. 
So avoid staying at 708.

pros: Central location. Great room and breakfast. Lovely friendly staff. cons: Very little. However when we were leaving for the airport I ordered a taxi. A more expensive limo/Mercedes turned up. This obviously was considerably more expensive. This happened us once before in Budapest. I was not impressed.

pros: Location near metro

Loved Roof top view

Friendly restaurant staff

Great breakfasts cons: Roof top Bar closed October though. Would be good to host happy hour there for guests?
pros: Everywhere was fresh and clean.  Large size room.  Great dining room and food was good. cons: Bed was a little hard
pros: Great location with easy access to main roads. Ôøº Easily accessible to high-end shopping able to walk to local tourist spots easily. cons:
pros: Staff was nice great facilities suite room is very comfortable. cons: Breakfast could improve coffee should improve WiFi must improve.
pros: The staff was over the top!  Pleasant and attentive.  The rooms were exceptionally clean and stocked.  The bed was super comfortable. cons: nothing really.
pros: the room was really spacious confortable clean and charming cons: the check in was only at 15:00
pros: Rooftop bar rooms cons: Location could have been around more restaurants

pros: Breakfast was fabuleus very nice service excellent food lots of choises. The rooftopbar was nice lovelyplace to sit and relax. Rooms were very good lots of space and services like coffee thee pilows etc cons: The location was close to the expensive part of Lissabon if that is what you are searching for then you are at the perfect spot but if you want to really enjoy Lissabon at his best the location is a bit far from everything you always need a taxi or metro. The rooftopbar was nice but small very often it was full. I found it a nice stay but a little on the high price for what we got

pros: Great staff and a glass of champers on arrival made for a great start to our holiday in Lisbon. Lovely room with little extras that made you go awww that's nice. cons: I thought I had I booked a 2-bedroom room but is actually one good size room and a bed in the lounge. Didn't make difference as we spent little time in the room.
pros: Beautiful property!! cons:
pros:  cons: Location was a little far away from the buzz of Lisbon. However was easy and cheap to get a car to drive us into town.
pros: Beautiful rooms and lobby. Nice breakfast cons: Unfriendly or accommodating staff. The staff were also snobbish

pros: Everything including complimentary drinks and treats each day and service even after we had checked and then waited for hours for a late flight. cons: everything was great. Only issue was that roof top terrace and bar closed for a private function on our one night stay and that had attracted our booking.
pros: Well appointed room cons: Experienced Some noise in our from roof terrace diners in the evenings

pros: A delightful boutique hotel in a convenient location with in a short walk to the metro Marques de Pombal. Fantastic breakfast! Very comfortable beds. No noise from outside s√≥ slept very well. cons: Rooms rather small with limited storage space and not enough coat hangers plus limited space on dressing table/desk for the supplied coffee machine. The bathroom has no bidet or ventilation/fan and a shelf for toiletries would be better. The air conditioning doesn‚Äôt go below 19 degrees so when it‚Äôs very hot in summer it would be good to have fans in the rooms too. Lack of sleep is detrimental to health. The window in the room didn‚Äôt open.
pros: Location roof top bar cons:
pros: Clean tastefully decorated hotel in the heart of Lisbon. cons: Very small windows

pros: The Hotel staff and location was wonderful. From the time we checked in to the time we left we were always greeted with great service. Antonio was wonderful. The rooftop was nice and our room and hotel was nice and clean. cons: The water in the shower turned warm to cold at certain times but overall our experience was good.

pros: Great location near popular attractions. Even though it‚Äôs in a busy part of the city the hotel is very quiet. It was clean and the staff was superbly accommodating! cons: We had no complaints.

pros: Lovely clean hotel lovely welcome drink and canap√©s on arrival. Minibar in room nice size and lovely big bathroom. Location about 30 minutes walk to centre but plenty of Ubers about. Staff were friendly and helpful would highly recommend this hotel. cons: Nothing

pros: My favorite hotel in Lisbon after trying two others. I really enjoy coming back to the H10 it is absolutely lovely. The rooftop terrace is a huge plus! It is so nice to have a drink up there and take in the view. The service at the front desk is outstanding I mean 5-star hotel quality. I was given great advice on where to get my iPhone repaired I followed the advice and got my problem fixed in minutes. Great job! Really good breakfast a buffet with hot items to order. Really nice doorman who helps with luggage. i cannot wait to come back. cons:
pros: Gorgeous hotel in a great location. The breakfast was amazing and the staff was very nice. cons: The room we had was a bit small
pros: Beautiful and comfortable cons: Need more PowerPoints especially in bathroom

pros: The rooftop terrace bar had a great ambience and view of the city. Our room was clean and comfortable and they went above and beyond with the amenities as this was our honeymoon. cons: Their parking garage was full so we had to park our rental car on the street which was paid parking during the day in two-hour increments. This was the only difficulty and it wasn‚Äôt the hotel‚Äôs fault. Everything else was wonderful!

pros: Great location just five mins walk to the Grand Avenue through the heart of the city. Panoramic view is just as good as in the pics. Great breakfast. Lovely room and very comfortable bed. Wonderful staff I am staying here on business two more times this autumn and am happy about that. cons:

pros: Hotel is in perfect position to visit Lisbon the room was big the breakfast service is very good the staff is friendly . Parking also good . cons: The room was a bit dark with lack of natural light due to the fact that it is exposed only on one side  with other buildings very very close . Would be nice to have an higher floor room.

pros: Wonderful location just a block off the most beautiful and biggest avenue in the city. Right near the big park. Beautiful lobby and restaurant the rooftop bar is killer! Super comfy king beds high end linens really good bathroom. cons:

pros: Great hotel. Room and hotel were very clean and comfortable. Lighting was great in the rooms and the rooftop view was a nice treat. Close to the metro station which made getting into town and back easy for us cons: The front desk charged us extra since we were a couple which wasn't disclosed up front. The food at the rooftop isn't very good but the drinks are fine
pros: Perfect cons: Breakfast system is weird
pros: Location and staff were perfect cons:
pros: Beautifully decorated hotel. Location was great! Rooftop terrace was lovely. Our rooms were spacious and comfortable. cons: Parking was confusing to get to then we couldn‚Äôt find a spot.

pros: Great location hotel was well decorated with a good use of space. Rooms were small but well equipped and therefore spacious cons: Carpets in hallway smelt due to vacuum cleaner not being cleaned
pros:  cons: No irons for use
pros: It was super clean and the room was pretty good. cons: There was a restaurant at the entrance with dominant manager who really have direct orders. We did not feel comfortable.
pros: Everything perfect cons: No
pros: Location was great and staff were helpful cons: Can not fault anything
pros: Authentic Portuguese interior beautiful breakfast and dining area cons: Towels could be new and more comfortable

pros: Loved the cleanliness and the boutique style hotel. Plus there rooftop is amazing!!! Super clean and the rooms are gorgeous. cons: I wish they would provide the parking address for garage because they are on a main street and not easy to get your luggage out in front of hotel. Plus there is no staff at door when guests arrive to let them know where did she go park. If they don‚Äôt give you address you will not find garage. Also it‚Äôs limited parking and a bit narrow and not easy to park.
pros:  cons: The air conditioning did not work properly

pros: Beautiful hotel within walking distance from the city center of Lisbon. 
I loved the decoration of the hotel very bright and chic with these stunning blue tiles. 
The room was a bit small but I think that is the standard for most Europe capitals! On the other hand the bathroom was quite roomy. Both were beautifully decorated. 
The breakfast was excellent and there is free bubbly! 
The rooftop is very cute although much smaller than I had imagined based on photographs. 
There is bubbly cake and pasteis de nata available at the reception at all time!! What more can you ask for! cons: The rooftop is open to the public and busy during the weekend. On the first night we were turned away without much regard for the fact that we were hotel guests (they could have offered to call in the room when a table became available for example). The rooftop also closes pretty early. 
No gym.
pros: The room had everything it needs. Nice comfortable shower. Beautiful view from the rooftop bar. cons: The view from the room was meh.
pros: Decor & size of room n rooftop bar cons:

pros: Beautifully designed elegant lobby with helpful staff having smile on their face ready to go an extra mile making the guests experience pleasant and unique. We are a family with 2 littles ones 2 and 5. We found the room spacious with all you need plus a nice motivating note every day delivered under the door! So thoughtful!  
Breakfast was great having the variety you need for kids also. Location is perfect close to Metro and in front of a supermarket! I became a member and sure will check H10 as the first option in the next destination. 
I think they shall get 5 Star! (Specially seeing our previous Hotel in Amsterdam holding a 5 Star while deserving a 3 Star) cons: All was perfect!
pros: Breakfast was wonderful! The room was ready before 12! cons:
pros: gorgeous hote.  staff were amazing.  roof top bar very cool cons:

pros: The hotel is conveniently located at 5 minutes walk from a metro station and a lot of bus stops. Very beautiful quiet and spacious rooms. Very friendly staff. I recommend the rooftop bar for a drink (or two). The view is beautiful with the Tagus at a distance. cons: Although the breakfast buffet is well furnished the hot dishes (pancakes omelets ...) need to be ordered and the portion is a bit small to my taste.

pros: Lovely bar area with nice comfortable seats bedrooms spacious clean with a comfortable large bed & sheets changed daily 
Bathroom is nice with a good shower but tiling in shower & silicone joint around the shower tray both inside & outside of the cubicle needs replaced & tiles inside shower could do soya good cleaning cons: Service in both rooftop bar & main bar dreadfully slow

pros: Excellent location; great helpful staff; fabulous check in; really great roof top bar. Enjoyed our stay immensely. cons: The bar was hired out for private functions on several nights. Tough if you were only staying on those nights and couldn't make use of it.

pros: Excellent buffet breakfast but a little over priced @ $25.00 euros per person.
Excellent toiletries & comfy bed & lovely linens.
We enjoyed amazing cocktails on the rooftop. 
All staff were friendly and very helpful with recommendations and answering our questions. cons: We had 2 large pieces + 1 carry on  of luggage and wanted a second luggage rack. We were told the hotel was unable to provide a second rack. That seems kind of crazy. We can‚Äôt be the first people with lots of luggage!

pros: The decor rooftop terrace & hospitality from staff. The location was great too. 20mins walk from the main square & city attractions. cons: The AC was slow to kick in taken hours to fully get cold.
pros: Lovely hotel large room and bathroom all beautifully decorated. The restaurant had very nice food too. Would definitely stay here again. cons:
pros: Lovely place. Awesome rooms. Perfect location. Friendly staff excellent breakfast cons: Restaurant too expensive

pros: Excellent view
Continent location 
Nice decoration 
Outstanding breakfast cons: Nothing

pros: Location very good 
Decor very good 
Terrace bar very good cons: Car parking hard to find it‚Äôs on a road underneath 
Staff directions were incorrect 
Parking cost is high

pros: Upon arrival there was complimentary snacks egg tarts and sparkling wine. Check in was fast and efficient. The room was really wonderful and clean. Staff was very helpful and friendly. Location of the hotel was superb. cons: too short our stay. :(
pros: Decor roof top bar around 6 pm. Staff was very nice cons:
pros: Nice decorative small cute hotel. Located close enough to everything but not too close so you can have quiet nights when you‚Äôre off to sleep‚Ä¶ cons: Sometimes I could hear the neighbor guest
pros: Breakfast excellent with a lot of things on offer bed extremely comfy room clean and spacious beautiful rooftop bar cons: Not much not to like

pros: Everything is carefully curated for a wonderful experience: it was our second time staying at Duque de Loule and it definitely didn't disappoint. Clean spacious rooms with comfy beds and a large bathtub lovely room service ‚Äì including a special birthday surprise! ‚Äì kind and attentive staff great location and views and the cherry on top is the amazing rooftop bar. cons:
pros: Beautiful property staff extremely nice helpful and polite. Will definitely be back every time I‚Äôm back in Lisbon. cons:
pros: very friendly staff good location with metro in easy reach nice rooms clean! great breakfast. Would definitely return cons:
pros: Hotel was very clean and comfortable with very good breakfast cons: Staff were not quiet as knowledgeable as we thought for giving advice on local visits / transport

pros: Rooms were beautiful. Front desk staff was friendly and accommodating. Beautiful neighborhood with all the fancy stores. cons: Dinner in the lobby bar/restaurant was disappointing.  Rooftop bar was closed for a private function one evening and the other evening it was closed by 9:30 pm so we couldn't enjoy the view.
pros: Ability to park my car securely cons:

pros: Nothing ! cons: The environment of the hotel is amazing  perfect location in a not very busy street  but only few minutes walk you can reach  a nearby Metro station ÔºÅ Everying is very clean.   The staff in the restaurant is very polite breakfast is wonderful among all hotels I stayed before!
pros: Beautiful hotel with stunning rooftop bar. couldn‚Äôt be faulted. cons:

pros: Loved the Terrace and the beautiful view. Room size was amazing!! cons: Not anything you can do about this. Taxis sometimes had a hard time finding the address.  Maybe a little far for walking Old Town but not impossible. Hiking back (uphill) we would sometimes poop out and get a taxi.
pros: Location Interior Staff - Everything really. cons: Nothing I can think about. Was probably one of my best experience in Hotel!

pros: Lovely hotel. The style of the place was very traditional with lots of blue tiles. Breakfast was excellent with lots of choice and great quality and presentation. There was a small shop a few yards away for cold drinks and the like. Right by the metro which we used for getting to/from the airport and other trips - great service. cons: Nothing really other than it was a bit out of the centre was a bit of a walk back at night after a day out.

pros: H10 was an amazing hotel. Our room was fab with plenty of space for 3 adults and extremely comfortable beds. There was lots  of choice for breakfast.  Drinks on the rooftop terrace was a great experience with views right down to the waterfront. 
Staff were always friendly and very helpful. 
We hope to visit again one day cons:
pros: The Hotel was perfection. Location staff food we couldn‚Äôt fault it. cons:
pros: intimacy cons: roof garden not always open eg just to sit and watch the stats after an evening out

pros: location was very good just off the Main Street . the hotel was absolutely lovely utilizing portugese tiles etc. and our room was very nice. we didn‚Äôt include our breakfast in the package but it looked very good! cons: although I did the booking on this site I was given a less desirable room than our group - still lovely but they were in a suite? rooftop bar is much smaller than the photo makes it appear but a gorgeous view. our taxi booked for the next morning was supposed to accommodate two couples with luggage and this wasn‚Äôt what showed up- had to wait for a new one .
pros: Nice hotel with basement parking nice decor comfortable room. Location good but outside old town but good for hop on hop off bus cons: Nothing to complain about
pros: Beautiful boutique hotel with great views from rooftop bar]. Breakfast was wonderful.  Staff was superb. cons: No 120 volt outlets in room for higher voltage hair brushes.

pros: staff were great. very stylish hotel. breakfast was good.  terrific top floor patio bar. cons: no a/c. location is away from tourist areas which is both good and bad however there are good restaurants close by and a metro station a short walk away.

pros: friendly helpful staff 
good location cons: mattress was lumpy in the middle. we seemed to be the only ones without breakfast included.

pros: The room was clean and characterfully decorated in keeping with traditional Portuguese interior style.  The breakfast selection was excellent and the cooked breakfast very good.  The service was second to none and all of the staff very pleasant professional and helpful.  The evening meals in the A La Carte restaurant were superb.  The top floor roof terrace and bar is also a treat.  The general ambience of the of the hotel was one of style individuality and sophistication. cons: For the price paid I would have expected a room with a view on one of the higher floors.  As it was I had two quite small windows one looking out onto a tiny terrace and the other looking out onto a rather unattractive side street.  Whilst Booking.com advertises the rooms as fully sound proof as with most accommodation in heritage buildings this was not the case.

pros: Our room was nice. Good amount of space. cons: The address on google/websites is wrong. So we were dropped at the bottom of a large set up stairs. The shower was not cleaned well. The first day we were missing towels. We've stayed at h10 hotels before and it wasn't up to standards.

pros: I liked the location close to restaurants and downtown area. The staff was friendly and helpful. cons: Small room on the top floor. Fortunately I was a single. It would be hard to have two people in the room.

pros: Absolutely everything. Friendly helpful staff exceptionally clean great rooms and comfy beds amazing breakfast and the jewel in the crown has to be the rooftop terrace and the most wonderful view over Lisbon. cons: Absolutely nothing.
pros: fantastic location close to all locations of interest and a real luxury quality. The rooftop bar was stunning and we enjoyed aperitifs every night of our stay. cons: Everything was perfect.
pros: Excellent location beautiful hotel. We were greeted and offered sparkling wine or water and pastries. cons: The rooftop bar is stunning however the service is slow.
pros: Great deagim and rooftop terrace. cons: Everything was perfect.
pros: good location knowledge staff cons: more coffee on room
pros: everything cons:

pros: Beautiful rooms and design of the hotel in general. Very helpful staff and the breakfast is truly amazing worth the extra dime. cons: Not a fault of the hotel but when ordering or taking a taxi as the hotel is split between 2 street level the taxi light arrive or take you from below the bridge instead in front at the main entrance.
pros: immaculate hotel fabulous roof terrace cons: a bit of a walk from river but still ok

pros: Service was great rooms were clean and pretty. Breakfast was amazing! cons: We booked a bigger room and they accidentally double booked it so we didn't get the suite we wanted. They provided free breakfast during our stay to make up for the mistake.
pros: stunning views gorgeous decor spacious rooms cons: quite noisy walls were paper thin & I think we were right beside the laundry room
pros: lovely rooms equipped with everything you need comfy beds and spacious bathrooms. it is clean the hotel staff is friendly. I would absolutely recommend. cons:
pros: We enjoyed our stay at the hotel.  The staff was very helpful and the breakfast was very good.  The hotel was in a good location for us. cons:
pros: Breakfast was excellent! The hotel was beautiful and staff were wonderful! cons:
pros: Beautiful hotelgreat breakfastvery clean cons: Everything was great

pros: Room was spacious and nice. We enjoyed the roof top bar good view with atmosphere to match. The location of the property was great for access to the city and metro it was also perfectly located for a walk around the Parque Edwardo VII which we really enjoyed. cons: Some areas of flooring were not fitted completely i.e. gaps however this didn't cause us any issues or concerns

pros: Lovely room.
Lots of choice for breakfast 
Glass of sparkling wine on arrival cons: On 2 separate occasions at breakfast we were given the menu to choose a cooked item but no one came back to take the order. We had to chase this up but think it‚Äôs a training issue

pros: Loved the size of the rooms the cleanliness and how comfortable the beds we‚Äôre. Great wardrobe space and a glass of champagne on arrival to all guests!! cons: Roof top bar was very slow when we ordered cocktails. Little out of the way from main attractions but bus route near and taxis cheap

pros: The decor ambience and welcome drinks made a difference especially after a long hot day! The rooftop bar is definitely one of the highlights. cons: The food we had for dinner and lunch was quite disappointing especially for what we paid.

pros: Lovely decor throughout the hotel. Clean and tidy. Helpful staff. Also a beautiful roof top bar with what should be a lovely view over the city. cons: The hotel is about 30 mins walk out of the city centre which is probably a bit more than is ideal. Also despite not being the hotel's fault the Lisbon skyline is currently littered with cranes due to building projects which do distract from the views.
pros: Room service continental breakfast was terrific cons: Bathroom was ofd lay out.  Hard to use tub. Sink too small and glass divider dangerous if you get up at night

pros: The room was much bigger than expected the view was excellent and the hotel in general great. I also loved the bath and how fresh and new everything felt. cons: While the sound dampening from outside was exceptional the inside walls were paper thin. I could hear not just the talking from nearby rooms but also the snoring of a fellow occupant!
pros: Room great and view of terass really nice. Good breakfast and nice reception crew cons: everything was satisfying

pros: The breakfast was incredible and so many delicious
 options! cons: Some of the front office staff seemed a little confused.
pros: excellent location amazing staff the views from the roof top bar were incredible. cons: I don‚Äôt have anything that I could find fault with.

pros: loved the room the linens were fine the nespresso excellent the location near eduardo park and avenida libertad was wonderful. The staff were also very helpful and friendly everyone's English was excellent and they were readily available. Our room was well taken care of - really appreciated the staff. cons: the street the hotel is on doesn't offer much in the way of cafes ambience greenery etc. The hairdryer in the bathroom was dirty and the attached cord was too short for a person taller than 5 feet and it didn't function well. The terrace bar though very attractive was over crowded.

pros: Lovely room on 8th floor - very quiet. We had a separate sitting area which was great. Lots of space. Bathroom had a good hairdryer shower gel shampoo etc.
It was husbands birthday while we were there and the hotel surprised us with a bottle of cava and a birthday cake - very thoughtful.
Rooftop bar provides nice views across the city to the river and beyond. Great for pre-dinner drinks cons:

pros: Decor was nice. Room was clean. Housekeeping was thorough. We were also able to check in hours earlier than was scheduled. cons: I wish the rooftop bar was open. It was one of the main reasons for booking this hotel.

pros: location
decor
ambiance cons:

pros: The service staff were always happy to help and very attentive. All facilities were excellent and the rooftop bar is an added bonus - would highly recommend to others and would happily stay again. cons: N/a
pros: very close to public transport and most of Lisbon's main attractions. cons: Difficult to park

pros: clean hotel nicely sized clean rooms. lovely rooftop bar area. staff helpful and polite cons: you have to take the elevator downstairs and bring your own drinks to take with you on the rooftop bar!! why do they not have someone working there.

pros: The decor was exquisite. Stunning rooms great lobby to relax in and the dining room was beautiful. The rooftop was amazing. We sat there and enjoyed the views. cons: It didn‚Äôt have any spa facilities. that would be a great addition.

pros: beautiful hotel with excellent facilities cons:

pros: design super bed and bathroom. very quiet. coffee machine chocolate and biscuits water every day. cons: nothing

pros: This hotel is absolutely gorgeous inside and out! We travelled from Canada and Lisbon was our first stop in Portugal. We stayed here for 2 nights in February. It was a very short walking distance from the train. I can‚Äôt say enough good things. I didn‚Äôt want to leave and will definitely be back one day! cons:
pros: Great staff and beautiful architecture cons: the restaurant don‚Äôt offer lunch and bathtub wasn‚Äôt working

When we booked we were really excited about the bar looking over the city - but each night (3 nights we stayed!) we went up only to find a sign saying it was closed for an event - it would‚Äôve been nice for the hotel staff to mention that and perhaps offer a complimentary drink in the lobby area.

pros: Beautifully designed comfortable. bright charming room extra-friendly staff.  To-order breakfast included. cons: The location felt more out of the way than it actually was.  (Taxi had trouble finding it on way from airport.) Two blocks or so from Pombal Square.

pros: Excellent service.. staff were brilliant and so helpful. Left a rose and Lindt chocolates in our room on valentines Day which was a nice surprise.. highly recommend. cons: Nothing everything was great

pros: beautiful rooms 1 block from Av Libertade cons:

Hotel is very near metro station which makes it easy to get around. cons: Location is slightly outside of main touristy areas which meant it was quieter but had to travel into those areas for more lively restaurants and bars as we travelled during winter.
pros: Interior design is very classy cons:

pros: The staff at the front desk was very helpful.

pros: The bed was comfortable not too firm
Clean

Ac worked

It's a 7min walk but can seem longer with luggage because you have to climb a hill.

pros: The stay exceeded my expectations. Two weeks before I had stayed in H10 Montcada in Barcelona which was more on the terrible side. However H10 Duque de Loule has great spacious rooms. Breakfast is mostly a la carte with a small buffet. The breakfast menu has plenty of options and was very good and efficient. Not to mention that the breakfast area is cosy and beautifully decorated. Location is very good if you want to stay out of the chaotic city center. cons: Check-in process must be improved as it took too much time (around 15 min). I had some friends in two other rooms and they experienced the same.

pros: the interiors are very nice the staff were friendly and helpful good breakfast cons: could improve the gluten free options at breakfast and somehow highlight the fact that when you order poached eggs at breakfast you‚Äôll have to wait ok everything is made to order but then you‚Äôll get just 1 egg‚Ä¶

pros: Stunning modern and bright bedrooms. Everywhere was spotlessly clean. Lovely friendly and helpful staff. Very central location. cons: At ‚Ç¨21 per person per day I felt breakfast was too expensive.

pros: I am a very demanding type and for this I can say that the H10 Duque de Loule organization has met all my expectations. thank you very much for helping to make my stay in Portugal enjoyable cons:

pros: everything! the front desk staff were particularly helpful and accommodating cons: The only complaint we had were the tv channels. Nothing in English. everywhere else we stayed in Lisbon and Portugal had an English movie channel - Chanel Hollywood - and it was a nice option.
pros: staff was excellent amazing hotel! cons:
pros: Very nice hotel great breakfast lovely helpful staff very clean and comfortable. Great location for getting around. Thats all you need cons: Nothing

pros: Great location very close to the metro. The room was very spacious clean and had everything we needed. The bed was comfortable and provided a good night sleep. The bathroom was clean in great condition and with toiletries from Rituals. I would definitely stay here again. cons: N/A

pros: Breakfast was amazing. 
Location was okay. Walk to Rossio Square is 20 minutes more or less. Don't waste your money on taxi. Use uber instead. The most I liked was the front desk staff. At least 3 of them helped to plan my trip. They suggested good restaurants helped with calling to make reservations. Ask them for help!! They also give you an excellent map of Lisbon. They were truely fantastic. FYI Thursdays they have Fado performance and dinner available at the hotel but reserve with the front desk in advance as they can't accommodate all guests. cons: Some of the waiting staff at breakfast. In particular this blondie who checks people in. Fix your face and your attitude.

pros: very clean and friendly staff. terrace bar was great. cons: bit of a walk to the main part of Lisbon. only 20 minutes but when you are doing it several times a day! also the third night the terrace bar was closed for a private function.

pros: This hotel was stunning. Beautiful and from the moment I entered the door staff were extremely helpful and warm - till the very end of my stay! Recep staff were great as well and the room was HUGE. Spacious lovely little bay window huge comfy bed sparkling clean toilets. The rooftop terrace was amazing to chill and watch the sunset. cons: Room walls were quite thin once everyone woke up the next morning I could hear the activity outside. Didn't bother me however. The rooftop terrace also gets crowded fairly quickly as it's small so you will want to head up early.
pros: it was very clean and comfy cons: lack of advertised gym

pros: Location was great for us yes it‚Äôs a little further out but the walk into town is great.

We were upgraded room was big beautifully appointed and bed was very comfortable.

Rooftop bar is excellent. cons: Check in was a bit all over the show think there was a big group checking in so it felt haphazard.

Breakfast was disappointing. Service was terrible staff were miserable expect for one. Choice in buffet was not to my taste‚Ä¶no fresh granola. I ordered poached eggs on toast and received one runny egg on a scone same with pancakes‚Ä¶only 1 received. 

Also response from reception on a couple of occasions was slow or non existent. Tried to call down one evening and after 3 attempts gave in.
pros: Beautiful hotel. Staff exceptional. Lovely spacious room for 3 of us. cons: No pool.
pros: the staff was excellent and very helpful. cons: can‚Äôt think of anything.

pros: Everything was so clean comfortable and nice. Antonio the gentleman who dealt with the taxis and luggage and other things was really so helpful as were all of the staff. cons: The map to the parking garage was a laminated sheet that needed to stay at the front desk. If there were a paper or QR code or something one could take along to have directions that would be helpful for guests who are unfamiliar with Lisbon.
pros: Great facility and friendly helpful staff. Enjoyed the rooftop bar. cons:
pros: The staff was very friendly and helpful. They accommodated an early check in which exceeded expectations. There was no additional charge for the service. cons:
pros: Staff v friendly. Bed v comfortable. Rooftop bar lovely and tasty food! cons: Didn‚Äôt love the location seemed bit far away from both train stations Chiado and all the food/eating scene.
pros: The room and the decor were outstanding. The most beautiful room I've ever stayed in and this is not an exaggeration! cons:
pros: We requested a king size bed and our room was very spacious. Great view!!! cons: Only take away would be that the property did not have a pool area or spa.
pros: Lovely hotel and staff cons:
pros: The room was very nice and spacious and the breakfast spread was great cons: Nothing

pros: This hotel's central location was perfect for accessing all of the points of interest shops and restaurants within a short walk.
The property is beautifully restored and very comfortable. The sunsets from the rooftop bar were one of the highlights of our trip.
The breakfast menu was generous and varied in its selections. cons: The hotel uses a very strong air deodorizer which at first seemed pleasant but became almost offensive in its intensity.
My suggestion is if you have a sensitive nose as I do to ask the staff to use the product sparingly. The property is well maintained and extremely clean so there's very little need for a product such as an 'air freshener'

pros: Very well done inside perhaps recently refurbished our room was lovely. Best ever bed!! Very warm welcome and great staff. Enjoyed the rooftop bar. cons: Not much!  A little noise from adjacent rooms perhaps soundproofing not the best. Minor niggle as we generally slept well over our four nights.
pros: The location of the hotel is very central the staff is AMAZING! Very friendly and helpful especially Martin. cons:
pros: Beautifully designed comfortable rooms good food lovely staff. cons: No gym facilities.

pros: Hotel smells spectacular with a great rooftop bar. 
Thanks to Jennifer at the front desk for being so 
great with her restaurant recommendations! cons: Nothing loved this hotel
pros: The overall hotel was exactly why we like to stay in a boutique hotel! Personable helpful and generous answering all of our question! cons:

pros: Love this hotel smells gorgeous. Lovely welcome by staff with snacks and sparkling wine. Check in fast and help with bags been taken to room. Lovely rooftop bar. Breakfast lovely! Room and hotel decorated lovely. Felt luxurious! It is a bit of a walk from the main centre but we knew this as we‚Äôve been before and thought it was worth it for this lovely hotel! cons: Rooftop closed at 10pm on Friday. We just got engaged so came back to hotel about 10.15 with the idea to continue celebrating on the rooftop but it was closed.
pros: The staff were very welcoming and pleasant cons:

pros: Location was very convenient  also good connection to the airport with the Metro. Rooms  were very relaxing excellent beds.  Then the roofbar is a little haven amazing views and great drinks & food.  
Very nice staff especially the gentleman in concierge/ front desk. cons: Not much I can think of perhaps coffee and tea facilities in room was not served with milk only cream.

pros: OMG is all I can say. Amazing staff you were greeted going and coming. The room is so freaky cute love the sitting area overlooking the city.  The rooftop bar drinks and view we‚Äôre on point! cons:
pros: Very nice setting cons:
pros: The room the lobby the terrace the restaurant and the staff cons:
pros: Comfiest beds in the world great breakfast very attentive and professional staff super clean. cons:

pros: The hotel was clean quiet and comfortable. The lobby and rooms were elegantly decorated with lots of blue and white. Our room was a corner room with two windowseats. The bathroom was spacious. Convenient to the metro. cons: The location - at the top of the Avenida da Liberdade - is not as convenient to many of the tourist sites. I wish the rooftop bar stayed open later.
pros: location neat great staff cons:
pros: Quiet location but still close to all things. Great breakfast lovey rooms and decor of the hotel! The staff were AMAZING! cons:

pros: Room was comfortable and clean. Dinner was delightful and rooftop bar was perfect at the end of the day for a glass of wine and tapas. cons:

pros: Fab location beautiful hotel and a hotel I would recommend. cons: Parking not free for the price point. Also directions to the parking is highly unclear. Didn't like the fact that at 12:05pm while we were headed to the reception to check out the staff were calling non stop to request us to leave the room. Note that checkout is at 12pm. Poor end to a great stay

pros: We really enjoyed our stay  the hotel is in a great location . on arrival we were early and we were greeted with Prosecco and a choice of pastries   one room was ready so we dropped our luggage off and went to the roof top bar . a lovely place to sit and enjoy the view . 
All staff are very friendly and helpful . 
our room was spacious  very clean and the bed was really comfortable . 
There was a great choice for breakfast . 
All in all we had a very enjoyable stay and would stay again if we return to Lisbon . we definitely recommend this hotel. cons:

pros: Breakfast was amazing as was the location. The hotel was very nice and we would stay there again. cons: The bar tenders didn't really know how to make drinks but we think they were learning.  They were though very nice!

pros: The hotel is a great location to the metro and walking distance of the main attractions. It's a beautiful hotel. The lobby has amazing tile work and the restaurant for breakfast had a great selection. The staff was very attentive and helpful with any questions we had. The valet was excellent.
