pros: It was a first time to Lisbon for us. It was very wonderful hotel in the beautiful city. Hotel stuff hospitality was amazing and very kind. We had nice breakfast in the restaurant and quick drink in the bar. It really tasted good. I love the city after I spend time in the hotel. cons: Not in particular. Just one point would be the room was not so large but we understood the location was the center of the city. No problem at all.

pros: I had a gorgeous room - better than expected with a sweet balcony to view the streets below - and see all that Lisbon has to offer. Everyone was incredibly friendly - and went above and beyond to make sure I had a comfortable stay. They all spoke English they made sure I had everything I needed to be comfortable and added extra lovely touches - like a voucher for the rooftop bar some pastries and port in my room and *more* than I'd need to be happy! Thank you so much! I'll be back!! :) cons: n/a
pros: Location and pet friendly. Staff very friendly and efficient. cons:
pros: Everything cons:
pros: A terrace with an exceptional view of the city! You can spend an entire day here without getting bored. The service is outstanding both at the bar and in the restaurant. cons:
pros: Roof Top Bar cons: Nada
pros: Very Good Location. Hotel staff were very friendly and helpful. Overall it was a pleasant experience. cons: Breakfast had limited options and was not that good
pros: We absolutely love this hotel  the location  the staff  everything !!! cons: Nothing

pros: Perfect location with quick access to all transportation options within a 10 minute walk including train to Sintra Metro (Subway) San Justa lift electrico (Tram 28) and funiculars. Hotel staff are phenomenal breakfast is fantastic rooftop bar/ restaurant views will make you want to linger and food and drinks are a great reason to stay a little longer. Rooms are smallish but comfortable and well appointed. Highly recommend and we will be back. cons: Rooms on the small side with no space if you‚Äôre traveling with a lot of luggage and no seating except on the bed.

pros: Excellent lux hotel to enjoy all what Lisabon has to offer - you are right in the center and can see city & sea from the terrace easy walking to all locations and railway station close for further trips. cons: We could wish for wider meat dish selection in hotel restaurant but the entrecot was perfect! Breakfast was just perfect and wide selection of all imaginable.

pros: Most of all we loved the staff. Very warm and caring. We were very pleasantly surprised by finding champagne and cake in the room on my birthday. The location is excellent and right next to Metro and Rossio train station making it very convenient to commute to everywhere. Overall had an excellent stay. It is 10/10 rating from us. cons: There is nothing not to like.
pros: excellent location.  Staff very friendly. most comfy beds. cons:

pros: The stuff is greatat the reception at the entrance and at breakfast.  I loved the roof top.if I could give 100 i would but you don't give the possibility LOL. It was perfect.the location is perfect.all was perfect.just the lights in the shower can be less bright..and the windows don't stop the noise from the street but I slept great.just for people who have problems with noise of cars...I will return to this hotel cons: The light in the shower can be reduced :) just a small remark I forgot to mention
pros: location was great cons: the room was pretty! but very dusty
pros: The warmth of the staff cons: The rooms a bit small

pros: A top hotel with a perfect location in Lisbon with a beautiful view at the top. 
Very friendly staff everywhere.  
We appreciated very much that someone could take care of the car and park it as well as the possibility to have breakfast in the room cons:

pros: The hotel‚Äôs central location in Lisbon was perfect offering a sensational view of the plaza right from our bedroom. The rooftop bar was another highlight providing a magnificent panorama of the city rooftops and a breathtaking sunset.
It‚Äôs worth noting that the staff serving breakfast were very friendly and sensational. cons: I didn‚Äôt have any particular issues with my stay but I did feel slightly watched whenever entering or leaving the premises. I understand this might be necessary for security reasons given the hotel‚Äôs location. Aside from that everything else was excellent.
pros: Location cons:

pros: Location is superb for access to the nearby train station and the city in general. Many landmarks and tremendous restaurants all within walking distance. Room was spacious clean and well appointed with a beautiful view overlooking Santa Maria Maior. Breakfasts included were outstanding with very pleasant and attentive service staff present. Rooftop cocktail bar is outstanding and the drinks are next level. cons: Only issue was the draining of our shower which was a but slow. We had requested having the issue serviced but the problem was not resolved. Definitely not a deal breaker but would have been nice to have been resolved.

pros: All the staff from front desk to bar to room attendants were wonderful very friendly and went out of their way to satisfy any of our needs. cons: At the cost of the room we would have appreciated breakfast included.  Otherwise everything was perfec.
pros: Locationstaff room size shower cons: NA
pros: Location and cleanliness and fast internet cons: Our room was tiny not what you‚Äôd expect from a five star hotel.
pros: Amazing location amazing staff! Couldn‚Äôt do enough for us. Would 100% come back thanks guys!!! cons: Nothing
pros: Very good location in center of Lisboa. Roof Top restaurant is fantastic. Very good breakfast. Excellent sea food in the restaurant. cons:
pros: The location was amazing. Great views over the city. Amazing room super helpful staff and very cool rooftop bar. cons: Everything was amazing.
pros: Location was amazing in the center cons: Nothing

pros: The complimentary drinks and snacks served at the lobby bar that is very rare to get. The rooftop bar had some lovely views of Lisbon. The staff were very friendly and made our stay pleasant. The location of the property was excellent near everything we wanted. We asked of restaurant recommendations and the lady on reception was very kind to give us a list of local spots to try. cons: At we were first time visitors the staff could of done more to promote their wonderful city

pros: The staff were amazing! The location was perfect. The rooftop bar is a special place. The scenery out the window  hearing the hustle and bustle. Loved! cons: The rooms are very dated. Carpet. Aged pleather headboards. Dark and very 1990s

pros: Location was great - towards the bottom of main street sop connecting well to the harbour and to the park higher up. There is a metro stop right outside the hotel. Room was nice and clean and even though on the street was very quiet. cons: No complaints

pros: Everything was Perfect starting from a quick Check in We got an Upgrade which was Fantastic The Room was clean and They Even  prepared Beds for The Night. Breakfast was very good nothing was missing. Very Attentive and Friendly Personell Location was The best walking distance to Most of The Attractions Gastrobar was Top notch with The Most Amazing View of Lissabon Christine at The Gastrobar attended to us She is such a Sweetheart with her Friendly welcoming Art We Are definitely coming back again cons: Nothing everything was Perfekt
pros: well located nice property nice room good food cons: a little expensive access to pool at sister property is a chargeable item on top of your room rate if you use it.
pros: Everyone made us feel very special cons:

pros: Everything - firstly the staff were all so friendly from the door men to reception cleaners and serving staff on the roof top- such lovely people. 
Then the room was fantastic location perfect as well. It was perfect and we would definitely stay again cons: Nothing
pros: location and roof top cons:

pros: This was my second time at Altis Avenida and once again it did not dissappoint me. The localisation is more than perfect the views from the rooftop bar are amazing. The breakfast buffet is very good. The hotel is very clean the staff is very helpful. I would recommend this place without any hesitation. cons:
pros: Nice touch to have custard and chocolates upon arrival cons: The shower should have full vs half doors. Hard to prevent water from leaking.
pros: The service was excellent.  Rooms very clean  awesome surprise with desert and porto wine.  The roof top bar incredible service very attentive service. cons:

pros: Julia at the concierge desk was just an incredible help and very very kind. Everybody there made us feel so welcome. The room is lovely. The location was fabulous. The restaurant was great. I would write an absolute 10.
!! cons: Loved everything about it 
I often travel solo although not this time and when I did go to the restaurant alone or any place in the hotel alone I was still made to feel incredibly welcome
pros: Central location. Rooftop bar and sun deck. Large room with balcony on upgrade. cons: Crowded breakfast.
pros: Location was fantastic cons: Great staff always friendly and helpful üëç
pros: Clean and centrally located courteous & helpful staff rooftop restaurant has excellent views although we could not enjoy outdoors due to continuous rains cons: Everything was perfect..

pros: Very well located. The room was very nice with comfortable bed luxurious linens and a large bathroom. Breakfast was very good. Beautiful roof top bar and restaurant. The service in the hotel and all of the staff were outstanding. They went above and beyond to help with excellent dinner recommendations and were very helpful with taxi transfer to the airport. cons:

pros: The location was excellent. We were walking distance to all of the sites. The rooftop bar was amazing and had fantastic views. The staff was very helpful and friendly. cons: The breakfast was a little pricey when there are so many great cafe's outside the door.

pros: Amazing location best rooftop bar and breakfast. Bed comfy and always clean cons: While the external windows are well soundproofed the internal walls and doors are very thin enabling you to hear everything in the corridor and next door.
pros: Great Location room was lovley with a terrace and view cons:

pros: The staff is amazing the hotel feels like home because of that. During my stay I was ill for one day and they went out of their way to make me feel better. cons: Very clean great rooms excellent location refreshments in  suite was great
pros: Central location roof top bar and service cons:
pros: Very good excellence! cons:

pros: Very helpful staff. 
Polite and friendly. 
good location. 
room a tad small though they did upgrade us to a room with small terrace facing the square. cons: Nothing much only 2 nights stay.
pros: Everything about this hotel top-notch. Superior customer service. Will return. cons: There was nothing negative to say about this property.
pros:  cons: Breakfast should have been free as it was at every other hotel we stayed at all over Portugal. It was the same food.
pros: The staff went out of their way to make sure your stay was incredible. cons:
pros: everything cons: no problem
pros: Lcation  staff front desk cons: ?

pros: This property was perfect !!!!   Best location to go up hill and down hill and explore all of Lisbon.  Staff exceptional !  Rooms exceptional !  Clean.  Comfortable !  Absolutely awesome ! cons:

pros: Exceptional stay all around. The location facilities staff quality of everything attention to detail and helpful nature of the full team made it an elevated experience. Highly recommend staying here. We used their private tour service for both a tuk tuk and car and both were great experiences. 

The highlight is truly the hotel staff from the concierge to the reception to the hotel staff everyone was incredibly helpful welcoming and professional. cons: Can't think of a single thing!
pros: The staff were super friendly and helpful cons:
pros: Everything Was Amazing! No comments!! cons:
pros: Amazing hotel and great location! Highly recommended!! cons:
pros:  cons: quite noisy!
pros: Location & staff were great cons: Nothing

pros: The room and specially the mattress were so comfortable 
The reception staff was very helpful 
The location is exceptional 
The roof top lounge has an exceptional view on the city cons:
pros: Location cons: Wish there‚Äôs roof top pool or bigger gym
pros: Everything was just perfect!! People facilities food. I really love the rooftop space. So beautiful. cons:
pros: Perfect location amazing view from the rooftop bar friendly and helpful staff cons:

pros: The location was perfect. The beds were very comfortable. We were treated to a mini bottle of port Portuguese tarts and bottled water on arrival. Staff were really lovely and accommodating. 
The breakfast was lovely with lots of options. Lots of gluten free options too. 
The view from the sunset lounge is beautiful and the gastro lounge is a lovely spot for a sunset drink. cons: Nothing. It was all amazing.
pros: Room size cleanliness and modernity. Rooftop restaurant with great view of the city and good kitchen. Very helpful management and staff. Central location. cons: nothing
pros: great view from roof terrace lovely food lovely staff fab hotel! cons:

pros: Friendly and helpful staff breakfast was ok not 5 star by my expectation. Gym is very average. Comfortable beds and bedding. Staff uniforms need replacing (worn out and out of style). cons: Cleanliness could be improved. Public areas look dirty.

pros: Best location. Walking distance from old city and Liberdade. 
Very friendly and helpful staff
Amazing view from the roof top cons:

pros: This was my third stay at Altis Avenida so it should have been hard to surprise me! I arrived early yet got immediate access to an upgraded suite. I had great times on the roof-top where a bar and menu were available. The views of Lisbon are fantastic from there. Every member of staff was attentive. Their tasks were delivered exceptionally well. cons: Nothing at all!
pros: Location and the facilities cons: Nothing
pros: Design and location cons: Fitness center could use foam rollers

pros: We stayed at the hotel for 3 nights. Nice clean room with a terrace and a view of the city. Breakfast served in the restaurant with a view and the possibility of sitting in the evening. Satisfaction. cons:
pros: It was perfect! Location facilities staff. Rooftop was beautiful! I would recommend to all my family and friends! cons:
pros: Perfect location and great service. cons:
pros: Beautiful property super helpful staff. The rooftop bar is incredible. cons: Nothing
pros: The location of the hotel.....the hotel staff is very friendly......the quality of the food cons:

pros: Location was brilliant 
Front desk staff very helpful & pleasant 
Breakfast was good cons:
pros: Everything. Hotel food staff. Everything was amazing! cons:
pros: Wonderful hotel and staff!!! cons: Location and staff.
pros: The location is perfect the bar and the restaurant with an amazing view cons:

pros: on check in a warm greeting by Gabreila & Sofia made us feel very welcome 10/10 girls
In the Rossio Restaurant the staff were a treat for an evening wind down
all staff were very very friendly helpful & informative - a thoroughly  enjoyable stay

an exceptional stay management please take note of your great staff cons:
pros: An exceptional stay!! Great staff. Lovely room. Beautiful views. Catrina from concierge was brilliant. cons: There is nothing to dislike.

pros: Customer service 
Great staff cons: Nothing

pros: Absolutely everything!
Staff
Rooftop bar
Room
Location cons: Nothing we had the best stay
pros: Location fantastic / staff - food - service impeccable üíô cons:
pros: The roof top in the night was perfect cons: My room was next street you can hear the cars  in the night but it was not bad
pros: everything perfect. rooftop amazing. cons: nothing

pros: The location and quality of the hotel is gorgeous. The roof top bar and restaurant are delightful. cons: Could easily put some kind of spa on the roof. You really feel you need a hotel with a pool or some kind of water facility after being out in the perfect heat of Lisbon

pros: We arrived at noon and the hotel provided us with a great room for early check-in- which was fabulous. Location is amazing very central walking distance to all sights restaurants etc. Breakfast on the hotel roof top was great with alot of options great friendly service. We took advantage of the roof top bar both during the day and most evenings to enjoy the amazing city views would highly recommend it.
Overall experience exceeded our expectations- customer service was fabulous! I cannot praise the staff enough with their hospitality. When in Lisbon this will be our hotel of choice! cons: Nothing
pros: Location and very clean cons: Nothing
pros: The hotel staff is exceptional and very friendly and caring. The hotel rooms are very good and very clean. We loved it and the location is central. cons:
pros: Excellent location the hotel is beautiful and the rooms are a bit small but overall nice and clean. cons: Room size
pros: Loved the location! cons: The air conditioning was set up by using your door key. It was hot at night.
pros: Front desk staff cons:
pros: The team in particular were terrific cons: All good üòé
pros: Everything cons: Nothing
pros: Great staff and a fantastic location the roof top bar is a treat cons: Nothing

pros: Central location 
Quality rooms and bedding 
Staff assistance cons:
pros: The staff are friendly. They looked after me and made me feel very welcome. Couldn‚Äôt Praise the staff in the reception area enough. cons:
pros: Service cons: No pool
pros: Central location friendly spotlessly clean and with a fabulous roof terrace with bar and breakfast area. cons: Nothing
pros: We loved everything: the people the excellent and super friendly service the rooftopbar breakfast location clean and very confortable room cons:
pros: The service was amazing the location was fantastic and the room was very comfortable and had a great view! The hotel staff are top notch! cons:
pros: Lovely hotel- very friendly staff & great food. Loved the roof bar! cons:

pros: Very nice and comfortable rooms. Amazingly comfortable beds! 
Great location! Very nice staff! cons: Nothing
pros: The concierge was extremely helpful. cons:
pros: Fantastick√° poloha n√°dhern√© pokoje mimo≈ô√°dnƒõ mil√Ω person√°l. cons:
pros: The location staff  and accommodations cons: No complaints

pros: From the moment you stepped inside the staff was attentive and provided refreshments while waiting for our room. They very kindly upgraded us and the room was wonderful‚Ä¶bed comfortable shower fantastic very good a/c. The first night they left a bottle of port and pasties nada. Second night treated us to sparkling wine and macarons! Roof top deck is wonderful. The location is not right in busy area but easily walkable and train station right across the street. Highly recommend! cons: Nothing

pros: The location is amazing very central and close to everything. The hotel is very clean with comfortable beds but more importantly all staff members (with no exception) from reception (Sofia Ana) bell captains (Ricardo) guest services (Julia) and breakfast staff are very friendly and helpful. I do travel a lot and would always return to Altis Avenida as you really get the 5-star experience. cons: All was great no complaints on anything.
pros: Everything. Location room rooftop restaurant service great views. cons: Nothing
pros: Location was perfect to explore the city! Great views! cons: Everything was great!
pros: Incredible staff nice room perfectly located cons:

pros: Nice staff
Good location cons: Location
Staff

pros: Very friendly staff good rooms comfortable beds and pillows location. Breakfasts  with the view and the bar were very nice cons: Everything was very good. A little bit noisy (noise from the street and music from the bar when you live in upper floors but not for the whole night of course). In spite of this little moment I would recommend the hotel and would come again.
pros: Great staff fantastic location and food good cons: V mall gym with limited dumbbells.. need some heavier ones

pros: Central location professional staff and always ready to help. Hotel is spotless. 
Lovely rooftop bar. 
We booked a Classic Room and it was spacious and had lots of storage. cons: N/A
pros: Super comfortable friendly staff fabulous top deck and cool rooftop bar with knock out views. cons:

pros: Great Location nice roof top bar great beds so good nights sleep nice bedding and staff personally showed us to the room fab views from the room. cons: No real mirror in the room lots of smokey mirrors as wall decor but could not see in them adequately not enough electric sockets only small quantity of milk coffee & tea we had to request more. Very pushy concierge who wanted to park our car when we wanted to park it ourselves practically snatched keys from my hand. Bar receptionist was not very friendly she only wanted us to sit where she wanted us to sit there were lots of empty tables but she did not like it when we questioned her however the bar waiting staff and breakfast staff were lovely.
pros: Great service and friendly atmosphere. cons: Nothing

pros: Location was good breakfast was very good and the staff were amazing cons: Bathroom sink was small the pipe in the bath tub was clogged and woul take time to go down.
Dinner menu was very limited.

pros: Great location central to everything. Room was very well laid out although not large as is typical for a city hotel but was very comfortable and well appointed. Great beds and pillows. Great shower and well laid out bathroom. Turndown service was another nice amenity. However no one had cleaned our room on Sunday but we did see housekeeping in the hall and requested and it was done immediately. Rooftop bar had great view but was small  and both times we went we could not get seated. However there is a great rooftop deck above that has a great view as well and the staff gladly gave us drinks in nice plastic cups to take up there. All staff were extremely courteous and helpful. I would happily stay here again if I return to Lisbon. cons:

pros: Location is excellent on the border between the hustle and bustle of Avenida da Liberdade and the back streets of the nearby residential neighborhood. It was easy to walk to many of the places we wanted to go. The room was large and comfortable with excellent wifi service. The rooftop sundeck is a wonderful place to relax. cons: The hotel breakfast is good but very pricey. The lobby has nowhere to sit down while waiting for a car.
pros: The staff is very professional polite and attentive. Location is at the center of the city lovely scenes from the balcony. The rooftop resturent is very cozy. cons: Nothing.
pros: Location and good sized room. Nice roof top bar but typically expensive city prices. cons: Nothing

pros: Great location. Superb service.
Complimentary goodies on arrival and before departure very nice. cons: A little road noise at night.

pros: Location very good
Staff kindly cons: Towel not shiny
Below case high  hard little

pros: Location was supreme hotel desk and concierge were both very accommodating and knowledgeable. My wife wasn‚Äôt feeling well upon arrival and front desk found us a room despite arriving early and upgraded us! cons: Gym
pros: In the centre of Lisbon  great terrace bar and beautiful view .. also nice welcome gift cons:
pros: Breakfast was wonderful. Found out on our last day you could order omelets cons: Our bathroom was small for two people and we would have liked a mirror in the bedroom.
pros: Very attentive and helpfull staff cons: Nothing

pros: The welcome from the staff was amazing. They went out of their way to provide us with joined rooms which is so important for us with two young children. They had prepared special colouring pages colour pencils soft toys and treats for the kids. This extra warmth and hospitality is what elevates the service and standard of a hotel - so huge kudos to the hotel team. cons: Pillows were uncomfortable because they weren‚Äôt firm enough.

pros: Great Location walking and subway close to many things you will want to see.  Many restaurants nearby.  Staff was great quickly shifted to English once we arrived as we have no 2nd language.  Bellman - Ricardo and the Concierge (who's name I didn't record) were VERY attentive in helping us navigate the area. Bar is a bit pricey though the pour was generous:). Hostess quickly picked up on our nightly game of cribbage and that we need shade always greeting and seating us at a table that worked well for our nightcap.  We returned two weeks later to stay before flying home.  We were remembered and greeted warmly placed in the same room overlooking the street with a balcony. cons: We don't really have any negatives while a bit pricey location and staff make it worth it.
pros: The staff was extremely kind and helpful. Went out of their way to make my parents feel welcome and comfortable. I think they‚Äôll remember this trip as top three of their lifetime. cons: Zero

pros: We loved the location the breakfast was by far the best and the staff especially Leonora.  Being in the heart of the city let us explore via walking every day.  We literally did every YouTube video of what to do in Lisbon in 24 hours cons: The parking fee was a lot and the shower had to curtain so it was hard to keep water in.
pros: Friendly and polite cons: Machine coffee!!
pros: Room we got an upgrade cons: Private terrace could be more decorated. There were no cushions plants‚Ä¶
pros: Great location. Fabulous rooftop bar. With view. cons: Nothing

pros: The location is amazing center to everything but the staff is what makes this place AMAZING. They‚Äôre so hospitable and remember you and are beyond helpful. I was traveling alone and they gave me great recommendations for places to go and things to do. cons:

pros: The location was perfect and extremely welcoming and helpful staff nothing was too much trouble.  There was a lounge area with cool drinks and snacks on arrival just what was needed cons: Nothing

pros: Wry good location close to train station  can walk everywhere.
The hotel staff  desk concierge and porters were friendly and very helpful.
Breakfast was very good too. cons:

pros: Great hotel with excellent location right in the centre many sights are within comfortable walking distance. The staff is very friendly and attentive. On my wife's birthday they sent bubbles and a birthday cake to the room along with a birthday greeting card. Rooms have a kettle and nespresso machine every day a large bottle of water. There is a lovely rooftop bar and a fitness room with treadmills bicycle dumbbells and kettlebells and large mirrors great for maintenance workouts. We really enjoyed our stay. cons: We had a standard room and it is a bit on the smaller side but ok. If you need more space check for a larger room or suite.
pros: Very clean the location is excellent the rooftop very nice! cons:

pros: The staff is amazing.  Everyone goes out of his or her way to be helpful.  The location provides easy access to many restaurants and shopping.  The junior suite is roomy and well equipped.  The 7th floor bar is a perfect place to enjoy a drink and have a snack.  The roof top terrace has a view that must be one of the best in the old town. cons:
pros: Location great restaurant and breakfast friendly helpful staff. cons: Central staircase was a bit noisy noise from downstairs travelled up into room corridors especially at night.
pros: Very helpful staff great junior suite nice breakfast wonderful bar and spectacular view from the terrace. cons:
pros: The location and staff were the best cons: The room was small for the furniture in it which made it difficult to get to things

pros: Perfect location walking distance to great restaurants tourist attractions and metro/train station. The room was big clean and very confortable. The panoramic room from the restaurant and the bar are just beautiful. cons:
pros: Location was great and overall a very nice hotel. The breakfast was good and they had champagne. cons:

pros: Wonderful location and we were given such an amazing room. Lovely rooftop and the hotel staff were truly wonderful. I had gotten very sick and they did everything they could to accommodate me. It was the best customer service I've ever experienced. I left to go home to the states early and they took care of refunding me a night with booking.com. Although being sick one of the best hotels around. Stay there! cons:
pros: Friendly staff excellent breakfast spacious room restaurant on the roof cons: everything was great

pros: The hotel is very centrally located off the Blue Metro Line and very near one of the main train stations   The rooms were good size by European standards  They had an excellent breakfast buffet on their rooftop restaurant cons: It‚Äôs in the heart of the tourist district so it can get very busy in the area

pros: It was old hotel but very clean and comfortable. Staffs were very kind and helpful. We reserved two rooms for our family and they were connected! Inside the bathroom there was a small plastic chair so it was really good for my old parents to sit down. Beautiful hotel with good price so I will definitely visit again. cons: None

pros: Staff were friendly and helpful. The room was very comfortable and hotel is centrally located. We loved the voucher for a free drink at the roof top bar with wonderful views over Lisbon. In the room were complimentary pastel de nata and bottle of port - a lovely touch. cons:
pros: Exception hotel located in the heart of Lisboa. The views the amenities the people the complementary pastries and chocolates the rooftop the cocktails! cons: Noisy neighbors!

pros: They have the best staff. We were celebrating my birthday and everyone was aware of it!! They all stopped me that day and say Happy Birthday to me!  When I came back to my room I had a cake sparkling wine and a beautiful card wishing me Happy Birthday! They upgraded my room. Food was amazing. The rooftop view was the most beautiful view! This is the place I want to stay when I come back! Loved Altis Avenida Hotel!!! cons:

pros: Excellent hotel in a great location for exploring Lisbon with high quality service and facilities. All of the staff were very welcoming friendly and helpful. The roof terrace bar particularly attracted us to this hotel and it was a lovely spot to relax on with a drink and enjoy the wonderful views. cons:

pros: The hotel is located centrally. Very clean and helpful staff. They were very friendly helpful and did their utmost to satisfy us. They even offered us late checkout for free. They supported us with any request. cons: None

pros: Ricardo was very kind and helpful. Checkin perfect. RoofTop: wonderful. Good Beakfast cons: The Room was small.
Rate: rather high
pros: Breakfast was awesome. Service so friendly. cons: Rooms were small for the price.
pros: Loved the location of the hotel everyone was lovely and great breakfast. Rooms are amazing. cons:
pros: Lovely room location and breakfast was great. cons: Nothing to dislike.
pros: Location amazing staff cons:

pros: Room was very nice and comfortable. The only change I would request is add some down pillows please 
Breakfast was GREAT! cons: Nothing
pros: Great location and great staff cons: The TV

pros: The location was fantastic in the center of town accessible on foot to many attractions and restaurants. Our room had a balcony overlooking Avenida da Liberdade. The view from the rooftop restaurant and bar was amazing and the quality of food was excellent! We must mention the concierge named Julia. She was incredible and made sure our anniversary was special. Port wine champagne sweets and notes were left in our room on a daily basis. Also Marco Martins the bellman was so kind patient and informative. The entire staff was helpful kind and professional! Truly a five-star experience! cons: We had a lot of luggage for our 6-week stay and the room was a bit small. We had a difficult time finding space to place and open our suitcases.

pros: Location was very central - right at the end of the main boulevard. It was great for the wedding we were attending and close to lots of nice places for brunch. Our room was very comfortable and the staff were quick and helpful. Roof top terrace views were unreal. All up and down Lisbon city. cons: Hotel was great but would have loved if it had a roof top pool or plunge pool to go with the views.

pros: The rooms are comfortable the bathroom/shower is great. The staff is very friendly and helpful. Location is pretty central. Breakfast is rich including gluten free options (bread muffins and occasionally pastel de nata!) - thank you we will definitely be back! cons: None

pros: Great room with a view up the road.  Neighbourhood felt safe and there were lots of restaurants and cafes.  Excellent location for walking Lisbon.  Breakfast in the roof top restaurant was fresh and lots of choices.   Highly recommend this hotel cons: Nothing.

pros: Location was absolutely perfect which is the very centre of Lisbon making it easily accessible to visit all the major tourist attractions restaurants and shops. Hotel is stunning. Extremely good value for money. Staff were fantastic. Breakfast on the rooftop was impeccable. Would certainly visit again! cons:
pros: Great location very nice and polite staff. The room with the view was superb. cons: -
pros: The staff was incredibly supportive professional and friendly cons: All was amazing
pros: Location and perfect team cons:
pros: Location. Amazing staff!  Marco is excellent!! cons:
pros: Just a fantastic hotel with the kindest personnel cons: Nothing

pros: The service and attitude in the hotel was EXCEPTIONAL! Never met such service before! All the stuff (especially Daniel in reception) was amazing. Many little things make your stay in the hotel unforgettable. 
It's my second time in the hotel will come again and again. cons: Nothing
pros: location  room and breakfast were perfect. Room was upgraded. cons:
pros:  cons: service at breakfast was a bit slow

pros: Perfect location for sightseeing shopping and restaurants. Staff are amazing very friendly and knowledgeable. Excellent customer service. Rooms are spacious and clean. Loved the rooftop bar/restaurant. Has great food and cocktails with beautiful views of Lisbon. Definitely will come back! cons: Nothing
pros: The location couldn't be more perfect! The hotel is exquisitely comfortable and beautifully designed. Breakfast was simply delightful with every item being super delicious! cons:

pros: Good location near everything  breakfast was excellent cons: Old type hotel  small rooms with carpet in the hallways  we came back in the room after 3 PM  room was not cleaned  they wanted to clean it with us in the room  not ok for a 5 star hotel . Reception very efficient. Bar and restaurant on the rooftop lovely with nice view but you had to get up and go find someone every time that you needed  something  also  service very slow not so many choices for dinner  nothing vegetarian.
pros: Perfect location. Incredible roof top bar and restaurant. cons: Nothing
pros: Location lovely room amazing shower cons: Not enough vegetarian food options for lunch/ dinner
pros: Best location! cons: Nothing!

pros: Staff very helpful
Location great
Room spacious
Meals excellent cons:
pros: Central location. Staff very friendly and helpful. cons: Everything was fine . A great stay.
pros: Staff are amazing. Location is excellent wonderful roof top bar (reservation recommended). Room was large spacious and very comfortable. cons: N/A
pros: 5 star finish cons:

pros: Julia and her team were exceptionally friendly helpful and kind. They made a superb first impression. The room we were given was spacious and had a wonderful balcony. The hotel is especially well located for shopping sightseeing and going to restaurants. cons:

pros: The accommodations at Altis Avenida Hotel are nothing short of remarkable. The room was spacious elegantly furnished and impeccably clean. The attention to design and comfort was evident in every detail from the luxurious bedding to the stunning views of Lisbon's vibrant cityscape. I must also commend your team for their excellent concierge service. They provided invaluable recommendations for exploring Lisbon from must-see attractions to hidden gems off the beaten path. Their insights truly enhanced my visit and allowed me to discover the true essence of this beautiful city. I look forward to returning in the future and creating more cherished memories in your beautiful city. cons: The restaurant recommendation fell short of expectations. It resembled a tourist hub where one might dine only once. We were rather seeking suggestions for authentic cuisine and ambiance.
pros: Five Star Service at front desk roof top bar and restaurant.   Location was great cons:

pros: The location is in the center of Lisbon next to shops restaurants transportation etc. The staff was amazing all so polite and was very knowledgeable. They have a roof top restaurant with view of the city. It was an amazing stay. cons:
pros: Perfect location The room was not the most spacious one but very clean and giving great comfort. The breakfast was amazing and also the service. As a great plus is the roof bar. cons:

pros: The staff were all excellent and prepared a surprise in the room for my wife's birthday on our arrival. Her actual birthday was the following day and they placed some cake and a card and a bottle of wine on ice in the room again much appreciated! We had an unfortunate situation regarding our pre-booked transfer (outside of the hotel's control). The staff were very apologetic and succeeded in calming my wife down eventually! Special mention for the manager Isabela who was extremely polite and professional.

We stayed in a deluxe room which had a lovely balcony overlooking Rossio square. The bed was very comfortable and the shower was one of the best I have experienced in a hotel. The room was also very clean.

The breakfast was nice to have available and the coffee served was great appreciated this as I find it's often terrible in hotels. cons: The wifi was a little spotty occasionally but nothing major. We have data roaming so wasn't really a problem for us. The scrambled eggs at breakfast could have been a little hotter but again not a big issue.
pros: Everything was fantastic. The staff the amenities the location. cons:
pros: Fantastic location in the heart of Lisbon. Beautiful hotel. Amazing staff - very friendly helpful and polite. Lovely room. Fantastic and delicious breakfast. cons: Nothing.

pros: Very central to town lots of restaurants nearby close to public transportation Bolt easy to use. Breakfast was great. Great view of our square from our room. cons: Would be nice if the rooms were bigger.
pros: Location and staff cons: Nothing
pros: Everything was very nice and the details the hotel gives to make you feel comfortable cons: The coffee downstairs was supposed to be all the time open was my understanding

pros: Everything!
The room was luxurious with all the services. The perfect location allowed us to visit the city center just walking. The staff was extremely polity helpful and supportive. The breakfast and the rooftop bar.. two gems! cons: I can not mention anything.
pros: the location is. RILLIANT.. in the thick of everything. Very warm concierge. cons:

pros: The location was wonderful. The service was exceptional. We were celebrating our anniversary and got a free upgrade to an amazing room with a balcony and a breathtaking view of the plaza. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. There were special touches- we received a complementary small bottle of Porto and Pastels de Nata. The location was perfect. cons: The room needs a little updating.

pros: We loved staying at Altis last year as well when we visited Lisbon. This year too after a whirlwind trip across Europe just to relax a bit before our flight back home we opted to stay at Altis Avenida again. We were checked in at the reception and were taken to our room and to our surprise when they opened the door it was the Presidential Suite. One of the best surprises.
Apart from this unexpected surprise (which anyhow bowled us over) the best part of our stay (both last time and this time) was the genuine warmth and the hospitality of everyone. Never once did I see anyone from the hotel staff not greeting us with a big smile and an eagerness to help. 
And we know that we will definitely comeback again. cons: Nothing as such.

pros: The staff were excellent and amazing and it really makes your stay delightful.
The location of the hotel is great cons: Room service can be improved

pros: Good location with lovely /freindly staff
All the resturants and cafes are at walking distance.

Amazing tour with HYPPOTRIP. cons:

pros: We like the facilities the rooftop bar was excellent and the breakfast was out of this world. But the most important will start the staff where very accommodating they went out of their way to make us happy had great memory about the occasion the names et cetera. cons: There is nothing I can think of.

pros: The service we received at this hotel was exceptional. From the moment we walked through the doors we were greeted with warmth and professionalism that truly set the tone for a fantastic stay. Catarina who showed us the room made us feel so welcome and showed attention to detail and genuine care. All the staff were friendly and willing to assist with any inquiries or requests going above and beyond to ensure that our needs were met with a positive and friendly attitude. The hotel is perfectly situated and the accommodations exceeded our expectations. cons:

pros: The location the premises the breakfast - everything was exceptional! From my room i could see the Rossio Square - what an amazing view! And at the same time I heard no street noise at all! All the main attractions are at a walking distance and from the rooftop restaurant one can see a beautiful panorama of the city center. 
But my highest points go to the hotel staff - so friendly and helpful they all from the recetionists to waiters and porters made my stay perfect! I only regret that I had only one night stay - next time I'll make it at least a couple of days longer! cons: Nothing
pros: Everything was perfect. cons:
pros: The staff were fantastic cons: Nothing
pros: Excellent cons:

pros: We were given a room with a small balcony overlooking the square and the christmas market.  It was beautiful.  The roof terrace was also a real treat.  The staff were all very helpfull and the hotel had a lovely atmosphere. cons:
pros: Location and cleanness cons: It was a bit outdated. A bit of improvement would be great!

pros: The hotel had an excellent location cons: The facilities were a bit outdated and improvement would have been certainly helpful. The staff was extremely helpful and nice. They were the best part of the property
pros: The location is perfect and the rooftop restaurant is amazing. cons:

pros: The location is great close to shops restaurants etc. We had a little incident with the laundry service and the personal was very professional and friendly the restaurant upstairs is very nice and the breakfast was lovely cons: The room is a bit small if you‚Äôre traveling with big suitcases like we did but other than that I couldn‚Äôt say anything negative about this hotel
pros: Best staff ever encountered at any of hotel stays in my 40 years of business travel spanning around 3.5 million miles and 30+ countries. cons:

pros: The rooms were clean and accommodating on the 6th floor with a small  balcony from which you can see the city. The location is excellent very close to various city main attractions and good places to eat. cons:
pros: Fantastic staff and facilities they could not do enough to make us feel welcome cons:
pros: Location and staff hospitality cons: Nothing

pros: The hotel was very nice and in a great location for being able to wander the streets of Lisbon or for transport links. There is an amazing rooftop bar and sun terrace which was a great place to watch the New Years fireworks from the Pra√ßa do Commercio. The staff were amazing so friendly from the minute we arrived and every small detail was thought about to make the stay as comfortable as possible. cons: There was nothing.

pros: Great location. Almost no noise despite being in very central location. 
Lots of breakfast places nearby as breakfast was not included in our price. cons: More hooks in bathroom for towels.
pros: Amazing service and friendly staff. Very comfortable room. Excellent breakfast. It's also at the heart of the center so great location. cons: There wasn't anything I didn't like.

pros: Friendly staff 
Location
Very good breakfast

pros: The location was excellent. Staff were very pleasant cons:

pros: We received our adjoining rooms and they overlooked the beautiful Christmas Market. The rooms were well appointed. The bathroom amenities were more plentiful in a suite. The blackout drapes were excellent. cons: The corner room street traffic was not muffled with the drapes but it was okay enough. They should let you know if it's street side or front or back of building. But our view was incredible so really can't complain.
pros: Great staff and hospitality cons:
pros: The beds were so comfy staff was amazing location oerfect and the roof too bar was beautiful cons:
pros: everything cons: nothing

pros: Great location   Rooftop bar and restaurant superb. Very much the place to be seen plus great food and service. Walk out the door and you‚Äôre right in the heart of things and a short walk to the harbour Arrived by car which was whisked away by excellent door staff cons: Nothing not to like
pros: excellent location; very nice room;  quiet; excellent breakfast cons: nothing

pros: Everything was perfect especially the staff they were amazing and nothing was too much for them. Breakfast was amazing. Location perfect cons: Having to Pay for parking is the only issue that we really had just not used to this from 5* hotels

pros: First of all a shout out and massive thank you to Ines on reception! She was a pleasure. The beds are extremely comfortable so be prepared for an amazing nights sleep. The roof top restaurant and bar has an incredible view and serves delicious food (get the mushroom bites!!). Overall a memorable stay and will be back! Thanks from Tash & Lucy :) cons: For suites that are adjoining it is recommended to get the main door access battery fixed. We had to keep going downstairs to get our main door open. I would also recommend adding full length mirrors in either the wardrobe doors or bathrooms. Only small recommendations
pros: very friendly staff location was perfect for us. cons:

pros: This hotel was phenomenal and did not disappoint. We were so warmly welcomed and even got upgraded to a bigger room. We went for my husband‚Äôs 40th and they brought us some champagne and chocolate cake - we were very touched. The staff are truly excellent and made such an effort to make our stay an unforgettable one. This hotel is located in an excellent location and the roof top terrace even in winter is breathtaking. Thank you so much! cons: Nothing at all
pros: I  thoroughly enjoyed the hotel the ambiance staff and location were all excellent cons: The only slight disappointment was the size of the room I felt it was a bit on the small side.

pros: The staff were incredibly friendly we arrived early and they found us a room so that we could head out for the day. The location is absolute perfection in the heart of the city centre/ taxi rank/ metro all easily accessible! cons:

pros: Amazing location. Close to everything and not up a hill. The staff are incredible. The rooftop bar is lovely and the food is delicious. We were greeted with pastel de nata and port on arrival champagne and macarons on departure. cons:
pros: It was my husbands birthday on arrival day and they gave us champagne and a chocolate cake so nice cons:
pros:  cons: Breakfast was poor
pros: I always stay here the staff are wonderful food and drink amazing and the location is superb cons:
pros: The location and roof top restaurant cons: The rooms are not really like 5 stars hotel
pros: Clean..very polite stuff..location excellent right at the centre cons:

pros: Professional staff who made us feel at home from even before we arrived. cons: The cheese board at the hotel restaurant is sold per 100g of cheese (minimum) and has prices like euro 48 for 100g!! A stupid system that ensures you cannot just have a nice selection of cheese after dinner unless you are willing to spend hundreds of euro on mediocre cheese you‚Äôll never finish.

pros: Perfect location right across from Rossio train station. Plenty of shopping and restaurants nearby. Shower/ bathroom was amazing as was the electric blinds to block out light and noise for better sleep. cons: Nothing negative to say.

pros: Location and Staff were excellent. Room was nicely decorated I liked that it had asafe and fridge facility. cons: Room was small no men size slippers to change into. Breakfast on Day two (Sunday) fell short of my expecations from the previous day. I ordered eggs Royal for breakfast and it never arrived. I went to the hostess and she reordered. When it came out eggs were hard and practically no hollandaise sauce - disappointing.
pros: The service was fantastic. Definitely a 5 star experience. Breakfast was great location is perfect. cons: Nothing.
pros: The location of the hotel is very convenient. The rooftop restaurant has an amazing view cons:

pros: 1. Amazing/ Very nice hotel-staff. 2. Amazing view of the breakfast area. 3. Very nice overall ambient - compared to different hotels in Lisboa. 4. Decent location - though might be too touristy... cons: Facilities could be more up to quality as a 5* hotel.

pros: Everything - location staff room view from the room view from the restaurant at the top cleanliness breakfast - absolutely without a single complaint. If I come to Lisbon again I will stay at the Altis Avenida Hotel. Highly recommended to everyone. cons: Nothing!
pros: Friendly staff easy communication comfortable bed beautiful view cons: Everything was great!
pros: Breakfast cons: Lack of public seating places

pros: Beautiful hotel - the views from the bar and rooftop lounge area feel unbeatable. Very attentive and brilliant staff. Treats in room when we arrived was a lovely extra touch. Super clean room with huge and very powerful shower. Very comfy bed. Perfect location for exploring Lisbon. cons: Cannot fault anything - we would definitely stay here again if we return to Lisbon and would recommend to family and friends.
pros: Location was fantastic great bar on the top floor with fantastic service. cons: Nothing everything was great

pros: Spotless!! 
The hotel went above and beyond for my mums birthday. 
They surprised her with a handwritten note some sweet cakes and a bottle of champagne. It‚Äôs the little things that make the experience even more special!! Cannot thank them enough. I spoke to the team via messaging and they arranged rose petals and happy birthday balloons in her room which she absolutely loved. 
They were super helpful super friendly. Everything about the hotel was perfect. Would definitely recommend. 
The rooftop was amazing!! 
The views from the rooftop from the balcony- sensational
I hope we will be back soon cons: I loved everything
pros: The location is superb close to everything. The room was a bit on the small size but it had everything that one would need. cons: Nothing really.
pros: Excellent location extremely clean throughout the hotel our bedroom was spotless. cons:
pros: Did not eat breakfast the location is excellent cons: We ate at the gastro pub which has outstanding views but the food was only average
pros: Fab location. Smart upmarket property with excellent Customer Service. Would recommend highly! cons: Nothing

pros: Pretty much everything. The location was great as it was very close to 2 Metro lines and next to the station to take the train to Sintra. The room was spacious and comfortable. The staff was very good and the concierges were very helpful. The rooftop bar was very nice also. All good! cons: Nothing
pros: Great location. They gave us an early check in and upgraded room. Breakfast was very nice buffet with room top views. cons: Nothing
pros: Excellent hotel.  Spacious room large bathroom comfortable bed.  Staff helpful and friendly.  Close to train station metro and bus stops. cons: Nothing all good

pros: Location was the absolute best.  Staff was incredibly knowledgeable friendly and easy to work with.  Our room was comfortable and clean.  The breakfast was also outstanding.  We did go to the rooftop one evening and the view and service was perfect. cons: nothing applies here.  We liked it all
pros: It's a wonderful location for walking to several of the old neighborhoods. Friendly staff rooftop bar ...what's not to like? cons: Nothing..
pros: The location and the staff. cons: Everything was lovely.
pros: Fantastic roof top with delicious meals and cocktails. Service was impeccable. cons:
pros: Location. cons: A bit old. Needs refurbishment.

pros: Excellent brwakfast - we usually didn't need lunch/ Excellent location near 2 major subway lines we used to get around. Our balcony ovelooked the a manin square but windows were double glazed so very quiet. cons: Nothing I didn't like.

pros: A few marks on the wallpaper and carpet and some greasy marks on the wardrobe. Other than that it was clean and in a good location. It was a nice touch with a couple of pastries on delivery and reception was very friendly cons:
pros: The reception staff were amazing very helpful and welcoming with a smile on their face always :) thank you cons: It‚Äôs not much of a 5 Stars hotel not as luxurious as others I‚Äôve stayed in.
pros: Roof top balcony and a wonderful customer service cons: Na

pros: Staff was very friendly and helpful.  We had a few requests for which they responded very quickly. Just some very nice people.  The hotel location is very convenient. cons: A couple times a towel or two were missing after the room was serviced. But the staff responded very quickly to replace the missing items. 
The closet was way too small. Unfortunately this has become common in hotels. I wonder what type of thought goes into planning these overly small closets.
pros: Amazing location and beautiful roof top! Convenient parking next to the hotel. cons: The rooms are not really sound proof. The hotel needs some renovation.
pros: Great staff and location cons: A bit small .

pros: Great location and great staff throughout relaxed and very friendly. Breakfast and evening drinks up on the roof terrace were daily highlights (we had great weather!) cons: Rooms short of device charging options - eg. no USB charging points and also few plug points
pros: Perfect location amazing staff rooms spotless room service availabl cons: Nothing everything was perfect
pros: Great location comfortable bed and great service cons:

pros: Great location staff went above and beyond to accommodate us. Breakfast views are beautiful rooms were modern and comfortable. I had read some comments about the rooms being too loud in the city but our room was pin-drop quiet (we actually used a white noise machine it was so quiet haha). Also loved the black out curtains I haven't seen that amenity in many hotels before but it was wonderful. cons: Very small thing but one of the nights housekeeping didn't replenish bathroom supplies.
pros: Perfect location clean room attentiv service beautiful rooftop cons: Breakfast not included and way overpriced.

pros: staff was amazing and friendly cons: bed was hard as a board and the restaurant screwed up and left us sitting there for an hour. We never got a menu or anything. We left hungry to find someone else to eat
pros: Location of the facility cons: The luggage rack was broken after first of use and we took it outside and the hotel didn't replace it
pros: All was very good. breakfast was enjoyable on the 7TH FLOOR terrace cons:

pros: The staff at the Altis Avenida was amazing. The airline (Air Transat) lost my baggage and the staff was very helpful in calling the airport to check up on my claim. We did receive the bag the following evening. The rooftop restaurant for breakfast was a treat fantastic food selection and good quality. Having drinks and snacks in the afternoon on the rooftop was such a relaxing and enjoyable way to look out over Lisbon.

The location is ideal for restaurants shopping and site seeing. cons: I wish we could have stayed longer!
pros: Staff were absolutely amazing. They gave us a free upgrade to a corner room with a fabulous view. Hotel location is great. cons:
pros: Centrally located close to many historic places just a walk away - metro nearby along with many restaurants and bars. cons:
pros: Location- was just minutes away from all the sights cons:
pros: As returning visitors we chose the location so that was fantastic for us. This was a hotel in which everyone seemed delighted to have us as guests. cons: Our stay was too short!

pros: Beautiful hotel in a great location - walking distance to everything!  The staff were very friendly and we enjoyed our welcome gift in the room when we arrived. We also really enjoyed being able to go to the rooftop bar which was closed on the day we were there except for hotel guests. One of the best views we had while in Lisbon! cons:

pros: The breakfast was great as well as the rooftop bar.  The staff was exceptional in all departments
Ricardo the bellman is an outstanding employee and a tremendous asset to the hotel.  The reception staff was great as well and very accommodating and helpful. cons: Nothing
pros: Fabulous location. Great roof top bar and the staff were very helpful. cons: I would have liked a kettle in the room
pros: Great location. Wonderful restaurant. Staff was amazing. Thank you! cons: Nothing
pros: The staff are amazing. Nothing too much trouble. The location is very central. Easy walk to the waterfront on level ground. cons: Nothing

pros:  cons: There's no area to go and sit and relax other than the room or the bar.
pros: Excellent hotel. Nothing was too much trouble for the very friendly staff.  The rooftop bar was lovely with great bar snacks. cons: Nothing!

pros: Wow what a great hotel! Location is on a beautiful square in the historic area and an easy walk through the Chiado area (which we loved). The staff here are really incredible‚Ä¶always helpful and polite. We arrived very late from canceled flights and found pastels de nata and port waiting in each of our rooms. The upper terrace for morning coffee and cocktails is spectacular. Views over the city. Excellent service. cons:
pros: Very positive personnel high quality service clean and comfortable room cons:

pros: Location ambience hotel room view on rooftop facilities cons: Staircase looks terrifying at night
pros: Awesome location great view! cons:

pros: Everything. Location is close to metro and train station. Easy walk to most places. Staff is incredibly well trained for whatever u throw at them. They are kind attentive and caring. There is a reason the hotel is rated so highly. Will return for sure. cons: Nothing to dislike.

pros: location was the best we could walk everywhere it was just my son and I who stayed and neither of us are big breakfast eaters so we went out in the morning 7.30//8.00 for coffee and a croissant lots of places to chews from cons: nothing

pros: Everything! One of our favourite hotels and would not stay anywhere else in Lisbon! Such nice staff room‚Äôs extremely comfortable food amazing rooftop bar is fab hotel always spotless location amazing! 10/10!!! cons: Couldn‚Äôt think of anything I don‚Äôt like
pros: Great view of Lisbon to start your day cons:

pros: We got amazing suite. Hospitality included welcome drink soft drinks and coffee. Location is prime and good access to public transportation. Staff was more than helpful after I lost (stolen on the tram...) my wallet and helped me get back on my feet. Thank You! cons:

pros: A beautiful hotel in the heart of the city. Close to restaurants and shops. cons: Nothing

pros: Great location beautiful surrounding atmosphere great staff. Most friendly and helpful receptionist and staff lovely and great first impression of hotel with a room upgrade :). I hope to be back for a longer visit in the future. cons: N/a
pros: DANIEL IS THE BEST. HE GOT US A TABLE IN THE RESTAURANT EVEN WHEN IT WAS FULLY BOOKED. THE PERSONAL INCREDIBLE. WE WILL CAN BACK cons: NOTHING. EVERYTHING WAS PERFECT

pros: Staff were friendly attentive and helpful. The welcome drink Pastel de nata and Port in the room were an excellent surprise. pros: Excellent location for exploring Lisbon. Friendly staff. Lovely breakfast views on the terrace and having a complimentary cocktail at the roof bar was a nice touch. cons:
pros: Room was big for Europe staff was so lovely and breakfast was great cons:

pros: Location & roof top plus a bar with a view!! cons: Nothing to mention it was a very nice hotel close to restaurants & shopping Starbucks is across the street.  First time to Lisbon pre-cruise it was great!

Staff were pleasant and friendly and I was happily surprised by the hotel bringing me a cake and champagne on my birthday! The location is useful as the hotel is next to a metro station and opposite a train station (Rossio). There is an excellent seafood restaurant pretty much next door - it‚Äôs very popular and you have to queue to get in but it‚Äôs well worth it. A bookable underground car park with electric car chargers is very conveniently situated close to the hotel. cons: Hard to think of anything!

pros: Altis Avenida is an amazing hotel to stay at in Lisbon. Located central to many places. The staff in the hotel is super attentive and is helpful with any suggestions you may need. It has a great rooftop for incredible morning and sunset views. Ricardo Ines Isabel and Francisco were some of the incredible staff that made me feel at ease with any and every request. The housekeeping staff is great they even had a turn down routine where they refill the water leave chocolates close your shades and prepare the room for the night. The hotel is really clean and modern with big showers. I could not recommend this hotel enough and can‚Äôt wait to stay here again. cons:
pros: PErfect location. Couldnt be better cons:

Highly recommended hotel cons:

pros: Our stay at the Altis Avenida was simply exceptional!

The hotel is very well located near two metro stations and a train station right at the end of the Avenue da Liberdatea and minutes from Praca do Rossio perfect place to start exploring the city. 

The building itself and the rooms are very nicely decorated and the bed was very comfortable. 
It was also soundproofed from the street which is very important as cars drive by day and night. 
The wow of the building is the roof terrance where you can have breakfast or stay at the bar with incredible panorama views of the city. The bar is a night visit in the evenings!

But the star of this hotel are the staff. I can't remember the last place I felt so welcomed. Every interaction we had with them was exceptional. I am really sorry I did not catch all the names they are truly worth of praise but the few ones i remember - warm thanks to Ines from the reception desk Iasabel Julia and Frederico from the Consierge Telma and Patricio from the Restaurant and all the others - thank you! 

Just to give you an idea of the level of service... as a vegan as was a bit concerned I would not have much to choose from at breakfast. First morning when i go to breakfast i meet Frederico (who also happened to be vegan) and assures me that I am covered. If you have special needs they will check with the kitchen and try to make something happen. In a few minutes I had tofu an almond milk and a few vegan options for sandwiches. That was something. (But even without this I had plenty options at breakfast). Second morning I meet Telma at breakfast and i only say "i'm vegan" and she already knew what I had the other day and they brought it in. At the end of the week when Telma's shift had ended the person that came in Telma's place she also know what I have. Nice! cons:

pros: My favorite hotel in Lisbon!
Everything from the entrance until leaving the hotel was perfect!
The hospitality level of all the staff is fantastic! Hotel amenities are superb! cons: I can't find the drawbacks in this place!

pros: From the moment we arrived we felt like VIP's. Staff bent over backward to be sure our room met our needs even offering a tour of the options so we could decide. The hotel is next to metro stop and train station as well as a lively square with many nice shops restaurants etc. Santa Justa elevator is a short walk. The breakfast room on the 7th floor has beautiful city views. We were on scooters and some areas such as the elevator were a bit tight but staff were right there to direct us to move furniture for us etc. Showing even more incentive they left the tables set up for us each day of our stay so we could enjoy breakfast easily. Everyone was pleasant helpful and efficient. The food was excellent with many hot and cold choices. I particularly enjoyed the pastels de nata and cappuccino. Each day offered a nice selection of fruit hot and cold meats cheese eggs yogurt etc. Another very nice touch by the hotel was a greeting gift of pasteis de nata and a bottle of port on our first day. Our room was a nice size and though on the street was very quiet. There are automated black out curtains in the room. Bottled water was gratis as was Nespresso. The bed and linens were very comfortable and we slept very well. A delicious piece of chocolate left with turn down service ensured we had sweet dreams. cons: No complaints. If we hit any obstacle being mobility challenged staff always jumped in to make it work for us. I particularly appreciated all the help in the gastropub for access to the patio as the high door jambs from the retractable doors created a challenge. The entire staff stopped everything to help get my scooter and I on and off the patio. Exceptional service...I really can't compliment them enough.

pros: I must say that this was one of the best stays I ever had. What really made the difference for me was the staff: From the kind warm and gracious welcome given to us by Isabel who received us with an exquisite smile to the helpful advice of Diana and Julia at the reception always kind and ready to help or other smiley faces at the entrance. It really made a difference to us as we are very sensitive to kindness and politeness. The room was wonderful too: spacious designy with housekeeping was very attentive to details. We also had a view of Lisboa so it was all the more unforgettable. We are planning to come back to Portugal often so we will surely be returning there! cons: Nothing! but a note to the Hotel management: please invest in your staff because for us beyond the nice hotel and location this is what made our stay unforgettable. They were really excellent hotel professionals.

pros: This was a fantastic hotel in an amazing city center location of Lisbon.  The hotel staff was so friendly and professional and went above and beyond with each contact with personnel. The room was fabulous and luxurious with a large marble bathroom and casement windows that you can open to the beautiful plaza below. The breakfast on the rooftop was delicious with a large array of options for breakfast from hot entrees to fruit yogurt and cheese.
We highly recommend this hotel for its location and quality! Oh I almost forgot to compliment the roof top bar with excellent staff drinks and million dollar view of the city below!  Obrigada to all!!! cons:

The safe had an electricity supply in it to charge electronics while they were in it!  We had two rooms with their own private lobby which was better than the interconnecting door that we were expecting.   The lighting was good in the rooms and bathroom.  We heard no noise from other guests.  The breakfast was good and the breakfast restaurant was small so we did not feel that we were one of a crowd.  The location could not have been better.  The staff were super friendly and professional. Absolutely 5 star quality and service. cons: The evening meal menu was not to our taste so we ate elsewhere.

pros: The first thing to say is that all of the staff we met at the Altis Avenida hotel were very friendly and attentive throughout our stay. 
We booked a superior room and were given a free room upgrade to one with a balcony which was a nice surprise. Our room was on the 6th floor at the corner of the hotel so the views were wonderful. The room was quiet (as requested) and came equipped with blackout blinds robes slippers a wide range of bathroom toiletries and a Nespresso coffee machine. There were also some complimentary items to welcome us: Pasteis de nata a bottle of water and a small bottle of port.
A wide selection of food and drink was on offer at breakfast which was made even more enjoyable by the great city views from the 7th floor dining room. 
The Restauradores Metro station is literally a few steps from the hotel entrance which makes the trip to and from the airport very easy. There are numerous train bus and tram connections nearby as well as plenty of restaurants bars and shops. cons: Cannot think of anything that we did not like!

I was told they would call me after they check again the evening and next morning of our check out but I didn‚Äôt get a call I had to call a couple days later.
